description.hltext_display: Fleet and Darts prepare for festive schedule
description.author: Alex Hoad
description.content:
Darts boss Tony Burman said: "The two Christmas games are difficult matches for us and we still need to pick up points."
Fleet manager Liam Daish expects striker Calum Willock to recover from a chest infection which would have kept him out of the postponed game at Staines at the weekend while Danny Harris is Burman's only injury worry with a thigh strain.

event_or_fact.property: The two Christmas games are difficult matches for us and we still need to pick up points.

description.hltext_display: Hiperapego alteraría emociones en mascotas y dueños
description.content:
ANGELINA GUERRERO DE LA FACULTAD DE PSICOLOGÍA DE LA UNAM CONSIDERA QUE LOS HUMANOS SON EGOÍSTAS AL PENSAR QUE LOS ANIMALES PUEDEN SUPLANTAR SU SOLEDAD
En los últimos años, el número de mascotas en el país se ha incrementado considerablemente, aunque los lazos estrechos podrían derivar en hiperapego, que altera el equilibrio emocional del dueño y el animal, señaló Angelina Guerrero Luna, de la Facultad de Psicología (FP) de la UNAM.
La investigadora considera que una de las desventajas de esta relación radica en el egoísmo humano, que piensa que los animales pueden suplantar su soledad y los tratan como si fueran personas, humanizándolos con tal de satisfacer sus carencias personales.
Considera que tal comportamiento no contribuye en su cuidado, salud y ejercicio físico, ya que la relación desnaturaliza la vida de las mascotas, por un lado y da una existencia artificial y de encierro, por el otro.
Dice que la desaparición de los límites interespecie y los derivados entre mascotas y amos, puede generar confusiones, estrés e inseguridad entre ambos.
"Las respuestas del animal pueden ir desde ansiedad y desesperación, hasta temor y sensación de abandono; pasa por el olvido si es confinado en departamentos, zotehuelas, azoteas, cornisas, o deambula, como perros o gatos callejeros con efectos malos en la comunidad", señala.
Este comportamiento deriva en respuestas agresivas hacia los individuos, y coloca a los animales en riesgo de salud con epizootias (enfermedad contagiosa que ataca a un número inusual de animales).
Además, cuando son abandonados a su suerte son sacrificados o mueren en accidentes de tránsito.
El vínculo afectivo con mascotas
María Montero y López Lena, también de la Facultad de Psicología, consideran que las mascotas constituyen en la interacción según la capacidad del sujeto.
Ese vínculo afectivo puede ser tan saludable o no, como uno interpersonal. Si se establece apego no es sólo por la mascota, sino por las necesidades del sujeto. No obstante, si se vive en soledad, un animal no necesariamente eliminará esa carencia.
Señalan que además, la soledad no necesariamente es una experiencia negativa, puede ser la ocasión para evidenciar un problema psicológico, o una oportunidad para trascender y lograr un grado de autoconocimiento.
Más perros y gatos que niños menores de nueve años
En México viven 23 millones de perros y gatos, población que supera a la de niños menores de nueve años que, según cifras del Instituto Nacional de Estadística y Geografía (INEGI), es de 19.7 millones.
La cifra es similar a la de habitantes en el estado de México (14.8 millones) y el Distrito Federal (8.8 millones), las entidades más pobladas del país (INEGI).
Entonces, México ocupa el primer lugar en tenencia de esas mascotas en comparación con el resto de América Latina, y es que la cifra de 23 millones haría suponer que hay un can o felino en cada uno de los 24.4 millones de hogares que existen en el país.
Lamentablemente, se estima que de los 18 millones de perros, sólo 30% está en un hogar, es decir 5.4 millones; el resto, son callejeros.

description.hltext_display: 如何考察云计算服务提供商是否值得信赖
description.content:
潜在的云计算服务客户面临一个严峻的问题：当云计算提供商由于安全和现实的原因不愿意披露重要的基础设施细节的时候，他们如何能够信赖一个云计算服务提供商以便雇用它们?
这些云计算提供商表示，他们不能向用户公开他们的网络基础设施，因为担心这些细节会给潜在的黑客提供破坏安全的蓝图。他们还说，他们没有时间回答每一个用户的问题。
正如一个服务提供商今年早些时候所说的，用户永远得不到他们需要的透明度水平，这是底线。谷歌产品经理Adam Swidler在谈到谷歌云计算服务时说，我们不会让你像审计自己的基础设施一样审计我们的基础设施。它永远不会像审计你自己的基础设施一样。你必须把可信度扩大到第三方认证。
云计算安全联盟(CSA)说，虽然客户也许不能走进云计算服务提供商的数据中心，去盘问他们的首席信息安全官，但是，客户可以提出一些调查问题。这些问题的答案也许会达到这个目的。云计算联盟编写了一个调查表，客户如果要评估云计算提供商的适用性，可以采用这个调查表。
云计算安全联盟说，这个名为“共识评估计划调查表”的文档是评估云计算安全的一个周密的框架。这个问题集是对问题、最佳做法和管理能力的精简提炼，旨在帮助机构建立一个与云计算提供商打交道的必要的评估流程。
要问的关键问题是：
・提供商能够实施定期的入侵检测以及用户可以看到的内部和外部安全审计吗?
・允许用户实施自己的安全漏洞测试吗?
・数据是按用户进行逻辑分区或者加密的吗?这样当进行法庭调查时，一个客户的数据就不会无意间和其他客户的数据相混淆。
・一旦发生数据丢失，提供商能够逐个客户地恢复数据吗?
・知识产权如何得到保护?
・提供商是否标记每个客户使用的虚拟服务器和物理服务器?提供商是否能够保证按照某些国家的数据存储法律把数据仅仅存储在某些国家?
・提供商对于回应政府要求得到客户数据的政策是什么?
・提供商保留客户数据的政策是什么，提供商是否能够执行客户从提供商网络上删除数据的政策?
・提供商盘点自己的资产及其供应商关系吗?
・提供商针对自己和客户的安全控制策略对员工进行培训和提供培训文档吗?
询问提供商的其它关心的问题还有提供商是否监视和控制用户的访问权，安全事件响应的性质和范围是什么，包括提供商和客户的责任。
云计算安全联盟说，虽然问题列表还在不断补充中，但是，它的关键是给用户提供了一个对提供商的很好的评估方法，给云计算提供商提供了一个回应客户合理关切的可管理形式。
一些用户主张与较小的云计算服务提供商签订合同，因为他们能够提供对其基础设施和流程的更直接的了解，以保证达到所需的服务水平。美国高尔夫协会IT经理Jessica Carroll说，实地了解是值得的。美国高尔夫协会就因为这些原因选择了一家小型云计算提供商。他说，你了解合同中实际存在的一切，因为你已经看到了它们。（胡杨编译）

Danskar rekordnegativa till euron

description.hltext_display: 格雷米奥对于引进罗纳尔迪尼奥表示“乐观”
description.content: 桑普多利亚前锋卡萨诺转会AC米兰一事已经八九不离十，这同时也意味着巴西球星罗纳尔迪尼奥很可能会在冬季转会期离开AC米兰，而巴西国内俱乐部� �雷米奥很有希望说服他� 盟。 卡萨诺未� 盟前，AC米兰主教练阿莱� �里就已经将罗纳尔迪尼奥放在了替补席上。一旦场上位置与巴西人很相似的卡萨诺� 盟，罗纳尔迪尼奥的出场时间就更难保证。考虑到他与AC米兰的合同在赛季结束后就要到期，而且他与卡萨诺都拿着年薪不菲的合同，红黑军团会考虑在1月份就将他出售。 AC米兰主席贝卢斯科尼周一接受采访时也态度大变，他认为罗纳尔迪尼奥的表现应该更好一些，训练中叶应该更� 刻苦。贝卢斯科尼一向是罗纳尔迪尼奥最大的支持者，他态度的变化意味着罗纳尔迪尼奥在米兰的日子不会太长。 与此同时，� �雷米奥俱乐部主席奥多内则明确表示计划引进30岁的罗纳尔迪尼奥，并且对实现转会很有信心。 我很乐观。我们有希望将罗纳尔迪尼奥带回� �雷米奥。奥多内接受巴西媒体采访时表示。 不过，在1月份之前我们什么也不能做。我们要等待罗纳尔迪尼奥首先解决他与米兰之间的问题，然后我们就会开始行动。(Goal.com)更多内容安东尼尼：卡萨诺在米兰不会惹麻烦贝总确认米兰将签卡萨诺 年前飞迪拜与新队友会合� �雷米奥主席声称已经与小罗开始谈判 卡萨诺即将� 盟AC米兰意味着罗纳尔迪尼奥告别红黑军团的日子也已经为期不远……

description.hltext_display: Daisies grow even in the winter
description.content:
The newly formed kindergarten Woodmont Daisy Troop 4537 is off to a great start. The girls earned their Blue Daisy Center patch in their first meeting by learning the Girl Scout Promise. During the troop's second meeting, the girls visited Conklin Farm U-Pick in Montville, where they went on hay rides and picked pumpkins. In addition, they learned about all the various types of pumpkins and how they grow. At their November meeting, the girls earned their light green petal, Considerate and Caring. Each girl donated and decorated their personal bag for the Kiwanis food pantry in Montville.
PHOTO COURTESY OF LORI GALLUCCI

description.hltext_display: Mahindra Thar Relaunch For 5.97 Lakhs
description.content: Mahindra Thar relaunch is to happen soon. Mahindra Thar, the Commander Jeep to be relaunched for 5.97 lakhs.After nearly a decade , Mahindra&Mahindras Commander Jeep is coming again but under new platform with a new name, the 4 x 4 Thar CRDe. Mahindra Thar India is to be commercially marketed by Mahindra and Mahindra for Rs5.99 lakhs in Delhi while it will be Rs6.01 lakh in Bangalore, Rs6.28 lakhs in Mumbai, Rs5.97 in Thane. The Mahindra Thar DI BS III version is Rs4.47 lakhs and the company is launching the vehicle in Chandigarh, Bangalore, Delhi, Jaipur and Mangalore during December and in the other parts during the new year, said its Chief Executive. Mahindra and Mahindra has been marketing this vehicle in the markets of South Africa for the past two years at Rs9.5 Rs10 lakhs. M&M is setting the ball roll in the semi-urban and rural markets, after analyzing the feasibility for marketing the vehicle in India, he said.Mahindra Thar 4 x 4 off-roaders are preferred for the mongers who like re-defined structure and new style. M&M has already invested Rs5 crore for this modification while the vehicle is to be delivered through 200 dealers spread across the country. To meet the demands from the buyers who long for different style, adventure in driving and entertainment which Mahindra Thar India is expected to fulfill. M&M believes that Thar will make a new terrain in the Indian auto industry as it comes as the refined form of the global Commander Jeep (CJ5). The vehicle is fitted with improved suspensions and refined characters; it enables better ground clearance even for tough roads; it gets the power from a 2.5 lit CRDi diesel engine. The power output is 77kw (105bhp) driven by wire technology adopting to different level of speed and acceleration. The chassis is tough ladder frame oriented for easy handling; there is the latest suspension of IFS aided by resistant rear leaf of springs for proper balance, said its Chief Executive. The base variant of Thar is coming with a DI engine to be positioned as a common lifestyle vehicle suitable for rural market. It has the option of 2 / 4 wheel drive. M&Ms other range of vehicles include Bolero, Scorpio, Xylo.

event_or_fact.property: M&M is setting the ball roll in the semi-urban and rural markets, after analyzing the feasibility for marketing the vehicle in India

description.hltext_display: Turismo: quem gasta mais, o brasileiro ou o estrangeiro?
description.author: Ricardo Noblat
description.content:
Gasto líquido de turista brasileiro no exterior chega a quase US$ 1 bi e ajuda a elevar déficit em transações correntes de novembro
Patrícia Duarte, O Globo
Os turistas brasileiros em viagem ao exterior gastaram quase um US$ 1 bilhão a mais do que os estrangeiros em visita ao Brasil. Os gastos líquidos dos brasileiros em novembro chegaram a US$ 955 milhões, quase o dobro da cifra vista em novembro de 2009, de US$ 514 milhões, informou o Banco Central (BC).
A cifra ajudou a fazer com que o saldo em transações correntes do país (resultado de todas as operações do país com outros países) fechasse novembro negativo em US$ 4,696 bilhões, acumulando no ano déficit de US$ 43,459 bilhões.
Mais uma vez, o resultado foi puxado pelas remessas de lucros e dividendos que multinacionais instaladas no Brasil fazem para suas matrizes que, no mês passado, somaram US$ 1,949 bilhão, chegando no acumulado do ano a US$ 25,031 bilhões, cerca de US$ 6 bilhões a mais do que igual período de 2009 (US$ 19,892 bilhões).
Já os pagamentos com juros ficaram em US$ 558 milhões no mês passado, enquanto que a balança comercial registou pequeno superávit de US$ 312 milhões no período.
O rombo nas contas externas no último mês não foi compensado pelos Investimentos Estrangeiros Diretos (IED), que somaram US$ 3,732 bilhões.
O BC informou ainda que os investimentos externos em papéis domésticos e em ações, também em novembro, somaram US$ 1,965 bilhão.

description.hltext_display: Members of Boy Scout Troop 113, sponsored by St. Clement Church, recently collected food for donation to area food banks. More than 100 items were donated by the Scouts in hopes that ...
description.content:
Members of Boy Scout Troop 113, sponsored by St. Clement Church, recently collected food for donation to area food banks. More than 100 items were donated by the Scouts in hopes that families in need would enjoy their Thanksgiving dinner. Troop 113 meets Wednesday evenings at St. Clement Church hall, lead by Senior Patrol Leader Andy Seraphin, Assistant Senior Patrol Leader James Onorevole and Scoutmaster Rick Weber.
PHOTO COURTESY RICHARD M ONOREVOLE

description.hltext_display: 加里多斥责球队国王杯犯错太多 “潜水艇”俨然沦为“蝙蝠”玩偶
description.content: 西班牙国王杯首回合于北京时间今天凌晨战罢，瓦伦西亚和比利亚雷亚尔0-0握手言和，黄色潜水艇的主帅� 里多认为自己的球队在本场比赛中犯错太多。 赛后接受《马卡报》的采访时，� 里多表示自己的球队犯错太多，并形容球员在场上的表现如同对手的玩偶，瓦伦西亚球员的带球给我们制� 了大麻烦，我们在� 球上的失误太多了。我们所犯的错误证明对手在比赛中比我们表现出色。 从外人的眼光来看，我们在场上就好像对手手中的玩偶，我们尽力做自己认为正确的事，但是最终我们付出了沉重的代价。 次回合很快也将到来，那场比赛的每一分钟都将决定最终的结果。两支球队都有晋级的机会，但是晋级的第一步就是要取得进球。(Goal.com) 阅读更多...Goal.com 已经全面升级比分直播系统！了解比赛数据、资料、更多实时比分，点击进入Goal.com 比分直播系统！ 比利亚雷亚尔在国王杯中与瓦伦西亚战成平局，� 里多对比赛的结果和过程都表现很不满意......

description.hltext_display: CNPV wird wichtigster chinesischer Zulieferer von Donauer Solartechnik =
description.content: (ots/PRNewswire) -- CNPV Solar Power SA, eine öffentliche, nach luxemburgischem Recht gegründete Kapitalgesellschaft und ein führender integrierter Hersteller von Photovoltaikprodukten, gab heute den Abschluss eines langfristigen Partnerschaftsabkommens mit der Donauer Solartechnik Vertriebs GmbH bekannt. Donauer, ein Unternehmen mit über 15 Jahren Erfahrung auf dem Sektor der erneuerbaren Energien, entwickelt Projekte und vertreibt Produkte im Bereich von Photovoltaik und Solarthermie. ~ (Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20081103/CNM010LOGO) (Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20101221/CN20209) http://www.cnpv-power.com Informationen über Donauer Solartechnik Vertriebs GmbH Donauer Solartechnik ist einer der führenden deutschen Grosshändler im Bereich der Solarenergie. Das 1995 gegründete Unternehmen beschäftigt derzeit rund 200 Mitarbeiter in ganz Europa. Sein erfahrenes Team plant Systeme für Wohnhäuser und Grossprojekte. Unter dem Markennamen INTERSOL vertreibt Donauer selbst entwickelte Montagesysteme und Produkte aus dem Bereich der Solarthermie. Langfristige Planung und effizienzorientierte Umsetzung sind neben zertifizierten Qualitätsprodukten die Grundlage für die Ausführung von Off-Grid-Systemen. Der Name Donauer steht für langlebige Produkte, kompetenten Service und leidenschaftliches Engagement für die Gestaltung der Energietechnik der Zukunft. Das in Deutschland ansässige Unternehmen liefert seine hochwertigen Solarenergie-Systemkomponenten in mehr als 40 Länder. Donauer Solartechnik unterhält Niederlassungen und Vertriebsbüros in Portugal, Italien, Frankreich, der Tschechischen Republik, Belgien und Grossbritannien. Weitere Informationen finden Sie auf der Website von Donauer auf http://www.donauer.eu Für weitere Informationen wenden Sie sich bitte an: CNPV Solar Power SA B. Veerraju Chaudary, COO und Boardmitglied Tel.: +86-13656-473355 E-Mail: chaudary@cnpv-power.com Donauer Solartechnik Vertriebs GmbH Carl Freudhöfer, CPO Zeppelinstr. 10, D-82205 Gilching, Deutschland Tel.: +49-81057725344 Fax: +49-81057725116 E-Mail: info@donauer.eu *** OTS-ORIGINALTEXT PRESSEAUSSENDUNG UNTER AUSSCHLIESSLICHER INHALTLICHER VERANTWORTUNG DES AUSSENDERS - WWW.OTS.AT *** OTS0030 2010-12-22/09:32 220932 Dez 10 PRN0005 0577

description.hltext_display: Sarah's Key
description.content:
THE unspeakable horrors inflicted on the Jewish people during WWII have manifested themselves in many films over the years - to the extent that the Holocaust narrative has almost become a genre all of its own.
Steven Spielberg's epic Schindler's List remains among the greatest, but each year delivers another in the sequence.
It's a story that needs to be repeatedly told because this horrendous historic event has, tragically, repeated itself over the course of the 20th Century - and still into the 21st Century - with almost copycat genocide committed in the Balkans, Cambodia, Rwanda and Darfur. , adapted from the best-selling novel by American-born journalist Julia Jarmond, is the latest of the Holocaust offerings and it absolutely eclipses others this reviewer recalls from the past couple of years -The Reader, Un Secret et al.
This has Oscar written all over it. The production design is impeccable; the editing of the parallel period narratives tight without being contrived; the acting - in a word - wow.
Kristin Scott Thomas plays Julia Jarmond, an American journalist married to a Frenchman, who is investigating a story for a magazine about the notorious Vel d'hiv round-up in Paris in 1942, in which thousands of Jewish families were deported.
As part of her research, Julia learns a shocking secret - that the apartment her husband is renovating was acquired by his grandparents when its Jewish occupants were dispossessed 60 years earlier.
This unearths painful truths about the family Julia has married into, the country she has adopted as her own, and the torment endured by little Sarah, which we discover via continuous period shifts.
The consummate Scott Thomas lights up the screen and infuses Julia with her usual beauty, grace, poise and intellect with a nuanced, yet incredibly powerful performance.
But she is possibly outdone by an even more staggering turn from 10-year-old Melusine Mayance, as Sarah.
Comparisons to the prodigious Dakota Fanning are inevitable - such is the calibre of this most commanding of performances.
And if Oscars were handed to casting agents, then whoever sought out Mayance should be prized one.
But transcending all that is a most beautifully executed and told story of personal and cultural identity, resilience and the quest for the truth, leaving us feeling the full force of every conceivable human emotion.
SARAH'S Key (M)
Directed by: Gilles Paquet-Brenner
Starring: Kristin Scott Thomas, Melusine Mayance

description.hltext_display: Хоккеист "Вашингтона" поцеловал партнера на скамейке запасных
description.content:
Запись гола и поцелуя Гордона выложена на сайте НХЛ. Для нападающего "Кэпиталс" эта шайба стала первой в сезоне. Позднее он отдал результативную передачу, которая также стала для него первой. Всего в регулярном чемпионате сезона-2010/11 он сыграл пять матчей.
Матч "Вашингтон" - "Нью-Джерси" состоялся в ночь на 22 декабря в столице США и завершился победой "Кэпиталс" со счетом 5:1. "Вашингтон" лидирует в Юго-восточном дивизионе, а в турнирной таблице Восточной конференции идет вторым. "Девилс" занимает предпоследнее место в конференции и во всей НХЛ.

description.hltext_display: Fort Ann's big test
description.content:
Fort Ann’s biggest test of the season heads to town Wednesday night. The reigning Section II champs, the Argyle Scots, are fresh off their 73-65 win over Lake George where Jacquelyn Miller scored a career-high 33 points. Miller is averaging 23.5 points per game so far. The Cardinals have gotten solid production from Kayla Bancroft and Katie White who are both averaging 12.8 points a game.
JV game kicks off 6 p.m. and I will be there.
HEADS UP: I will be tweeting from the Argyle vs. Fort Ann game Wednesday night. You can find me @alicialuvsports.
Before the start of the season, Schuylerville head coach Jim DeGregory said he wanted his team to rely on solid defense and good ball movement. The Black Horses have done just and are currently undefeated at 4-0. Schuylerville has held its opponents to an average of 31 points per game. The most points the Black Horses’ have given up came on Dec. 10 when Stillwater scored 39 points.
Offensively, Schuylerville has been led by the production Katelyn Fane’s15.2 points per game and Courtney Pierce’s 12.2 points per game. Schuylerville is currently tied for first in the Wasaren League with Hoosic Valley.
Cambridge bounced back from its 64-51 loss to Tamarac with a non-league 64-48 win over Arlington Tuesday night. The Indians are 3-2 overall but have three players averaging double figures: Sara Tironi (17.4 points per game), Molly Lauver (14 points per game) and Alexis Case (12 points per game).
For a complete roundup of Tuesday night’s game, click here.
OUT OF AREA GLANCE
Watervliet 54, Ichabod Crane 25: LaShana Tolliver scored 14 points in the win. Ichabod Crane’s Alicia Razanowsky had eight points.
Maple Hill 55, Hudson 12: Sierra Legge led Maple Hill with 14 points and four assists. Aubrey Racz chipped in with 13 points and four rebounds. Hudson’s Cortlyn Jepsen had four points.
*(Maple Hill leading scorer Katie Roth was not in the scoring summary).
- Alicia
About the author: I can be reached at ajohnson@poststar.com

description.hltext_display: Opnieuw sneeuw op komst
description.content: Woensdagmiddag is het somber en mistig, maar het blijft overwegend droog. Er waait een zwakke noordoostenwind en de middagtemperatuur schommelt rond 1 graad. Woensdagavond valt er lichte sneeuw of aanvriezende regen over de zuidoostelijke helft van het land. Woensdagnacht sneeuwt het op vele plaatsen behalve in een strook dicht bij de kust. In de zuidoostelijke landshelft valt de neerslag enige tijd onder de vorm van aanvriezende regen. Bij temperaturen van rond of net onder het vriespunt kan het dus glad worden op de weg. Donderdag is het zwaarbewolkt met af en toe sneeuw. Aan zee en in het westen valt weinig neerslag. Ten zuiden van de Ardennen valt eerst nog aanvriezende regen die nadien overgaat in sneeuw. Er waait een matige, aan de kust een krachtige noordoostenwind. De middagtemperatuur schommelt rond het vriespunt. Vrijdag is het zwaarbewolkt met lichte sneeuwval. Er waait een gure noordoostenwind bij een middagtemperatuur rond het vriespunt. Op beide kerstdagen en ook begin volgende week is het droog met opklaringen en wolkenvelden. Overdag vriest het licht en 's nachts komt matige, plaatselijk strenge vorst voor.

description.hltext_display: 'World's first' glasses-free 3D TV hits Japan stores
description.content:
Curious shoppers stopped to test out the screen at an electronics store in central Tokyo as the 12-inch model of Regza GL1 Series went on sale.
The new model with a liquid crystal display carries a price tag of 119,800 yen (1,400 US dollars). A 20-inch model will be released on Saturday.
The new 3D TV does not require users to wear special glasses, whereas other 3D-capable models require glasses that act as filters to separate images to each eye to create the illusion of depth.
Toshiba's screens use processing technology to create depth-filled images and the Regza GL1 Series allow users to switch between 2D and 3D on normal TV programmes.
Kazuhito Gunji, a public relations official at electronics retailer Bic Camera, said the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product.
Electronics stores are hoping that the release of the latest technology will help offset declining sales as government incentives for purchasing environment-friendly home appliances were reduced this month.
The hugely competitive TV sector is a challenge for many electronics makers given that customers are increasingly accustomed to declining prices, making it difficult for the industry to generate profits.
Sony on Monday said it may fall short of its sales goal of 25 million liquid crystal display TV sets this fiscal year as it struggles to be profitable in the sector, and has also embraced 3D TV technology.
Most shoppers were curious but also cautious about the new device on Wednesday, however.
"I want to watch on a big screen," said a 47-year-old man who has a 37-inch TV at home. "I'll wait for another year before buying," he said.
Another customer, 33, said: "It's great that we don't have to wear glasses, which is a nuisance."
"But I didn't feel images were flying out of the screen on some programmes," he added.
Toshiba says images on the 12-inch screen are best viewed from the front and some 65 centimetres (26 inches) away.
"Customers currently think of 3D images as just an add-on function... but 3D is expected to become a standard eventually" with 3D films and video titles increasing, said Toshiba sales official Eiichi Matsuzawa.
Rival Sharp earlier this year unveiled a small glasses-free LCD touchscreen that shows 3D images for use in mobile phones, digital cameras and games consoles such as Nintendo's 3DS, to be released in Japan in February 2011.

description.hltext_display: 汪小菲游说导演 禁老婆大S卖肉
Is Zac Efron's "The Lucky One" Taylor?
description.content: Is Zac Efron Dating Taylor Schilling? Well, that can't be completely ruled out as the two stars are coming together on the set of The Lucky One and, may be, there can be something between the two. The world is waiting to see Zac Efron's new girlfriend as the star has just split with his long term girl friend Vanessa Hudgens. 26-yr-old Taylor Schilling, who is popularly known for her TV show Mercy, has clicked some latest pictures without Zac Efron? But the speculations report that the relationship between the two may be just quick on set flirt. If one can recall, Zac Efron had also met Vanessa on the set of High School Musical. So while this is possible then why not with Taylor Schilling who is older to Zac, as older women dating young boys is quite common in Hollywood. Is Schilling the reason behind the Hudgens-Efron breakup? What will happen to Nikki Blonsky? Well, these questions can be answered by Zac Efron Himself. All that we can do is to simply wait and watch.

description.hltext_display: Delicious no cierra, afirma Yahoo!
description.content:
SIN EMBARGO, LA EMPRESA ANALIZA OPCIONES PARA QUE FUNCIONE MEJOR EL SITIO DE INTERCAMBIOS DE LINKS, ENTRE LOS QUE SE ENCUENTRA SU SALIDA
Los temores de miles de usuarios sobre el futuro de Delicious hizo que Yahoo! saliera al paso y a través de un comunicado en su blog dejó en claro que el sitio no cierra y que, por el contrario, está analizando formas para mejorarlo.
"No, no estamos cerrando Delicious", menciona el mensaje, el cual agrega que se están analizando estrategias para ver cómo puede funcionar mejor Delicious, una de las cuales sería que el sitio saliera de la empresa para poder crecer, por lo que ven opciones.
"No hay razón para el pánico. Estamos manteniendo Delicious y le exhortamos a seguir utilizándolo. Dicho esto, tenemos las opciones de exportación, si así lo desea. Además, muchos servicios ofrecen la posibilidad de importar enlaces Delicious y etiquetas", informa.
Lamenta la información que se ha generado sobre el cierre y las afectaciones que en miles de usuarios provocó el rumor, pero asegura que la página sigue viva.
El jueves salió información en el sentido de que durante los próximos meses, Yahoo! tenía contemplado cerrar el popular servicio de intercambio de links y gestión de marcadores sociales en web como parte de su reestructuración y despido de 600 trabajadores.

description.hltext_display: Troop 113 donates to food banks
description.content:
Members of Boy Scout Troop 113, sponsored by St. Clement Church, recently collected food for donation to area food banks. More than 100 items were donated by the Scouts in hopes that families in need would enjoy their Thanksgiving dinner. Troop 113 meets Wednesday evenings at St. Clement Church hall, lead by Senior Patrol Leader Andy Seraphin, Assistant Senior Patrol Leader James Onorevole and Scoutmaster Rick Weber.
PHOTO COURTESY RICHARD M ONOREVOLE

description.hltext_display: Press Releases: Announcement of New Iraqi Government
High School Boys Basketball: Spartans fall to Cobblers
description.content:
Central High School's Bryce Johnson (13) gets fouled by Spearfish High School's Chayce Hall (15) during a basketball game at CHS on Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. (Ryan Soderlin/Journal staff)
Loading…
Mike Purcell knows that part of the Rapid City Central boys’ learning process involves plenty of players getting their feet wet.
He’s certainly smiling after the deluge of involvement from his growing basketball squad on Tuesday night.
Of the 13 Cobblers who played against Spearfish, 11 found the scoring column, and Central raced out to an 18-2 lead after the first quarter before coasting to a 58-31 victory over the winless Spartans at Naasz Gymnasium in a Greater Dakota Conference game.
The points were sprinkled evenly amongst the Cobblers, as senior guard Bryce Johnson led the Central effort with 11 points. Cody Harris and Robert Connot each added eight points, while Mike Norberg and Tyler Aquallo chipped in with six apiece.
“It’s more of a threat to other teams if they don’t have to stop just one guy,” Johnson said. “They have to stop the team, which is tougher for them and will make us more competitive and stronger in the end.”
Many of the Cobblers’ early baskets came in the paint, as Connot and Harris were able to easily maneuver inside for quality looks. Central’s two
3-pointers in the first quarter — one each for Aquallo and Johnson — both came on kick-outs after drives or offensive rebounds inside.
“What we’re really trying to develop is inside-out (play),” Purcell said. “It doesn’t matter if it’s a cutter. It doesn’t matter if it’s somebody flashing in from the back side, a backside post, a backside wing or an established post on the inside. We want to look inside-out.”
The Spartans’ primary charge came in the second quarter when a spurt of three 3-pointers from Monte Meyerink helped bring Spearfish (0-3, 0-3) within 24-16. The Cobbler offense went into a funk late in the first half, but Spearfish missed three chances to further cut into the deficit, committing two of their 27 turnovers in that stretch. Central then bumped the lead back to 10 at the half.
“Our skill at all positions is our weakness,” Spearfish coach Erik Skoglund said. “We do not question our heart. We do not question our work ethic. We just have to work on our skill, and our shooting percentage will rise and we’ll stay in more of these ballgames.”
Spearfish’s biggest bright spot came when forward Jay Darling slammed home the ball on a drive from the left wing to bring the Spartans within 33-22 with 1:45 left in the third quarter. But Purcell called a timeout, and the Cobblers quickly regained their early 16-point advantage on a 3-point play by Harris and a lay-in from Norberg.
Despite 23 turnovers of their own, the Cobblers (2-3, 1-2) led 38-22 after three quarters and breezed through the fourth to their second consecutive win.
Meyerink led Spearfish with 10 points, and Ryan Tollefsrud added nine. The Spartans will play St. Thomas More at Black Hills State University on Monday.
Central, which shot 48 percent from the field, is off until a home game against Pierre on Dec. 30.

description.hltext_display: AUVIX представляет новую линейку проекторов NEC серии М: М260Х,M300X,M260W,M300W,M350X и M420X
description.content:
| Компания NEC Display Solutions представила на рынок серию офисных проекторов М. В новую серию входят модели М230Х – рекомендованная розничная цена $770, М260Х - $960, M300X - $1200, M260W - $1040, M300W - $1290, M350X - $1440 и M420X. Все новинки доступны для заказа в за исключением проектора M420X, поставки которого в Россию начнутся в марте 2011 года.
Основным достоинством серии являются инновационные экологические функции и возможность автоматического перевода в эко-режим. К экологическим инновациям, прежде всего, следует отнести функцию снижения энергопотребления 75% AV Mute, благодаря которой пользователь с легкостью может переводить проектор в экономичный режим, прикрывая крышку объектива либо нажимая зеленую кнопку на пульте дистанционного управления, что существенно снижает общее энергопотребление проектора и увеличивает срок службы лампы. Функция автоматического перехода в эко-режим обеспечивает регулирование яркости лампы в соответствии с характером отображаемого контента, что дает возможность в любой момент времени поддерживать оптимальную яркость и максимальную энергоэффективность. Сочетание этих двух выдающихся характеристик и увеличенного ресурса лампы (до 6000 часов) позволяет существенно снизить совокупную стоимость владения продуктом.
Проекторы серии M имеют яркость от 2600 до 4200 ANSI лм, разрешение XGA и WXGA и контрастность 2000:1. Чтобы пользователям было проще идентифицировать соответствующие продукты, NEC Display Solutions разработала новую концепцию обозначений, которая будет распространена на весь модельный ряд проекторов. Так, например, обозначение "M260X" относится к мультимедийному проектору серии M ("M"), с яркостью 2600 ANSI-люменов ("26"), с разрешением XGA ("X"), в обозначении “M260W” к такому же проектору, но с разрешением WXGA.
Новые проекторы серии M с уровнем яркости до 3500 ANSI люмен имеют сертификат TCO, выданной шведской организацией TCO Development по результат тестирования продуктов. Программа сертификации TCO долгое время применяется для оценки качества изображения и воздействия на окружающую среду, поэтому она является полезным и заслуживающим доверия инструментом для покупателей, которые желают приобрести продукт с высокими рабочими характеристиками и минимальным негативным воздействием на экологию.
Все модели поддерживают большое оптическое увеличение – до 1,7 раза. Это обеспечивает значительную гибкость при установке проектора и позволяет сократить расходы на замену старого оборудования, поскольку можно использовать существующие потолочные крепления.
Проекторы серии M также имеют расширенные возможности подключения благодаря входу HDMI и трем перспективным портам USB. Порт USB Type B дает возможность пользователю установить прямое и современное соединение с любым ПК и осуществлять управление с помощью мыши или, например, проводить презентацию с использованием пульта дистанционного управления. Два порта USB Type A позволяют подсоединять накопитель USB для просмотра изображений непосредственно с проектора, а также подключать опциональный адаптер беспроводной локальной сети (WLAN), что повышает гибкость использования проектора в любой рабочей среде.
Новые модели серии M обладают всеми преимуществами, присущими их предшественникам. Среди них функция непосредственного включения питания, автоматическая коррекция вертикальных трапецеидальных искажений, а также уникальный счетчик выбросов углекислого газа (пересчет по количеству потребляемой энергии). Это позволяет пользователям выбирать такой проектор, который наилучшим образом отвечает их потребностям и обеспечивает гибкие возможности установки.

description.hltext_display: Why Does Santa Claus Wear Red?
description.content: Why does Santa Claus wear red? Well it is an intriguing question especially during Christmas. A beautiful Christmas story unveils, to reveal the truth. Perhaps you could answer your child when you are questioned.It is a known fact that Saint Nicholas came to be known as Santa Claus. Squire Kenson, the richest man in the village once visited Saint Nicholas to place an order to have a new chest of drawers made. He rode on a shiny red sleigh, with silver bells tinkling, drawn by rein deers. Saint Nicholas took an instant liking to Squire Kenson's arrived. Further more he could not hold his gaze which strayed over the red robe, made of red deerskin with soft white ermine fur around the collar and cuffs. The next day Saint Nicholas made his way to Mrs Arpen, a widow and a dress maker in the village and described his longing for a red suit like Squire Kenson's. However he confessed that he cannot afford a deer skin. Mrs Arpen came with an alternative that she would have the weaver weave the required cloth and have it dyed in red for the suit and rabbit skin for the collars and cuffs.St Nicholas could not contain his joy when he saw his desired red robe. However it turned out to be big. He comforted the disappointed MrsArpen, that he would grow big enough to fit into it perfectly.Soon the villagers got used to Saint Nicholas wearing his red robe. With time, he even grew big with his chest filled out, and tummy popping out, and cheeks puffing up, to fit perfectly into his lovely red robe.So you could answer your child, with this little story about Santa Claus' outfit, when he asks, Why does Santa Claus wear red?It is also said that Santa Claus was first depicted in green and purple robes. The modern version of Santa Claus wearing red was first caricatured by Thomas Nast, a German born American caricaturist and cartoonist. Coco Cola then used Santa Claus in red as a marketing tool. Thus the Christmas story behind Santa Claus outfit and the answer for the intriguing question, Why does Santa Claus wear red?

description.hltext_display: 历届金童今何在：梅西鲁尼挑大梁 范法重头再来
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
2010年12月22日16:08 来源：搜狐体育
作者：马志尼
我来说两句(0)
巴洛特利当选2010年欧洲金童奖，并因为那番“除了梅西谁都不如我”的狂言成为历史上最狂妄的“金童”。要知道，在过去7届金童奖获得者中，不乏鲁尼、梅西和法布雷加斯这样如今的超级巨星，可是当初也没有谁敢放出如此厥词。不妨回顾一下历届金童奖得主，比较一下谁更有资格自称天下无敌。
第一届 2003年 范德法特 目前效力球队：托特纳姆热刺
即使在盛产神童的荷兰，范德法特也是出类拔萃的那个，出身阿贾克斯青训营这样的名门，17岁初登荷甲就攻入7球，并在2002/03赛季打入20球！正是凭借这样的惊人表现，20岁的范德法特赢得了第一届欧洲金童奖。
不过此后的职业生涯范德法特经历了一些坎坷，在阿贾克斯和汉堡范德法特持续成长，但转会皇马后，范德法特却遇到了瓶颈，甚至连主力位置都无法保证，并最终在今年夏天投奔英超的托特纳姆热刺队。

description.hltext_display: Британец решил жениться на рождественской елке
description.content:
Житель Германии женился на своей кошке
Житель британского графства Уилтшир решил жениться на рождественской елке, пишет The Sun. По словам 47-летнего Энди Парка, он любит свое праздничное дерево больше всего на свете.
"Я слышал, что люди женятся на своих домашних животных, так почему же я не могу жениться на елке?", - заметил Парк. Мужчина заявил, что уже приобрел для своего дерева обручальное кольцо. "Правда, я пока не знаю, на какую ветку я его надену", - заявил британец.
Энди Парк сообщил, что намерен организовать традиционную церемонию бракосочетания. Единственной серьезной трудностью, как он считает, станет поиск священника, который согласится провести свадебный обряд.
Примечательно, что Парк давно увлекается рождественской темой и отмечает этот праздник ежедневно уже в течение 17 лет. Мужчина рассказал, что начал праздновать Рождество в июле 1993 года, когда ему было грустно и скучно, и он решил себя взбодрить.
Ссылки по теме
- Man to wed his Christmas tree - The Sun, 21.12.10
- Австралиец женился на своей собаке – Lenta.ru, 03.12.2010
- Немец женился на своей кошке – Lenta.ru, 04.05.2010

description.hltext_display: В Мексике число жертв взрыва на нефтепроводе возросло до 29-и
description.content: В Мексике число жертв взрыве на нефтепроводе возросло до 29-и. Власти штата Пуэбла, где это произошло, заявили, что спасатели обнаружили останки маленького ребенка. 52 человека были ранены, разрушены 115 домов. Взрыв произошел в воскресенье в городе Тексмелукан, когда злоумышленники хотели незаконно откачать топливо и трубопровода.

description.hltext_display: Beras Thailand Akan Guyur Jakarta
description.content:
Laporan wartawan KOMPAS Orin Basuki
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010 | 15:06 WIB
KOMPAS/LASTI KURNIA
Ilustrasi
TERKAIT:
JAKARTA, KOMPAS.com - Dalam satu hingga dua minggu ke depan DKI Jakarta akan diguyur beras berkualitas premium hasil impor dari Thailand sebanyak 100.000 ton. Masuknya beras ini diharapkan akan meredam kenaikan harga beras yang terjadi dalam beberapa hari terakhir ini dan mencegah kenaikan di beberapa bulan ke depan.
"Minggu depan, beras Thailand dengan tingkat broken (bulir pecah) 5 persen (atau tergolong beras kualitas premium) akan masuk ke Jakarta," tegas Wakil Menteri Pertanian Bayu Krinamurthi di Jakarta, Rabu (22/12/2010).
Ini merupakan salah satu bagian dari kesepakatan yang telah diambil dalam Rapat Koordinasi Ketahanan Pangan yang dipimpin Menteri Koordinator Perekonomian Hatta Rajasa yang dilaksanakan Rabu pagi. Hadir juga dalam rapat tersebut antara lain Menteri Perdagangan Mari Elka Pangestu.
Menurut Bayu, beras ini akan digunakan untuk operasi pasar khusus di Jakarta. Dengan cara ini, kenaikan harga beras yang terjadi selama beberapa waktu terakhir ini akan dapat diredam sesegera mungkin.
"Selain digunakan untuk operasi pasar di Jakarta, beras ini juga bisa digunakan untuk pasar di daerah-daerah yang mengalami kenaikan harga beras hingga lima persen. Terutama di daerah Indonesia wilayah barat, seperti Sumatera dan Kalimantan. Dengan cara ini, kami dapat meredam harga," ungkapnya.
Dalam satu hingga tiga minggu terakhir ini, harga beras di Jakarta memang sudah mulai menurun Rp 200-Rp 300 per kilogram. Atas dasar itu, pemerintah memerintahkan Perum Bulog untuk memberikan beras premium kepada pedagang beras yang memang membutuhkan dan kekurangan pasokan.
"Bulog harus menurunkan harganya, sekitar Rp 200-Rp 300 lebih rendah dibandingkan harga sejenis di pasar. Dengan cara ini, harga tebus (oleh pedagang saat membeli ke Bulog) kami perkirakan akan ada di kisaran Rp 6.250-Rp 6.300 per kilogram," ujar Bayu.

description.hltext_display: 翻訳者名で買う本決めます！これって、私だけ？？
description.content: アメリカでMBAを取得したこともあり、ビジネス関連の翻訳本をよく買う。普通の人と違うところは、著者名やタイトルではなく、翻訳者名で買うところだ。 たとえば勝間和代さんの新刊なら難でも購入するという著者名で買う人は多いと思うが、翻訳者名で買う人はいない・・・と思う。仕事柄・・・と言えなくもないような。しかしながら、そんなに悪くない買い方だと思っている。 ＜理由＞その１：私と著者のバックグラウンドには...

description.hltext_display: Rafa, de invitado a anfitrión
description.content:
Tenis El suizo Roger Federer ejerció ayer de perfecto anfitrión en Zurich con Rafa Nadal igual que el nº 1 agasajará hoy al nº 2 en Madrid, donde ambos disputarán esta tarde en la Caja Mágica (19.00 h/La1) su segundo partido benéfico consecutivo. Como dos amigos más, Roger fue a recoger ayer a Rafa al aeropuerto en un flamante Mercedes rojo y por la noche disputaron en el Hallenstadion de Zurich su primer encuentro solidario para recaudar fondos para sus fundaciones, centradas en la ayuda a los niños necesitados: unos 800.000 euros.
Era lo de menos, pero, tal como sugería el guión, Federer se impuso ayer en su casa (4-6, 6-3, 6-3) igual que la lógica indica que Nadal será esta tarde el vencedor. En sus 22 duelos profesionales, el balear domina (14-8) al suizo. Serios, tensos y concentrados en sus cruces en el circuito, Nadal y Federer jugaron ayer relajados y distendidos sobre una pista dura, tal como invitaba su solidaria iniciativa. Un pabellón abarrotado con 10.000 personas recibió en pie a ambos tenistas entre luces de colores, nubes de humo y aplausos, todo previo al encuentro.
Hoy repetirán experiencia en Madrid. Nadal, Federer y Ana María Parera, madre del balear y presidenta de su fundación, darán una rueda de prensa (11.30 h) en Torrespaña. Ya en la Caja Mágica, a las 16.00 h, Rafa y Roger impartirán un clinic para niños, David Bisbal ofrecerá un concierto a las 18.00 h y, una hora después, empezará el partido benéfico. La cena de gala (21.00 h), en la que cantará Julio Iglesias, cerrará la jornada en la Galería de Cristal del Palacio de Cibeles.
Mejor de lo esperado
"Ganar en Australia sería una gran ilusión, pero sé que si no llego bien preparado física y tenísticamente será imposible", afirmó Nadal en una entrevista con 'Eurosport'. Si lo logra, tendría en posesión los cuatro Grand Slams, ya que este año enlazó títulos en Roland Garros, Wimbledon y Open USA. "Este año ha ido mejor de lo esperado. Trabajé mucho mental y tenísticamente para volver y he superado una situación complicada", añadió en referencia a los problemas físicos y personales vividos en 2009

description.hltext_display: 业务融合 质量为先
description.content:
电信行业――一个注定历尽波折的行业。随着3G牌照的发放，中国的电信运营商再次被拆分重组。此后，三大电信运营商全部成为了全业务运营商，诸如中国联通就拥有固定通信，移动通信，通信设施，卫星专线、数据通信、网络接入、电信增值、通信系统集成等众多业务门类，以及WCDMA制式的3G移动通信牌照。
在全业务的概念下，业务系统的升级和融合成为运营商面临的首要问题。他们要面对原有各个业务系统的融合，新业务与原有业务系统的融合，新业务特别是3G业务繁多的业务类型和更快的升级速度等各方面给业务系统的整合和升级带来挑战。当前，他们的业务系统运转的如何，是否会遇到一些质量问题呢？为此，记者对中国联通相关负责人进行了采访。
经过不断的整合，在3G业务全面开展以及移动互联网的快速发展的环境中，中国联通的全业务运营体系已经形成。联通把视线聚焦到了业务支撑系统（BSS）等系统的建设和融合上，认为这些系统是企业核心竞争力的重要组成部分。联通的支撑系统是三大运营商中情况最为复杂的，因为重组后的中国联通的固网、移动支撑系统完全分立，系统均为省级分公司建设，各省（区市）支撑水平参差不齐，完全取决于当地省级分公司和集成商的水平。特别是北方十省（区市）规模庞大的固网用户刚刚完成省级集中，又要进行移动业务的融合。
在融合的漫漫长路上，联通用统一、标准化的管理体系，来应对业务系统的融合；用规范的质量管理方案，来保障业务系统融合后的质量。联通相关负责人表示，在各个业务系统的整合上，不仅要考虑如何进行整合，还要关注整合后的系统质量。因为系统整合是一个比较复杂的管理和技术问题，也许原有的业务系统可以很好的运行，而整合后就可能出现问题，不能因为整合而降低系统的质量，更不能因此影响业务系统的正常运行。
关注后台 关注功能
通常，在电信行业软件系统当中，前台业务系统是比较完善的。运营商以用户为中心，前台业务系统直接面对用户，均经过结构化的、多层次的质量控制以及反复的严格测试。而后台系统，是企业内部运营的辅助系统，在电信运营商把大部分资源投入到前台系统管理和运营的时候，后台应用的质量往往成了容易被忽视的对象。虽然后台系统并不直接面对用户，只在企业的内部运转，但有些不完善的后台系统同样会影响企业的运行效率，也间接的影响到对用户的服务，最终还是会影响到用户的体验。
在应用系统的质量管理和测试过程中，行业对系统的性能和安全都高度关注，而且在开发到应用的过程中也比较容易把握和控制。但由于系统开发和整合的过程中，各种角色对系统的理解存在差异，特别是开发人员不能很好的理解业务需求，往往容易出现系统的功能与实际业务需求存在出入的问题，使业务系统的功能成为质量最难控制的方面。据了解，在中国联通业务系统的质量管理中，系统上线前不仅要进行规范的测试，还要经过各层级业务人员对系统进行评估，保证系统真正符合实际的业务逻辑。
质量管理工具大幅提升业务质量
电信行业的业务系统是非常庞大和复杂的，拥有着大量的终端用户和应用范围，诸如业务支撑系统（BSS）、运营支撑系统（OSS）等等，在对这样的系统进行测试的时候会有大量的重复性测试和并发测试出现，依靠传统的人工方式来测试这样的系统简直是天方夜谭。据联通相关负责人介绍，他们采用了HP的质量中心（Quality Center）、性能中心（Performance Center）等应用质量管理解决方案，运用了QuickTest Professional、Loadrunner等一系列专业的自动化测试工具，为软件系统的质量提供了直接有效的保障，也为企业的业务系统规范性和测试质量带来了大幅度提升。
谈及使用质量管理工具进行自动化测试，该负责人指出它的三点优势。首先，应用自动化测试规范了软件系统测试的流程。例如测试管理软件Quality Center本身就可以用来管理软件测试流程，应用整套的质量管理方案就可以对软件系统的功能、性能和安全质量进行规范化、全方位的保障。第二，为企业降低IT系统风险。质量管理工具的使用可以遍布软件生命周期的各个阶段，关注系统的功能、性能和安全各个方面，最大程度的降低了系统上线失败的风险。第三，自动化测试降低了企业成本。自动化测试的应用，把测试人员从大量重复性工作中解脱出来，节约了人力成本。
最大的挑战是时间
经过多年的建设，中国联通已经初步建成了软件系统质量管理和测试体系，能够对业务系统开发、升级和融合后的质量提供有力的保障。但随着电信运营商的重组，电信行业的竞争日趋激烈，在3G、2G移动通信、固定通信、数据服务、增值服务等众多领域，三大运营商针锋相对，都希望以最快的速度把业务推向市场，把服务提供给客户。
据联通测试方面的负责人讲，在对业务系统的测试中面临最大的挑战就是时间过于紧张。因为测试是一个繁琐复杂的过程，特别是如果在软件的全生命周期都进行质量控制和测试的时候，会涉及更多的测试流程和测试项目，需要大量的时间。而现在各大运营商竞争激烈，都抢在第一时间推出新业务，所以给业务系统的质量控制带来很大压力。时间和质量似乎成了一对矛盾，在复杂多变的电信业务中，要对业务系统进行快速的质量保证确实成为一大挑战。
应有全局的纲领和架构
当前各电信运营商对质量管理和测试都是很重视的，付出了巨大的力量来保证网络、业务的质量，但是对每类业务的测试以及各个省公司之间的测试过程、投入并不一定完全相同，对业务系统质量的统一管理和控制方面仍有欠缺。中国联通就在未来规划进行全面的质量管理，基于CNAS认可的质量管理体系，涵盖了人员培训、业务质量评估、性能测试等各个方面。在满足集团公司内部需要的基础上，逐步建立集团公司与省公司之间统一的质量保障体系。
联通测试相关负责人提出，业务质量保障体系模型或技术保障体系模型应该成为整个集团的专业纲领性文件，使之成为各类新业务系统上线的指南，整体提高全集团的业务质量水平。他认为，未来在联通的业务系统的开发过程中，质量管理占据一半以上的空间比较合理，彻底改变重开发轻测试，让各个业务系统有一个较为完善的质量保障体系。

description.hltext_display: Mendagri Usulkan Model Kampanye Diubah
description.content:
JAKARTA (SINDO) – Model kampanye dengan pengerahan massa yang selama ini diterapkan Indonesia dinilai menjadi salah satu penyebab mahalnya ongkos politik untuk penyelenggaraan pesta demokrasi tersebut.
JAKARTA (SINDO) – Model kampanye dengan pengerahan massa yang selama ini diterapkan Indonesia dinilai menjadi salah satu penyebab mahalnya ongkos politik untuk penyelenggaraan pesta demokrasi tersebut.
Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) Gamawan Fauzi menyatakan, dengan pengerahan massa, biaya politik yang harus dikeluarkan calon atau partai politik cukup tinggi. Di samping itu, model kampanye dengan pengerahan massa ini dinilai rawan memunculkan praktik politik uang. Salah satu cara meminimalkan politik uang, menurut Gamawan, adalah dengan penyederhanaan model kampanye.
”Walau saat ini ada pembatasan sumbangan,batasan soal ruang lingkup kampanye tidak ada.Padahal, di negara-negara tertentu pengerahan massa itu malah tidak ada. Dengan penyederhanaan kampanye ini, barangkali pemborosan biaya bisa dikurangi,” tegas Gamawan di Jakarta kemarin. Sementara itu,Badan Pengawas Pemilu (Bawaslu) dan Komisi Pemilihan Umum (KPU) masih berbeda persepsi soal keterbukaan informasi dalam pelaksanaan pilkada.
Bawaslu menganggap selama ini KPU tidak melaksanakan prinsip keterbukaan informasi dalam pelaksanaan pilkada.Adapun KPU menilai, banyak panitia pengawas (panwas) yang belum memiliki kompetensi.”BanyakKPUyangmenutup akses informasi dan data sehingga menghambat upaya deteksi dini pelanggaran.Akibatnya, pengawasan pilkada menjadi lemah dan banyak pelanggaran yang lolos,” ungkap anggota Divisi Pengawasan Bawaslu Wahidah Suaib. (mohammad sahlan)

description.hltext_display: ديبلوماسيات 2: أبو شملان
description.author: admin
description.content: هو سفير دولة الكويت في الارجنتين. رجل دمث الاخلاق، طيب المعشر، هادئ، مبتسم المحيا، وفاقي، قليل الكلام، متواضع وقبل كل شيء رجل المكارم. ذاع صيته في الاوساط الرسمية والديبلوماسية لما تحفل به مائدته في كل مناسباته من كرم الضيافة والسخاء.ابو شملان هو كنيته. هو ابن قبيلة الرومي في الكويت. جده كان يدعى شملان. سألني مرارا عن الرابط بين اسم ضيعة شملان في قضاء عاليه وعائلته. قلت انه جعلني اشعر بالفضول فشملان كانت قبل الحرب وبعدها مقصدا لاهل الكويت الكرام.استطاع ابو شملان ان يجمع في دارته كبار رموز البلاد من وزراء وحكام ولايات فكان بينهم رئيس الحكومة ووزراء الصحة والتربية والصناعة ورئيس حكومة العاصمة وحاكم سانتافي وغيرهم. حتى ان وزير خارجية الاوروغواي قبل ايضا دعوته والتقى السفراء العرب في دارته.ابو شملان مجموعة في شخص، وشخص في مجموعة انه يمثل صورة العمل العربي واهمية الدفع المركزي. ولكن كيف وما هو سره؟ثمة في الواقع اكثر من سر يجب التوقف عنده. اولا ذلك السر الذي سمح له ان يجمع في مناسباته كل السفراء العرب رغم انه كان حريصا على ان لا يدعي ان دعوته هي باسم المجموعة العربية. ثم ذلك السر في قبول المسؤولين دعوته رغم ما يعرف عن البيروقراطية الارجنتينية من تعقيدات وتجاهل للمراسم والبروتوكولات بل عدم اهتمام بصورة عامة للجسم الديبلوماسي.تمكن ابو شملان من إقامة لقاءات لم يمكن للمجموعة العربية جماعة أن تحققها. لقد سعيت كعميد للسلك الديبلوماسي العربي الى مثل هذه اللقاءات منذ عام 2006، واقمت مجموعة مهمة من مثل هذه الاجتماعات لكنها توقفت لاحقا وتبين عمليا ان المجموعة هنا لا تختلف عن واقع المجموعة على المستويات العليا. نعم نستطيع ان نلتقي جماعة مع كل الجهات، ولكن في اطار اجتماعي، ويصعب بالتأكيد ان نلتقي في اطار رسمي يعرض المشاكل الفردية التي تعني كل منا فهي ليست هما يجمعنا بل ربما انه ليس هناك هم مشترك يجمعنا حتى قضية فلسطين. اني اذكر كيف ثار بعض السفراء عندما تحدث سفير فلسطين امام رئيس مجلس الشيوخ، نائب رئيسة الجمهورية، قائلا ان هناك عشرة آلاف ارجنتيني يعملون جنودا في الجيش الاسرائيلي فبدل ان تصبح هذه المسألة هما مشتركا اصبحت بندا انقساميا. وهكذا ايضا، تحولت بندا خلافيا مشكلة التمييز ضد المواطنين اللبنانيين وآخرين من المواطنين العرب وكذلك مسألة صعوبة السمات لمواطني بعض دولنا. لم اعد افهم معنى العروبة التي نؤمن بها.اللقاءات عند السفير ابو شملان لم تكن مناسبة للبحث في مثل هذه القضايا التي لا تتقاسمها كل دولنا. كانت مناسبات لطرح اهتمامات عامة نتقاسمها من دون اشكاليات او خلفيات سياسية كالتعاون الاقتصادي والعوائق امام هذه التعاون، او التعاون الصحي، او التعاون التربوي، او التعاون الصناعي الخ...هذا بالاضافة الى ان ابا شملان جمع الى شخصه الكريم ومميزاته الشخصية انه سفير بلاد لا تحمل اي هموم خلافية مع الارجنتين، وهو سفير دولة تحضن في قلبها الكبير كل العرب دون مؤثرات جانبية. لقد ساهم ابو شملان في تعزيز الحضور العربي على المستوى الرسمي ولو بصورة غير مباشرة، لكن ذلك لم يرق الى ان يكون العمل عملا جماعيا ولم يكن الامر خافيا لا على المسؤولين هنا ولا على مسؤولي الجامعة العربية. ولعل الجامعة فهمت حقيقة هذا الواقع فاذا كان اداء ابي شملان يستحق الثناء الا ان ضعف المجموعة في العمل كمجموعة غير خاف. وهي لذلك كتبت تذكرنا بالحاجة الى تحريك النشاط الجماعي.اما السر الثاني في نجاح ابي شملان فهو انه يمثل بلدا غنيا، كريما في عطاءاته ولا سيما مع الدول التي شاركت في تحريرها والارجنتين واحدة منها. تجمعه مع الارجنتين علاقة ودية طيبة. وعلى رغم انه بلد اسلامي ومن دول الخليج لكن الارجنتين لا تنظر اليه كمصدر قلق. فهو لا يعرف بوجود مجموعات اصولية متحركة على ارضه. بل انه معروف بسياساته الديموقراطية ويشكل نموذجا امنيا مقبولا لدى الامن الغربي الذي يحكم توجه الامن الارجنتيني. وتاليا فإن الانفتاح نحو هذا البلد لا تشوبه عوائق ولا عقبات.لكن هذه العلاقة ليست وليدة السنوات القليلة التي امضاها ابو شملان في بوينس ايرس، بل انها تمتد الى العام 1991. لكن ابا شملان جمع في شخصيته ميزتين متلازمتين تشكلان واقعيا نموذجا للعمل الديبلوماسي الناجح: الاولى ارادة واضحة واندفاع غير خاف لدفع العلاقات الثنائية يتم التعبير عنها في اللقاءات الدورية مع الوزراء المعنيين التي تتوج غالبا بدعوات غداء يحضرها السفراء العرب بصفة المجاملة. والثانية هو التجاوب من الادارة المركزية في بلاده.وبالتأكيد ان مثل هذا الاندفاع يبقى سرابا ومحاولات واهية ان لم يستكمل بالدعم الكامل والتجاوب السريع الفاعل من الادارات المعنية في الوطن. وهذا ما امتاز به ابو شملان حيث انه حظي بالدعم المطلق من حكومة بلاده ومسؤوليها.يقولون انه وجيه قبيلة مهمة في الحياة السياسية في الكويت ويصعب رفض طلباته. هذا لا يهم... الاهم ان هذا التفاعل بين مساعي ابي شملان واستجابة حكومته لمساعيه انتجت نجاحا يستحق التصفيق والافتخار. استطاع ابو شملان بتعاون حكومته ان يفتح الابواب المغلقة وان يقنع رجال الاعمال والسياسيين الارجنتينيين بفائدة الانفتاح نحو بلاده. لم تعد صورة حرارة الصحراء تلسع الوجوه بل صار رنين الدنانير يطغى على العقول. سافر الى بلاده حكام ورجال اعمال ووزراء أرجنتينيون. وجاء رجال اعمال ومسؤولون من الكويت لزيارة هذه المنطقة. تفاعلت النشاطات المشتركة وحضر رئيس وزراء الكويت الذي امكنه اقناع الرئيسة دي كيرتشنر بجدوى الانفتاح على الكويت فصارت البلد الاول في الخليج الذي ستزوره قريبا زيارة رسمية لتوقيع اتفاقات وفتح ابواب الاستثمار.مبروك لأبي شملان. وعقبى لنا. بقلم السفير هشام حمدان � � � � � (سفير لبنان في الارجنتين) � � � � � Copyright © 2010 An-Nahar Newspaper All rights reserved. Provided by Syndigate.info an Albawaba.com company

description.hltext_display: Heartbreaker
description.content:
AH, Romain Duris - that broodingly handsome Frenchman who sends ladies into a spin.
This reviewer first became enamoured by the rugged actor in the 2002 hoot The Spanish Apartment (L'auberge espagnole) in which he played the hung-up Xavier, a French student on exchange in Barcelona where he learns to let go of inhibition - before reprising the endearing character in the somewhat maligned 2005 sequel Russian Dolls.
That awkward, neurotic charm now manifests itself in Gallic box office hit , but with multiple more film credits accrued over the past five years, Duris has grown up.
In this far-fetched romantic comical French farce, he is afforded a slick wardrobe of Paul Smith suiting, a glamorous co-star in Johnny Depp's beautiful wife Vanessa Paradis, and the most majestic of backdrops - Monaco, the jewel of the Mediterranean and a playground for playboys and their squillions.
Duris plays Alex, who is in the business of breaking up relationships - no, for real. This guy actually gets paid to end romantic liaisons.
He is a polished operative, getting the job done efficiently and effortlessly.
But Alex is not a man without a moral code; he only breaks up couples if one of the pair is unhappy.
To help pay a debt owed to some 'bad guys', he must take the next job on the table; a wealthy gent wants him to break up the wedding of his daughter Juliette (Paradis).
Alex needs the money - or else - and draws on his trusty playbook to bust-up the pair.
The plan threatens to come undone when he foolishly falls in love, and ultimately risks breaking his own heart - and not someone else's.
Duris is typically engaging with sharp delivery and audacious dance moves - his rendition of Patrick Swayze's hip-swivelling I've Had the Time of my Life (complete with running sprint and lift) is uproarious, albeit cliched.
The script, as implausible as it sounds on paper, delivers enough laughs needed to sustain the 105-minute running time. It will certainly be interesting to see how the American re-make turns out.
Ultimately, this is eye-candy with a Euro sensibility and tres chic Bond-esque quality - and there's nothing wrong with some style over substance this Boxing Day when all there is to watch at home is the cricket.
HEARTBREAKER (M)
Directed by: Pascal Chaumeil
Starring: Romain Duris, Vanessa Paradis
Rating: Three stars

description.hltext_display: 恒大两连胜郎平还能挑毛病 总体过关拦防不默契

description.content: 本报讯（记者李一男）恒大女排两连胜，主帅郎平还不是很满意。昨晚，恒大女排在主场广州迎来了女排甲A联赛的第二个对手山东队。第一轮，恒大曾横扫上届亚军上海队，昨日面对升班马山东队，除第二局外，恒大队员全面控制场上局面，最终以3比1胜出。赛后，恒大主帅郎平仍谦虚地表示：“我觉得今天总体还不错，但拦防还不是...

description.hltext_display: Efficiency does it for Queensbury
description.content:
First, let me say what a good game Glens Falls at Queensbury was to watch Tuesday night. Cuts, screens, picks, man-to-man defense all around and good fundamental play everywhere (for story, click here).
I really said most of what I wanted to say in the story, so I don’t have too much extra for here, but what I have, I’ll put down:
* President Obama should be as well-guarded as Cam Girard was Tuesday (I mean when he’s out and about, not when he’s playing basketball. He’s the Commander-in-Chief, for crying out loud, let him have room to hit the J.) Seriously, though, great job by the Spartans.
* I don’t know if it was part of Glens Falls’ game plan or not, but it seems like Mike LaNoir should’ve shot more. He had a bunch of opportunities.
*One extra quote from Queensbury coach Doug Fraser: “We’ve been inconsistent in all phases. That seems to be the norm so far. In all the games we have battled back, but that’s not the way we want to play, digging ourselves a hole. We’re trying to improve that.”
In other Tuesday notes: Feb. 10 is the last day of Foothills Council league play, and I’ll offer you 30-1 on the league title being decided before that day. South High had to rally to beat Hudson Falls Tuesday, as did Scotia in its win over Johnstown. … Don’t look now, Class B, but you may want to add Saratoga Central Catholic to teams you have to watch out for. The Saints moved to 5-0 with a rout of Duanesburg. … Admittedly, Warrensburg lost to Lake George, but the Burghers held the Warriors to 48 points, so their defense must have been noteworthy. … I had new stats in place before our system crashed Tuesday, but maybe it’s all for the best. Now I can add Tuesday’s games, and will try to have them up on Wednesday.
About the author: Will Springstead - springstead@poststar.com
Tags: Doug Fraser, Foothills Council, Glens Falls, Queensbury, Saratoga Central Catholic, Warrensburg

description.hltext_display: Einzelhandelsverband wirbt für Mindestlohn
description.content: "Die vielen Diskussionen über umstrittene Arbeitsbedingungen, die es in jüngster Zeit gab, liegen nicht im Interesse unserer Branche", begründete Sanktjohanser das Vorhaben. "Hier geht es für den Einzelhandel eindeutig auch ums Image." Bereits im Januar werde der HDE gemeinsam mit der Gewerkschaft Verdi die nötigen Vorklärungen abschließen. Im Zuge der Tarifrunde 2011, die im April beginnt, wollen beide dann einen Tarifvertrag dazu vereinbaren. Anschließend solle der Mindestlohn nach dem Tarifvertragsgesetz für allgemein verbindlich erklärt werden, sagte Sanktjohanser. Damit würde die Lohnuntergrenze auch für die nicht tarifgebundenen Betriebe der Branche gelten. Bezugspunkt für die Höhe des Mindestlohns könnten laut Sanktjohanser die Einstiegsgehälter der Einzelhandelstarifverträge sein, die derzeit je nach Region zwischen 7,00 und 8,80 Euro pro Stunde liegen. "Ein Mindestlohn, der sich an dieser Bandbreite orientiert, ist aus Sicht unseres Verbandes gut zu vertreten", sagte der HDE-Chef./she/wiz

description.hltext_display: Egypt: Judges reject future election monitoring amid fraud allegations
description.content:
CAIRO: Judges should refrain from future election monitoring in protest of the violations that took place during November's parliamentary elections, said a memo filed by Judge Ahmed Mekky to the Supreme Judicial Council (SJC).
Mekky, who is the vice president of the Cassation Court and member of the SJC, filed the memo on Monday.
"The Administrative Court issued verdicts mandating the registration of candidates who were denied registration without any legal grounds, and these verdicts were ignored," Mekky told Daily News Egypt.
"The Cassation Court ruled the invalidity of the elections in many constituencies, and its verdict wasn't implemented by the People's Assembly," Mekky said. "So what's the point in having judges supervising the elections? We should be excluded from the whole process."
The Administrative Court had ordered the annulment of the elections in more than 90 constituencies.
The court described the elections in these constituencies as "unconstitutional" and "illegal" based on violations before and during the elections -- including the elimination of candidates from registration lists without justification, denying the candidates' representatives notarized permits to allow them into polling stations, and ignoring court orders.
Mekky also criticized the procedures used in assigning the judges to monitor this year's elections in his memo, describing the process as "defective."
According to Mekky, the Ministry of Interior is required to inform the SCJ of how many judges are needed in each constituency, and the SCJ is responsible for selecting which judges are assigned to each constituency.
"But this is not what happened in the previous elections," Mekky stated. "Which means the SCJ abandoned its duties [by allowing the ministry to have a say in the selection of judges]."
This is the fourth memo Mekky has filed to the SCJ regarding these issues.
The Secretary General of the SCJ, Mohamed Eid Salem, denied the accusations last week after he received Mekky's first two memos, stating that the memos merely reflected Mekky's personal point of view.
The State Council's Judges' Club also decided to submit a memo on Sunday to the State Council which recommended that the judges avoid supervising any future elections. The Judges' Club decided to submit the recommendation after many judges' findings and court verdicts regarding the parliamentary elections were largely ignored.
"This [memo] shows [the judges'] anger regarding the violations that took place in the previous elections," Mekky said.
Councilor Noha Al-Zeiny supported the judges' demands.
"Having judicial supervision over the elections amid fraud and without having any legal guarantees for free and transparent elections is a disgrace to judges and to the whole judiciary system," Al-Zeiny told Daily News Egypt. "I've been calling for this for a long time, ever since before the 2005 elections when election fraud was obvious."
In 2005, there was direct supervision from judges over each ballot box in every polling station. But in this year's elections, the judges stayed in the security directorate in each constituency and instead received complaints from observers and citizens.
However, Al-Zeiny believed that approving the judges' demands and implementing them will prove to be a difficult task.
"There will be political pressure on the State Council and the SCJ to refuse the judges' recommendations, especially with the presidential elections coming [in 2011]," she explained.
The ruling National Democratic Party swept the polls in this year's parliamentary elections, winning 420 seats out of 508 amid accusations of widespread fraud and vote rigging.
© Daily News Egypt 2010

description.content:
民间组织“海星计划”挑战塑料污染
美国塑料新闻姊妹刊《广告时代》
香港消息（2010年12月21日）塑料包装在当今的市场上广受欢迎。这种材料结实、轻巧、便宜，生产起来也很方便。但塑料处置一直是个棘手的难题，对地球上的海洋造成了严重的污染，特别是在北太平洋。
以解决塑料污染和海洋垃圾为己任的香港海星计划负责人、也是创始人之一的Doug Woodring说道：“没有人真正知道这个垃圾带到底有多大。”据估计，其范围小至一个得克萨斯州，大至整个美国大陆。其中漂浮的大部分塑料都是不可再生的，有很多种类的塑料要花上数百年时间才能分解殆尽。
Woodring说：“地球上每年要生产3亿多吨的塑料，其中大部分用于一次性用途，约有90%的塑料从未进入再生流回收再生。”据《国家地理》估计，“全世界每三分钟就要用掉超过8500万个塑料瓶。在许多情况下，未经焚化或填埋处理的塑料垃圾就一路流进了海洋。”
Woodring是美国人，过去18年里一直在亚洲从事技术启动和新媒体平台工作，包括与美林公司创立了全球环境技术基金，他携手克林顿全球倡议等组织，就塑料包装产生的环境问题展开探讨，并招募义工和征集捐款。
Woodring是一名公开水域游泳爱好者，他凭借在营销和社交媒体方面的智慧成为亚洲颇有声望的生态保护人士，由他一手创立的海星计划从很早以前就在Twitter、Facebook和YouTube展开宣传，鼓励大众积极参与－同时还与香港美国商会等富有影响力的组织建立起密切联系。
现在，Woodring正在联手主流媒体为海星计划提供支持，比如日本的Ocean Planet，通过葛瑞集团推出的一项全球营销活动拉近消费者、企业和科学界的距离。
这一活动旨在唤起人们对塑料垃圾危害及其对海洋影响的认识，是由葛瑞集团派驻香港的亚太区企业开发高级副总裁Susan Reingold负责协调的一项无偿倡议，并由WPP机构在亚洲的各办事处提供捐助。
其中，由悉尼JayGrey广告公司制作的平面广告和户外广告描画了受到塑料垃圾危害的海洋动物。GroupM公司下属的MediaCom分部从媒体主处获得了免费广告位，葛瑞集团在孟买的G2 Direct & Digital公司建立了名为www.projectkaisei.org的多媒体网站并在Facebook上发起活动。WPP下属的Cohn & Wolfe公司负责公关事宜，葛瑞集团驻香港和吉隆坡的办事处则为本地筹款活动提供支持。
来自悉尼JayGrey广告公司的Claire Manning说：“我们抓住一切机会唤起民众对塑料污染问题的关注。在与Doug［Woodring］交谈之前我们大家都不知道原来世界上还存在这样的［塑料旋涡］。我们的工作团队看到大太平洋垃圾带的图片时真是触目惊心，开始认识到了问题的严重性。要解决这一问题，我们不能一味指责塑料业，把责任都推到他们身上。这并不是他们的错，而是人们处置塑料垃圾的方式不够负责。”
Manning女士说道，目前这一活动的影响有限，因为较难说服媒体供应商为海星计划腾出宣传空间，特别是在欧美国家。“每年的这个时候请求获取免费广告位的慈善团体特别多，他们主要是从事其他公益事业的。”
截至目前，MediaCom已经获得了价值约150万美元的媒体曝光机会，尤其是在澳大利亚、香港和马来西亚的平面媒体和公交站亭这类户外广告。葛瑞集团希望明年能把活动范围扩大至美国、欧洲和亚洲其他国家，Manning女士说“但要在这些市场成功铺开需要MediaCom提供更广泛的支持。”
通过塑料披露计划、海星计划和另一个同类型的组织海洋修复联盟，现已经与可口可乐公司、Lush化妆品公司、彩虹轻营养系统公司、德意志银行和通用电气公司等企业签订合作协议，对再生、正确的废弃物处置和可持续发展包装展开宣传。这项投资者主导的倡议要求企业评估和披露自身的生产情况以及对塑料及塑料垃圾的使用及处理。
海星计划在香港、日本、哥斯达黎加、澳大利亚、新加坡、南非、英国、关岛、美国和加拿大组织了世界海洋日海洋垃圾清理活动，通过游泳、冲浪、划船、帆船和潜水这五项与海洋有关的体育运动来引发公众对塑料旋涡的关注。
10月底，海星计划签下香港小天后邓紫棋（别名G.E.M.）担任青年大使，身体力行与亚洲的年轻人一同为保护海洋环境出力。此外，今年早些时候，海星计划还举办了一场3-D海洋展览，其中展出的“Inside the Plastic Vortex”太平洋模型是由香港海滩上收集到的垃圾所制成的。
Woodring介绍说，海星计划最初致力于“让公众对近50年来在我们眼皮底下在地球上的海洋中积聚起的大量塑料引起关注。之后该计划逐步发展为一项涉及科学、工业、技术、创新与政策的全球性合作，为我们日常生活中的垃圾处理提出有利环境的解决之道。”

废塑料变燃油：华泰科技将建再生工厂
Steve Toloken
美国塑料新闻全球集团之《塑料新闻•中国》
北京消息（2010年12月21日）总部位于北京的私人股权公司欧瑞集团将为再生商世纪华泰科技有限公司再投入170万美元，后者将兴建在国内的首座塑料再生工厂，用来把废弃的材料变为燃油。
世纪华泰计划在浙江省富阳市建造一座合资厂，最初将具备2万吨塑料再生能力和5万桶燃油生产能力。
耗资330万美元的富阳新厂将由华泰科技控股55％，剩余45％归投资公司浙江友邦能源开发有限公司所有。
世纪华泰总部位于山东济南，其生产的设备用于把轮胎和塑料热解再生为燃油、碳黑、钢丝和非凝性气体。
据欧瑞集团称，富阳是中国的纸业再生重镇，当地企业每年估计要生成20万吨的废旧塑料。
欧瑞集团称，这使合资企业有潜力成为中国最大的废塑料变燃料加工中心之一，新厂经过扩能将具备20万吨塑料再生能力和50万桶燃油生产能力。
欧瑞集团透露，世纪华泰力争在2011年或2012年在美国上市招股。这家投资公司拥有世纪华泰15.4％的股份。

description.hltext_display: MGM to be back in stronger fashion after debt relief
description.content:
Metro Goldwyn Mayer (MGM) the famous Hollywood studio which was reeling under bankruptcy is now $500 million richer after creditors approved its new bosses' plans of pre-packaged reorganisation that would clear off almost $5 billion in debt for exchange of equity in the rejuvenated company.
CEOs Roger Birnbaum and Gary Barber in a statement announced that MGM has now become stronger, more competitive and backed by a solid financial foundation with a bright future ahead.
The duo run Spyglass Entertainment, the Hollywood production company which made films like Leap Year and Get Him to the Greek and plan to make selected films at MGM per year to reduce production capacity and get rid of distribution operations.
Barber and Birnbaum took charge of the $5 billion debt ridden studio and laid off 50 staff members on Friday as part of their reorganisation plan.
MGM plans to release as many as six films in 2012, the first of which is said to be Part 1 of The Hobbit. It also plans to come up with the 23rd instalment of a Bond film that proved successful in the past.
There was a growing speculation among many that the studio would change Leo the Lion, its famous mascot after being taken over by a new management but its been confirmed that it would keep the mascot intact.

event_or_fact.property: MGM has now become stronger, more competitive andbacked by a solid financial foundation with a bright future ahead.

description.hltext_display: Make homeownership your New Year’s resolution
description.content:
The New Year provides an opportunity for Americans to start fresh and develop goals which have come to be known as New Year's resolutions. Some people strive toward financial aspirations or a professional achievement, while others might choose to pursue a lifelong goal, such as owning a home. If 2011 is the year to achieve your dream of homeownership, the following tips may be helpful.
Talk to the experts. Work with a real estate professional, lender and attorney who are familiar with the area in which you would like to buy a home. A real estate agent can provide you with expert knowledge about the local market including information about community life and specific neighborhoods. Make sure you are confident in the abilities of the people you choose for your team and that you are comfortable asking questions and sharing information with them. Once you start looking at homes, the process can move rather quickly and you may have to make critical decisions on a moment's notice. Your agent will be a useful resource throughout the entire process as he or she guides you from the initial search through closing on the purchase of your new home. Your agent will also be instrumental in assembling a list of homes that fit your preferences as well as your budget.
Financing. You may have savings allotted to cover your down payment but don't forget about other upfront expenses like closing and inspection costs. Look into the many programs available to help you reduce upfront costs. Also, it's never too early in the process to become pre-approved. Doing so will help you develop a budget, understand what price range you can afford and set realistic expectations. Separately, don't underestimate the importance of a great credit score. If your score is not where you'd like it to be or if there are any inaccuracies, many lenders will recommend steps to improve it, saving you thousands over the life of a loan.
What are your preferences? Make a list of the features you want in a home. For example, figuring out the preferred style, size, location and number of bedrooms and bathrooms will help narrow down the possibilities. Is a short commute to work more important than a larger living space? Take time and think about what you want out of your home. Speak to your real estate agent and browse online for homes that meet your criteria. Many sites, including Weichert.com, allow you to see multiple photos, view school and neighborhood information and set up e-mail alerts to notify you of new listings. Before you begin looking at homes, be sure you have a clear idea of what your wants and needs are, as well as the price you are willing and able to pay.
A family of full-service real estate and financial services companies, Weichert helps customers buy and sell both residential and commercial real estate, and streamlines the delivery of mortgages and home and title insurance.
For more information, Weichert's customer service center can be reached at 1-800-USA-SOLD or visit www.weichert.com. Each Weichert franchised office is independently owned and operated.

description.hltext_display: Central dog pound unfit for animal habitation
description.content:
Residents have taken action to help deer population
To the Expositor:
Regarding the December 8 letter "Visiting hunters dismayed by lack of deer on Island's West End," Mr. Kirkey should visit our beautiful Island during the off-hunting seasons—drive through the country and see huge herds of beautiful deer (does and fawns).
He feels "something must be done." Well, I want him to know that many residents of Manitoulin have done something—they now set up feeding stations for the deer and are able to watch these gorgeous animals visit close to their homes.
They are smart animals and stay on private property (no hunting) where they can find food and don't stray until the hunters have gone.
We won't miss the hunters, but sure would miss the deer.
M. Gordon
Barrie
Donation boxes create awkward position for shoppers
To the Expositor:
I wanted to applaud Charlie Pratt for being brave enough to state something, a few weeks back ("Shopper tired of retail donation boxes," November 10), that many of us have been thinking and feeling but not willing to speak up about; that being the situation where customers are asked if they want to contribute financially to some cause or other while in line at a cashier.
Whether a person contributes to any cause is a personal choice and not the business of the cashier or the other shoppers within earshot. It puts a person in an awkward position and frankly deters me from frequenting that business. Perhaps slipping a piece of paper or envelope into the shopping bag with the pertinent information on it would make it a friendlier way of reaching the same goal.
Best wishes to all.
Gail Robinson
Little Current
Upper lakes study only taking cursory look at raising levels
To the Expositor:
Regarding the December 1 article, "Canada, US to look at plans to raise level of Lake Huron," I wish to advise that your article may create a false sense of security to your readers.
It was with some degree of surprise that I recently learned that the well-known Georgian Bay advocate Mary Muter was dismissed from the board of Georgian Bay Forever, while the CEO of Canada Steamship Lines is among several new appointees. Mary has devoted 20 years of exceptional work on the science and politics of water quality and quantity of the Great Lakes to environmental organizations. I feel that under the circumstances, one must question the objectivity of her replacement, a person who has strong ties to the shipping industry. Thankfully, Ms. Muter is now head of the Great Lakes section of the Sierra Club, Ontario, where hopefully her talents and knowledge will be more fully appreciated.
Mr. Sweetnam, as quoted in your December 1 article, seems to be overly optimistic in his view that lake levels will be restored to those enjoyed prior to the past decade. Since 1998 they have been consistently hovering around chart datum, as those of us who live on the Manitoulin shore know only too well.
Mr. Sweetnam fails to mention that the International Joint Commission (IJC) study is also looking at "doing nothing" again, for the commissioners' direction to the study is to look at raising Lakes Michigan-Huron-Georgian Bay levels by zero, as well as by 10, 25, 40, or 50 centimetres. The IJC's study board is taking only a cursory look at if and how that might be done. Its researchers are in fact not examining the benefits to marinas, landowners or the ecosystem. Raising levels by 50 centimetres without placing flexible controls at the outflow (the St. Clair River) could in fact result in levels above the 1986 high. Not raising those levels at all could, if the current downward trend continues, soon take them to the disastrous 1964 low. We need flexible controls at the St. Clair River that can be used when and if appropriate in order to return these lakes to closer to average levels. There is currently no direction from the IJC on this need of flexibility.
What this article does not tell us, but what informed observers believe, is that the Upper Great Lakes Study Board is trying to pay lip service to the new directions given by the IJC commissioners while coming up with the real possibility of yet another "millions-of-dollars-do-nothing" report. Perhaps the optimism expressed by David Sweetnam is naïve at best.
Manitoulin Island is into its 12th year of sustained low water levels. Our newly exposed shorelines provide the perfect opportunity for the invasive reed phragmites australis, brought to Lake Huron via ballast dumping by foreign ships, to take over. This reed grows as high as 15 feet and takes over exposed shoreline habitats to the exclusion of native fish and wildlife species.
As human population and industrialization continue to increase in the Great Lakes basin, it is becoming increasingly obvious that problems with Lake Huron levels will continue to dog us unless we citizens act aggressively. They are messing with our lake!
I suggest that we host the new Sierra Club Great Lakes section at an open forum to take place here on the Manitoulin this winter—perhaps in March, not during the school break. A central location such as the Mindemoya Community Centre would serve well.
I sincerely hope that between us we can foster sufficient interest among Manitouliners that we may be able to stimulate action in other communities along the Lake Huron shore.
Mike Wilton
Dominion Bay
To the Expositor:
I am writing in regards to the municipal township yard dog pound in Mindemoya, which is for Central Manitoulin, located behind the roads/highway building. It is a four-sided cinderblock building with two stalls that are also cement, including the floor. The doors on either side, with a small screened window on each side, lets in little air. The dogs that are unfortunate enough to end up there get to sit or stand only with no outdoor run. In the summer it is extremely hot and this winter it will be extremely cold for them.
Now, I know a lot of people think, "They are just dogs—so what?" Well, my opinion is that they feel hot and cold just like me, and I am thoroughly disgusted to think of any animal having to put up with these conditions. The person in control of the pound is charging $200 and above for you to get your pet out, so where is that money going? I know they got a large amount of money this summer from the dogs they picked up, so why isn't any of it being used for the care of these animals? I have animals and know how much it costs to feed a dog, and I don't believe the person responsible is buying premium dog food.
Hopefully with new people having been voted into this township something may be done about these antiquated conditions.
Barbara Taylor Black
Spring Bay
Events around Whitefish River election nominations don't add up
To the Expositor:
In regards to the December 8 articles, "Ballot snafu delays polls in Birch Isl." and "Indian Affairs seeks wisdom in Whitefish River First Nation," I share the following information and comments.
The nominations for the Whitefish River First Nation chief and council were slated for November 27, yet the community members did not receive official notice of the cancellation of the nomination meeting until November 29. In this letter to the community the membership was informed that Indian and Northern Affairs was to have sent mail-out nomination forms to all registered electoral officers in February of 2010. I would say that this time period affords the electoral officer over eight months to ensure that the election process is sound; the fact (?) that the electoral officer did not receive the package at this time should most certainly have called the credibility of the process into question, at the very least, months before the mail-out of nomination forms, and not days—as it would appear to be, given the delayed notice to the Whitefish River First Nation membership.
Another interesting note is that the community was informed that, "The requirements under the Indian Act state that the elections must occur at least 30 days from the mail-out of nomination forms. The nomination forms are being mailed out November 30, 2010. The elections for the Whitefish River First Nation chief and council will be held February 12, 2011."
Somehow things just don't add up, but I guess you can't believe everything you read. Indian Affairs may seek wisdom in Whitefish River First Nation, but as the saying goes, "the wisdom of man is foolishness in the eyes of God," and the regularity of our botched elections is proof of that. One could even call it irregularity—at least there's entertainment value in that. Thanks for the articles.

description.hltext_display: Ärztefunkdienst Wien: Mehr Personal während der Weihnachtsfeiertage
description.content: Utl.: Bis zu 32 Ärztinnen und Ärzte im Dienst - Patientenservice unterstützt bei der Suche nach offenen Ordinationen =Wien (OTS) - "Die ärztliche Versorgung der Wiener Bevölkerung ist während der kommenden Feiertage auf jeden Fall gesichert", betont Ärztekammerpräsident Walter Dorner. Viele niedergelassene Ärztinnen und Ärzte seien zwar auf Urlaub, dies werde jedoch mit einer Personalaufstockung beim Ärztefunkdienst (Telefon 141) ausgeglichen. **** Verstärkt werden beim Ärztefunkdienst sowohl das fahrende Personal (= Visitentätigkeit) als auch die Mitarbeiter am Telefon. So werden beispielsweise vom 24. Dezember 2010 bis zum 10. Jänner 2011 an jedem Sonn- und Feiertag 26 fahrende Ärztinnen und Ärzte sowie sechs Telefonärzte im Einsatz sein. An Wochentagen sind es zehn fahrende Ärztinnen und Ärzte sowie sechs Telefonärzte. Sollte es wider Erwarten zu massiven Engpässen - etwa im Falle einer Grippewelle - kommen, würden weitere Ärztinnen und Ärzte beim Ärztefunkdienst zur Verfügung stehen. Der Ärztekammerpräsident wies auch darauf hin, dass der Ärztefunkdienst in Wien die Vertretung des Hausarztes sei. "Bei lebensbedrohlichen Fällen ist nicht der Ärztefunkdienst, sondern unverzüglich der Notarzt der Wiener Rettung unter der Telefonnummer 144 anzurufen." Ein Kontaktieren des Ärztefunkdienstes würde hier nur zu einem für den Patienten gefährlichen Zeitverlust führen, so Dorner. Der Ärztefunkdienst fährt pro Jahr ungefähr 60.000 Visiten. Etwa 150.000 Telefonate werden entgegengenommen. Zwtl.: Patientenservice hilft bei Ordinationssuche Gerade zu Weihnachten sind natürlich auch viele Ordinationen in Wien wegen Urlaubs geschlossen. Allerdings sichert eine entsprechende Vereinbarung zwischen Ärztekammer und Gebietskrankenkasse, dass die Versorgung der Wiener Bevölkerung durch niedergelassene Ärztinnen und Ärzte auch an den Fenstertagen während der Weihnachtszeit aufrechterhalten bleiben muss. Das Pa-tientenservice der Ärztekammer für Wien (Telefon 01 79 011 61) informiert über Urlaubsvertretungen, Adressen und Ordinationszeiten. In dringenden Fällen führt das Patientenservice auch Interventionen, zum Beispiel bei der Wiener Rettung, durch. Zudem sind alle Urlaubsdaten von Kassenärzten mit WGKK-Vertrag auch über die Homepage der Ärztekamer für Wien www.praxisplan.at abrufbar. (hpp) (S E R V I C E - Ärztefunkdienst der Ärztekammer für Wien in den Nachtstunden, an Wochenenden und Feiertagen: Telefon 141. Patientenservice der Ärztekammer für Wien täglich von 7.00 bis 19.00 Uhr, außer Samstag, Sonn- und Feiertag: Telefon 01 79 011 61.) Rückfragehinweis: Ärztekammer für Wien - Pressestelle Dr. Hans-Peter Petutschnig Tel.: (++43-1) 51501/1223, 0664/1014222, F:51501/1289 hpp@aekwien.at http://www.aekwien.at *** OTS-ORIGINALTEXT PRESSEAUSSENDUNG UNTER AUSSCHLIESSLICHER INHALTLICHER VERANTWORTUNG DES AUSSENDERS - WWW.OTS.AT *** OTS0029 2010-12-22/09:31 220931 Dez 10 NAW0001 0373
