company.name: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA
LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA

description.hltext_display: 风中摇曳的钱串子
description.content:
听说过钱串子吧？俗语里指的是惜财如命之辈。见过“钱串子”吗？这里指的是把钱串起来，一串一串地挂在枝头之果，挂果之树名为：排钱草Phyllodium，蝶形花科Papilionaceae。
最近，在植物园南药园附近，偶然碰到了排钱草，一下就被那一米多长的钱串子给震住了：咦，这不是传说中的钱串子吗？4米多高的树丛，一条条长长的复穗状花序垂下来，宽大的总苞对称排列，将里面的穗状花序一个个依次包裹其中，形成了垂悬的钱串。不经意间会让人“见钱眼开”，眉开眼笑：哇，钱串子！眼前这棵钱串子，三小叶复叶的中叶片比侧叶长达两倍之多，故名：大叶排钱草（P. longipes）。
没几天，在百花园的一隅，看到草地上一堆排钱草，有大叶排钱草，也有排钱草（P. pulchellum），硕果累累，长长的果序全都自然低垂。两者区别一目了然，前者的株型高大，中间小叶比两侧小叶长4-6倍，总苞片大约3-5厘米；后者株型矮小，中间小叶片仅为两侧叶片的2倍之余，总苞片约为2-3.5厘米。
好奇之余，剥开总苞片，看到里面一串串豆荚，有嫩的，有老的。原来，花期过了，果序成熟了；藏在排钱草的毛茸茸的总苞片里的是一枚枚成熟的具有夹节的果荚。也许，这些状如铜钱般的总苞片，是为了保护种子，保证自己的基因能够流传下去。
排钱草属植物全球有6种，分布于热带亚洲及大洋洲。中国有4种，产于云南、广东、广西、海南、台湾等地。西双版纳热带植物园目前收集保育了3种。该属植物叶状苞片宿存，宛如一长串“钱排”，是当之无愧的“奇花异卉”，部分种类具有解表清热、活血化瘀之药用价值。
在分类学处理上，该属植物与山蚂蝗属Desmodium植物较为接近，有学者主张把其归为山蚂蝗属的亚属或组。但惟其伞形花序包藏于一对圆形的宿存叶状苞片内，多个苞片在枝端形成了总状或圆锥状长花序，龙骨瓣弧曲，具有小花盘，荚果较小等特征与山蚂蝗属具有显著区别。因此，《中国植物志》将其处理为独立属。

description.hltext_display: Coast Guard searching for possible survivors of downed helicopter off Rio Grande, Puerto Rico
【大行言論】中銀國際：內銀因銀監指引令資本率臨壓力，但仍在可控範圍內
description.content:
鉅亨網新聞中心 (來源：財華社) 2010-12-22 16:25:02 網友評論 條 我來說兩句
中銀國際發表研究報告，就中銀監會近日下發《關於加強融資平臺貸款風險管理的指導意見》，明確融資平臺貸款的五級分類、撥備計提和風險權重等，指導意見將使銀行資本充足率面臨壓力，不良貸款也將上升，但該行預計仍將在可控範圍之內；在實際執行中，相信監管部門也會與銀行協調，避免在短時期內造成過大沖擊。
中銀國際指，目前，上市銀行地方政府融資平臺貸款的總額約有4萬億元人民幣，從絕對額上看，五家大型銀行占了約2.7萬億；從佔全部貸款比重來看，浦發、興業、民生、中信、光大等股份制銀行要高於大型銀行；該行估算，上市銀行2010年末的資本充足率將平均下降約0.6個百分點，在提高融資平臺貸款的風險權重後，部分銀行資本充足率將面臨更大壓力，例如民生銀行(01988-HK)、深發展以及招商銀行(03968-HK)等；某些銀行有可能會在未來考慮進一步的融資計劃，這會對銀行的估值產生壓。
該行指，上市銀行2010年末的不良貸款將出現一定程度的上升，但預計仍然將在可控範圍之內。
中銀國際稱，由於只有部分銀行披露了其融資平臺貸款的現金流覆蓋情況，因此該行只能大概估算銀監會融資平臺貸款細則的影響。根據其測算，由於指導意見要求提高融資平臺貸款的風險權重，上市銀行2010年末的資本充足率平均下降約0.6個百分點。浦發銀行、北京銀行等受到影響相對較大，而招行和寧波銀行由於融資平臺佔比較少且現金流覆蓋較好，因此受到的影響較小。

description.hltext_display: 象道：通往丛林何处？
description.content:
前记：2003年3月，国际爱护动物基金会（IFAW）与西双版纳国家级自然保护区管理局正式开始合作开展亚洲象保护项目，在景洪确定了一份5年的保护合作计划，该计划的首要目标之一就是摸清中国亚洲象野生种群和栖息地的现状，为将来制定科学的保护计划提供基础科学数据。作为合作单位之一、北京师范大学承担该项目的科研任务，于是我在导师张立博士的指导下，踏上了摸清中国野生亚洲象家底的道路。接下来几年的青春岁月也是我由纯粹的学生变成“野人”（field researcher）、逐步揭开中国野生亚洲象的神秘面纱和了解、体会、欣赏和热爱西双版纳热带雨林之道。
野象谷是中国亚洲象之源么？
在IFAW亚洲象保护项目的支持下，我调查的第一站是勐养保护区。说起中国的大象，不得不提一个响当当的名字：野象谷。因此地野象众多而得名，传说有两三百头，在此之前，人们想亲眼目睹野生的亚洲象，几乎全部是在野象谷，所以，在很多人甚至是不少当地人的观念中，西双版纳的大象都来自于野象谷。那么，野象谷真的是中国亚洲象之源么？
西双版纳保护区工作人员给我展示保护区的地图，介绍了西双版纳保护区的具体情况。原来西双版纳国家级自然保护区分为勐养、勐腊、尚勇、勐仑、曼稿这5个保护区，野象谷只是勐养保护区的小片地域，除了此地，另外在尚勇保护区和勐腊保护区也有亚洲象出没的消息，但是具体西双版纳有多少头大象，活动在哪些地方，谁也回答不了这个问题。要回答这个问题，我们首先必须了解目前出现亚洲象的区域和它们的活动路线及规律。
2003年下半年，雨季正酣，我和同伴IFAW项目办公室的赵怀东，西双版纳保护区科研所的工程师董永华，开始投身于西双版纳的茫茫雨林。泥泞的乡村土路上深深的拖拉机车辙、沟谷雨林中倒伏的砂仁、山巅上航空标志牌前的合影，记录着我们三人组用双脚在密林追踪大象的踪迹，勾画着西双版纳的亚洲象分布区和种群数量。在勐养保护区我们几乎跑遍了亚洲象出现或曾出现过的所有村寨，同时，为了了解亚洲象的活动路线和规律，我们跟踪亚洲象活动的痕迹，频繁的来回穿越人迹罕至的核心区丛林。每天，我们背着30多公斤的背包，时而下到400多米的深谷，时而爬上1000多米的高山，很多时候没有小路，我们跟踪着兽道，几乎完全用双脚丈量了勐养保护区内主要的区域：我们向东穿越保护区核心区，到达小黑江边，一直跟踪到大象的极限-孔明山附近（民间传说孔明山因当年诸葛亮南征孟获至此而得名，想必这些大象就是1000千多年前与蜀军对垒的孟获的战象后代在它们的故土繁衍，千年不息），我们向北追踪到接近普文坝的吊井一带，向西我们来到了澜沧江边的村寨，然后横穿保护区，达北面的整糯乡境内。经过3个多月的丛林跋涉，我们基本上了解勐养保护区亚洲象的分布范围和特点。
根据不同区域出现的象群数量、个体特征和出现时间的相互对比，我们初步估计该保护区的亚洲象种群数量在80-150头之间，并且勐养保护区的亚洲象并不只出现在之前为人所知的野象谷等几个孤立的点，它们经常沿着河谷或者山脊，在不同的地点循环移动，向东能够跨越保护区的界河-勐旺河，到达保护区外普文坝边缘的吊井一带，最西能够到达澜沧江边的莲花塘，甚至枯水季节，亚洲象经常游过宽阔的澜沧江，到达对面的勐海县，沿着一些残存的小片森林连接带，取道北上到思茅地区的糯扎渡。亚洲象几乎出现勐养保护区森林的绝大部分区域，活动面积达到上千平方公里！
大象的活动范围为何如此之广呢？原来成年亚洲象体重超过5吨，每天需要进食新鲜的植物200公斤左右，这意味着即使是在丰富多产的热带地区，一小片的区域并不能满足象群长期不断的进食，于是亚洲象采取了循环使用栖息地的策略，就是一段时间在一个地方觅食，并不会一次性的将该区域的食物吃光，而是摄取其中的一部分，然后转移至另一个区域，等这个区域的食物资源再次生长出来的时候，再转回来，这样就能够保证食物不断的供给了。所以，一般来说象群的家域范围都非常广，可达到几百平方公里。如2002年至2003年，美国史密森（Smithsonia）国家动物园的大象研究者曾给一头成年雄象带上GPS项圈，46周后发现它总共移动的面积达到570多平方公里！既然亚洲象在勐养保护区内的活动范围甚广，那象群为何又频繁出现在勐养保护区的小片地域——野象谷呢？这实际上与亚洲象的生活习惯、野象谷的位置和周围环境等戚戚相关。在亚洲象的食谱中，禾本科植物占有重要的地位，尤其是竹类，是亚洲象最喜欢的食物，也是其最重要和基本的食物来源。我们调查发现，野象谷周边区域分布着大片竹林，是勐养保护区亚洲象的重要取食地之一；另外，像大部分的食草类动物一样，亚洲象有嗜盐的习惯，它们很难从植物中获取足够的盐分，它们就吸取含盐碱天然水塘（当地百姓称为“硝塘”）中的盐分来满足身体所需，而野象谷为了发展旅游业，从20世纪90年代开始，在林内投放食盐，人工招引野象前来觅盐。正因如此，野象谷成为了中国亚洲象出现频率最高的地方。随后我们课题组的国艳丽和袁志强前后在此定点驻守，由于亚洲象身体的很多形态特征长时间不会变化，比如耳朵上的缺刻、身体上的疤痕等，通过个体识别，发现连续几年出现在野象谷地区的亚洲象共有46头，其中38头分属于7个家族（庭）群，另外8头分别是单独活动的雄象（见上期《雨林故事》的《我为野象建“档案”》一文）。这是目前最为科学的观测数据，但是生活在勐养保护区内的亚洲象是否在这几年间都到过野象谷，且都被我们识别，仍是个未解之谜。
完成了勐养保护区的调查，我的下一站来到了另一个可能分布较多大象的区域-尚勇保护区。
尚勇，象凶猛还是人凶猛？
有大象的地方总是存在着很多的传说和奇闻异事，尚勇保护区也不例外。
来到尚勇保护区西边的勐满镇，当地百姓传言此地老象非常凶，见到人就会追，追上之后会将人摔死。其实，这不是空穴来风。就在近两年，一位当地电视台的记者在拍摄大象的时候，被大象追上摔死；另有一个村妇下地劳动，被躲藏在庄稼地里的大象活活踩死。一时间，人们心目中温顺的大象在这里变成了杀人猛兽，人们谈象色变。带着这些传闻，我将信将疑的来到了著名的南平村。
南坪村是远近闻名的大象村，每年亚洲象频繁的“造访”此地，将当地村民的庄家破坏殆尽，在政府的帮助下，该村的村民干脆专门种植庄稼喂养大象，他们则靠政府的救济粮生活。我们来到南坪村遇到一位具有传奇色彩的人物，他叫赵金清，瑶族人，曾经养过野象。90年代，一只受伤的大象从森林走出来，在村寨附近逗留了好几天，不吃不喝，在大家很纳闷的时候，细心的他发现原来这头大象受伤了，于是他就拿着大象喜欢吃的植物慢慢地接近，并且用草药为大象治伤，但是不幸的是这头大象由于伤势过重，一个月之后死去了。听到这个故事后，我感到非常震惊：为什么同一个地方的亚洲象，有的被认为凶残无比，有的却能够允许人类如此亲近？就在大象踩死记者的同一个山梁，2007年又发生所谓的亚洲象复仇事件。亚洲象果真会复仇么？什么原因致使该地区的亚洲象如此凶猛呢？这个疑团随着我的调查深入逐步得到了清晰。
尚勇保护区的面积并不是很大，大约320平方公里左右，东西最宽30公里左右，南北最长20公里左右。每年苞谷和稻子成熟的时候，晚上大象就会来到村寨田地里肆无忌惮的吃庄稼，甚至白天都不回森林，我便根据这段时间内的不同区域亚洲象出现的时间，种群的数量特征、出现的位置，排除重复计算的可能，发现连续几年的种群数量维持在60-80头之间。接下来半年，通过追踪象群的活动、记录大象遗留的取食痕迹、粪便的位置，我发现在尚勇保护区内，亚洲象最喜欢的栖息地类型是竹林和灌丛地带，而且喜欢在低海拔的区域活动（这样不仅能获得足够的食物，同时也减少了笨重的身体爬山过程中消耗大量的能量），而象损的重灾区——南平村至上中梁一带，正靠近保护区的竹林主要分布地带，亚洲象从竹林出来就能够直接进入农作物区，由于亚洲象具有很强的记忆力，一旦它发现丰富的食物区后，它就会不定时的光顾，甚至能够记住庄稼成熟的时间；再加上人类不断的砍伐森林，农地不断的靠近保护区界线，甚至越过保护区边界，亚洲象天然栖息地受到干扰，无形中加大了人象冲突的风险和象损的数量。相比较而言，尚勇保护区东面竹林分布少，森林的破坏也没有西面严重，亚洲象光临较少，象损也就轻微多了。追踪野象的足迹会遇到野象吗？答案是肯定的。2003年至2009年，我在尚勇保护区调查过程中，就有太多此生难忘的与象近距离“亲密”接触的场景，而且每次惊险的经历各不相同。2003年12月的一天中午，在南平和河图之间的山梁，我遇到了传说中那头秃尾巴大象——曾将当地电视台记者袭击致死。当时心情相当紧张，一直和它保持一定的距离。后来我发现这头象已入暮年，老态龙钟，行动极为迟缓，见到人就会停下来，然后判断人的位置，选择避开人的路线，它一直没有像想象中那样向我追来，而是绕开我的方向走开了。无独有偶，2008年国庆前夕，也是接近中午的时候，我和赵金清一起进山时碰到一头独象，拥有丰富大象知识和野外经验的赵金清也没有预料到，这时候竟有大象站在日常人们进山的大路上，并且与他靠近距离不到5米，没等他反应过来，那头大象向他直冲了过去，他慌忙扔下身上的东西，不顾一切地冲过灌丛爬上山坡，才逃过这一劫。大象追人不成，只好对着我们做饭的铁锅撒气，我们眼睁睁地看着它把我们的锅全都踩扁了。随后它转身朝我在的方向走来，我一直和它保持了10米以上的距离，时刻准备在它追来的时候撒腿就跑。让我很意外，这头象和我在原地对峙了10多分钟之后，始终没有冲向我，而是转身钻进路边另一侧山坡的灌丛中。在它转身的一刹那，我用手中的相机拍下了挽救它生命的一张照片。大象离开之后，我和惊魂未定的赵金清汇合，打开相机中的照片，放大之后才发现了大象异常行为的原因：在正常情况下，白天的亚洲象一般会避开人的干扰，隐藏到森林隐秘处活动休息，只有出现异常情况下，比如大象受伤，或者因为老迈离群等，导致其行为异常。那张照片清楚的显示，它的屁股上有个碗口粗的伤口，正在化脓，如果不对它进行抢救，它很快就会死亡。情形之下，我们马上上报，之后便上演了著名的拯救大象“平平”的行动。这些亲身经历让我明白，这里的亚洲象并非天生的凶神恶煞，主要的原因可能人们忽视了亚洲象野性的危险性，靠近的距离太近，让它们感觉到自身的安全受到威胁而发起的反击。尤其是受伤的或者孤独的亚洲象，对人类本来就高度紧张，其安全距离也会加大，所谓困兽犹斗，就是这个道理。同时，由于猖狂的盗猎行为，枪击和盗猎对亚洲象不断地造成心理和生理伤害，也加大了亚洲象的自我防卫行为。
这里的盗猎者究竟有多猖狂、多凶狠呢？如果林中大象的累累白骨、不断响起的枪声还不足以说明的话，也许我所经历的那场惊心动魄的场景就是个很好的实例了。2009年4月份，我、赵金清以及保护区工作人员车志勇在调查的时候，发现了新鲜的人足迹，我们便顺着足迹进入野牛河，迎面碰上一位盗猎者。这时，盗猎者下意识地就抬起手中的枪准备瞄准，但他发现我们有三个人，随即开始逃跑。我们三人立即追捕，在即将抓到他的那一刻，没想他的枪走火了，幸好没有击中我们！最后他扔掉抢，使用随身携带的砍刀使我们不得近身，最终逃脱了。那一刻，惊魂未定的我终于体会到：面对如此凶残的盗猎者，为什么当地的护林员上山的时候，碰到盗猎者反而不敢执法了。虽然我们的保护机构采取了一些办法，比如驻军、武装巡护等，但是盗猎者也会逐步的掌握巡护的规律，盗猎的行为依然没有得到很好的遏制。尚勇保护区的盗猎不仅使得亚洲象行为和活动变得异常，同时已经严重的威胁到该地区亚洲象种群的生存。在我们长达7年的调查和野外观察中，发现尚勇保护区内有明显象牙的雄象寥寥无几，几乎消失。同时，盗猎压力可能是导致尚勇保护区的亚洲象种群活动区域改变和向其他地区迁移的主要原因。在尚勇保护区的南部，由于老挝北部的南塔省接壤，森林景观也是相互连通的，在过去很长的一段时间内，该地区的亚洲象经常往返于中老两国之间，但是近些年，随着老挝一方更为严重的盗猎，象群活动区域逐渐向中国境内退缩，到了最近几年，象群仅仅只在边境线附近转一圈，然后会很快的返回中国一侧。而在尚勇保护区北面，紧靠着勐腊保护区。在70年代，勐腊保护区的亚洲象种群已经消失了，但是在2001年的时候，尚勇保护区的亚洲象开始频繁的向东北方向移动，最后通过了东北部大龙哈村的一个南北走向的极为狭长的森林连接带，从此一去不返，定居在勐腊保护区。虽然没有证据证明这种现象与盗猎直接相关，但是有一点可以肯定，那就是尚勇东北部和与其相连的勐腊保护区东南部的整体栖息地特征是沟谷雨林和中山常绿阔叶林，那并不是亚洲象最适宜的栖息地。
作者简介： 冯利民，男，江西瑞昌市人，博士研究生，主要在西双版纳从事野生亚洲象和老虎等大型哺乳动物生态学研究。
勐养保护区的象群来野象谷取食盐分
尚勇保护区内猖獗的盗猎活动，勇勇的母亲被猎杀

description.hltext_display: 1960 Championship Season: The big game
description.content:
Green Bay 3 3 0 7 -- 13
EAGLES 0 10 0 7 -- 17
Scoring
Green Bay – Paul Hornung, 20-yard field goal
Green Bay – Hornung, 20-yard field goal
Eagles – Tommy McDonald, 35-yard pass from Norm Van Brocklin (Bobby Walston PAT)
Eagles – Walston, 15-yard field goal.
Green Bay – Max McGee, seven-yard pass from Bart Starr (Hornung kick).
Eagles – Ted Dean, five-yard run (Walston PAT)
Tuesday, December 21, 2010
Posted: 11:14 a.m.
By Ray Didinger
CSNPhilly.com
NOTE: This is the final installment of CSNPhilly's 1960's Championship series.
Christmas fell on a Sunday in 1960. In those days, the National Football League would not consider playing on Christmas. It was a holy day, a family day and the NFL did not want to intrude.
So the championship game between the Eagles and Green Bay Packers was played the next day, December 26th at Franklin Field. It was a Monday and the University of Pennsylvania was on its holiday break so the dormitories were empty and the streets were still covered with snow.
The playing surface was cleared but there were large mounds of snow around the edges. Temporary bleachers were set up on the cinder track to increase the seating capacity to 67,325, but it still wasn’t enough. This was probably the toughest ticket in Philadelphia sports history. That’s because the rules of the day called for a TV blackout in the local market so if you wanted to see the game, you had to pay your way into the stadium.
Philadelphia Coach Buck Shaw allowed his players to stay at home the night before the game. He felt they should be with their families, not in a hotel on Christmas. After days of frigid weather, the sun came out and the temperature climbed to 40 degrees, favorable conditions for the Eagles passing game.
“I drove to the stadium and it was like going to the office,” cornerback Tom Brookshier said. “I don’t remember feeling any nervousness at all. It was a big game, but we played a lot of big games that year. We knew how to handle it.
“I remember walking into Franklin Field that morning and talking with the ushers and security guards. It was a very relaxed atmosphere. It was the same way in our locker room. We weren’t a real uptight team. Guys were loose and bantering back and forth. There wasn’t any doubt in minds; we were going to win the football game.”
The Eagles did win the game, 17-13, and they won it in familiar fashion, starting slowly (they turned the ball on their first two possessions), falling behind and then rallying in the fourth quarter.
The Packers dominated on the stat sheet with 22 first downs to the Eagles 13 and 401 total yards to the Eagles 296, but they did not take advantage of their scoring chances. They drove to the five-yard line, the 13, the eight and the seven, but managed just six points on those possessions. The Packers were not stopped inside the 10 all season, but the Eagles stopped them three times that day.
That was characteristic of the Eagles defense. It gave up yards (the Eagles ranked ninth in the 13-team league in yards allowed) but made big plays in key moments. In the title game, they stopped the Packers on their first possession when linebacker Chuck Bednarik and safety Don Burroughs tackled fullback Jim Taylor for a loss on fourth and one at the Eagles nine.
Green Bay coach Vince Lombardi couldn’t believe it. His running game, led by Taylor and halfback Paul Hornung, was the NFL’s best. The Packers averaged 4.7 yards a carry during the season. Their offensive line, anchored by future Hall of Famers Jim Ringo and Forrest Gregg, controlled the trenches. Fourth-and-one was automatic, except on this day.
“Vince was a great coach, but he was stubborn,” Brookshier said. “We knew he would stick with his basic philosophy the whole way even if we bottled it up for a half or three quarters. We had a good idea of what he would call in a big spot. He wasn’t going to try to trick us. He was going to come right at us and we were ready.”
Hornung kicked two short field goals to give the Packers a 6-0 lead, but quarterback Norm Van Brocklin threw a 35-yard touchdown pass to Tommy McDonald in the second quarter and Bobby Walston added a field goal to put the Eagles ahead 10-6 at halftime.
Green Bay regained the lead in the fourth quarter when quarterback Bart Starr hit end Max McGee with a seven-yard touchdown pass. The Eagles came back on their next possession with rookie Ted Dean scoring on a five-yard run to put the Eagles ahead 17-13. Dean set up the touchdown drive with a 58-yard kickoff return, the longest return against the Packers all season.
The game came down to one final possession. The Packers got the ball with 1:20 remaining. Starr passed to Jim Taylor for five yards, then he passed to halfback Tom Moore for four yards. Taylor ran for nine yards. Starr passed to tight end Gary Knafelc twice, once for 17 yards and again for eight yards. The crowd fidgeted as the Packers drove into Eagles territory.
“Their last possession was a nervous time,” said Marion Campbell, who was an Eagles defensive end. “We were playing the clock. We knew they had to score a touchdown [to win] so we were in a prevent defense. They were picking up the underneath yardage pretty good. Starr completed some passes. But we kept making the tackles and running time off the clock.”
Finally, there was time for one last play. The Packers had the ball at the Eagles 22. Starr looked to the end zone, but the Eagles had McGee and Dowler covered. With no better options, Starr dumped the ball to Taylor, the bruising fullback who accounted for 151 yards that day.
Taylor lowered his head and drove toward the goal. Rookie linebacker Maxie Baughan had the first shot at him, but bounced off. Burroughs tried to tackle him, but Taylor ran through his arms.
Taylor made it as far as the nine-yard line where he ran into safety Bobby Jackson and Bednarik. The impact was so violent it snapped the strap on Jackson’s shoulder pads, but he held onto Taylor’s leg while Bednarik – who once again played the entire game -- wrapped Taylor in a bear hug and wrestled him to the ground.
“They didn’t have any timeouts left so I held him down,” Bednarik said. “I was watching the clock, watching the final seconds tick off. Taylor was squirming like hell trying to get up. He was saying, ‘Get off me, you (expletive).’ He wanted to get up and run another play.
“When the second hand hit zero, I said, ‘You can get up now, Jim, this (expletive) game is over.’ Then I started jumping around like a cheerleader. That was the ultimate, winning that game.”
Van Brocklin was named the Most Valuable Player, a fitting end to his brilliant career. Shaw confirmed that he, too, was stepping down as coach. It was the first – and only – time a head coach and quarterback both called it quits after winning an NFL championship.
“I’m getting out now while I’m at the top,” Van Brocklin said. “This is by far the greatest season I’ve ever had. Playing for money alone is no good. Right now, I have $5,000 (the winner’s share) and that will tide me over for awhile.”
E-mail Ray Didinger at viewfromthehall@comcast.net.

description.hltext_display: Match nul pour le Barça, victoire pour Schalke
description.content:
Pour la première fois de la saison, le FC Barcelona a concédé le nul 0-0 en Copa del Rey, tandis que Schalke 04 a pris un bon avantage en Coupe d'Allemagne.
Gerard Piqué a manqué le cadre pour Barcelone en fin de match contre l'Athletic Club ©
Publié: Mardi, 21 décembre 2010, 21.30HEC Pour la première fois de la saison, le FC Barcelona a concédé le nul 0-0 en Copa del Rey, tandis que Schalke 04 a pris un bon avantage en Coupe d'Allemagne.
Pour la première fois de la saison, le FC Barcelona a concédé le nul 0-0 face à l'Athletic Club en 8es de finale aller de la Copa del Rey. C'est seulement la deuxième fois cette saison que le Barça ne parvient pas à trouver le chemin des filets.
La seule défaite des hommes de Josep Guardiola en Liga cette saison remonte au 11 septembre (2-0 face au Hércules CF). Mais les tenants du titre ont réussi à marquer au moins un but lors des 22 rencontres qui ont suivi (toutes compétitions confondues), avant hier au Camp Nou. Bojan Krkić, Andrés Iniesta, Lionel Messi et David Villa ont tous buté sur Gorka Iraizoz dans la cage de leur adversaire basque.
Dans les autres 8es de finale, le Córdoba CF, une formation de deuxième division, a imposé le nul 2-2 face au RC Deportivo La Coruña, et le Valencia CF et le Villarreal CF se sont également neutralisés (0-0).
En Coupe d'Allemagne, deux rencontres seulement des 8es de finale ont été maintenues en raison du mauvais temps. Le FC Schalke 04 est allé s'imposer 1-0 chez le FC Augsburg, leader de 2. Bundesliga, grâce à un but de Jefferson Farfán. L'autre match opposait le TSG 1899 Hoffenheim et le VfL Borussia Mönchengladbach, pour une victoire d'Hoffenheim sur le score de 2-0.
En France, un match de Ligue 1 était programmé mardi soir entre le FC Lorient et le Montpellier Hérault SC, qui se sont quittés sur le score de 0-0.

description.hltext_display: Nina Kronjäger kann sich Fortsetzung von "Abgeschminkt!" vorstellen
description.content:
vor 3 Min.
Berlin (dapd). Die Schauspielerin Nina Kronjäger hätte Lust auf eine Fortsetzung ihres Kinodebütfilms "Abgeschminkt!". "Katja Riemann und ich haben tatsächlich darüber nachgedacht. Es könnten alle damaligen Kollegen wieder mitspielen. Das wäre witzig, fast 20 Jahre später!", sagte die 43-Jährige der "Bild"-Zeitung. Mit 43 Jahren habe sie inzwischen schon Angst, keine guten Rollen mehr zu bekommen, fügte sie hinzu. Kronjäger hatte in dem Film von Katja von Garnier aus dem Jahr 1993 die Krankenschwester Maischa gespielt, Riemann die Cartoonistin Frenzy. Diesen Artikel weiter lesen

description.hltext_display: Konstanz bereits schneefrei
description.content:
Offenbach/Konstanz (dpa) - Konstanz am Bodensee ist der einzige Ort ohne Schnee in den bundesweiten Messungen des Deutschen Wetterdienstes DWD.
Die Stadt im äußersten Süden Deutschlands war mit Stand vom Dienstagabend schneefrei und verzeichnete in der Nacht zum Mittwoch mit plus drei Grad eine in diesen Tagen milde Temperatur.
Alle übrigen über ganz Deutschland verteilten 64 Orte, von denen die DWD-Zentrale in Offenbach Schneehöhen abruft, waren eingeschneit. An der Spitze lag der Brocken im Harz, wo sich die Flocken auf 155 Zentimetern Höhe stapelten. Auf der Zugspitze waren es nur fünf Zentimeter weniger. Selbst auf den Nordseeinseln Norderney, Sylt und Helgoland blieb die weiße Pracht liegen - was dort selten ist.
Allerdings sagten die Meteorologen in ihrer ersten Prognose am frühen Mittwochmorgen Tauwetter für den ganzen Süden voraus. Im Laufe des Tages könnte der Schnee dort also an vielen Orten fortschmelzen.

description.hltext_display: 조인성 병장이 이등병에게 해주고 싶은 말!
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
[서울신문 M&M]
이곳은 군악대가 주로 연습을 하는 공간인 ‘합주실’입니다. 이렇게 가까이에서 군악대를 처음 본 저는, 멋진 제복과 늠름한 그들의 모습을 영상으로 담아내느라 정신이 없었습니다.
바로 그 때, 제 뒤로 들려오는 낯익은(?) 목소리가 있었으니…
“카메라 잘 다룰 줄 알아?”
앗, 낯선 곳에서 들리는 낯익은 소리? 뒤를 돌아보니 조인성 병장이 제 어깨를 살짝 두드려주고 있었네요. 항상 전문가들과 함께 촬영하다가 제가 촬영하는 것을 보니 다소 걱정되었나 봅니다.
저도 조인성 병장을 보는 순간 두 번 놀랐습니다. 하나는 TV에서만 보던 사람을 실제로 봤기 때문이고, 또 하나는 저보다 훨씬 뛰어난 외모 유전자를 가지고 있다는 사실 때문이었죠.
조인성 병장은 올 한해 병무홍보대사로 선정되어 많은 홍보활동을 펼쳤으며, 군악대원으로서도 성실히 활동해 왔다고 합니다. 또한 공감 블로그에서도 ‘필승! 조인성 상병(병장)입니다!’라는 코너를 통해 여러분과 계속 소통할 수 있었다고 하네요.
오늘 공감팀이 찾아간 이유는 올해의 모든 활동을 마무리하는 조인성 병장의 소감과 더불어 새해 다짐을 듣기 위해서였습니다.
조인성 병장이 입대한다는 소식을 연예뉴스에서 본 것이 엊그제 같은데 벌써 병장이라는 것이 믿기지 않았습니다. 하지만 문득 ‘연예인이기 때문에 일반 병사들보다 군 생활을 편하게 한 것은 아닐까?’라는 의심(!)이 들었죠.
“그럴 리가 있나요! 저도 일반 병사들과 똑같이 생활하고 있습니다.”
신병시절에는 후임이 늦게 들어온 터라 생활관과 화장실 청소를 유난히도 오랫동안 했었다고 농담 반 진담 반으로 푸념하는 조인성 병장.
군악대원들이 받는 훈련에 참여하면서도 군악대 행사와 병무홍보대사 활동에 소홀하지 않기 위해 전국을 바쁘게 돌아다닌다는 조 병장을 보면서, 힘들지만 성실한 군 생활을 하고 있었음을 느낄 수 있었습니다.
저도 이 날 군악대 촬영과 기사 작성으로 눈코 뜰 새 없는 시간을 보냈습니다. 하지만 지금 하고 있는 일이 진정으로 제가 하고 싶었던 일이기에, 비록 몸은 지칠지라도 기분 좋게 끝까지 마무리 할 수 있었습니다.
지금 조인성 병장도 그러한 마음일 것이라고 생각됩니다. 군 복무와 나의 전공이 서로 WIN-WIN 할 수 있는 공군. 조인성 병장의 모습을 보니 이러한 생각이 더욱 확고해 졌습니다.
2011년 5월이면 다시 배우로 돌아갈 조인성 병장. 지금 이 시점에, 이등병인 저의 모습을 보면 어떤 말을 해 주고 싶었는지 물었습니다. 의외로 짧은 대답을 해 주시더군요!
“ ...... 시간은 갑니다. ”
*공감 일기는 실제 공군 이병이 쓰는 공군 이야기로 채워집니다.

description.hltext_display: 【ＶＷ ２０１０】サーバ仮想化に残された課題は“運用管理／セ
description.content:
閉幕トークセッションでは、日本オラクル、マイクロソフト、レッドハットの3社からキーパーソンが登壇し、サーバ仮想化とクラウド・コンピューティング基盤を巡る数々の課題について議論が行われた。司会（写真左端）はＣＩＯＭａｇａｚｉｎｅ編集長の福田悦朋が務めた
仮想化の適用は「適材適所」へ
日本の企業においてもサーバ仮想化技術の普及が急速に進みつつある。そして、サーバ仮想化の普及に伴って、その課題も浮き彫りになりつつあるようだ。トークセッションでは、サーバ仮想化やクラウド・コンピューティングの適用分野や課題について活発な論議が行われた。
日本オラクルテクノロジー製品事業統括本部Ｌｉｎｕｘ＆Ｖｉｒｔｕａｌｉｚａｔｉｏｎビジネス推進部部長林徹氏
まず、サーバ仮想化の適用分野について、日本オラクルのテクノロジー製品事業統括本部で、Ｌｉｎｕｘ＆Ｖｉｒｔｕａｌｉｚａｔｉｏｎビジネス推進部部長を務める林徹氏は、単純に社内にあるすべてのシステムを仮想化すればよいというものではない、と強調した。
「システム全体を見据えたうえで、どのシステムが仮想化に適しているかを見極める必要がある。ミッションクリティカルなシステムは、オラクルのグリッド・コンピューティングのような仮想化技術が適している。例えば、佐川急便を中核とするＳＧＨグループでは、オラクルのグリッド・コンピューティングを使うことで、物理サーバの追加だけでデータベースの処理能力を簡単に向上させることができる基盤構築に成功した」
林氏は、サーバ仮想化は特に中小規模のサーバ統合や、開発環境において効果を発揮するという。仮想化技術とテンプレートを駆使することによって、例えば、これまで丸一日かかっていたようなデータベースのクラスタリングなどの検証もわずか30分で可能になると説明した。
サーバ仮想化のさらなる浸透で
セルフサービス・モデルが不可欠に
マイクロソフトサーバープラットフォームビジネス本部シニアエグゼクティブプロダクトマネージャー中野雅由氏
「オンプレミス（自社運用型）モデルにもクラウド・モデルにも、また仮想環境にも物理環境にも柔軟に対応することができ、システム全体を統合的に運用／管理できるフレームワークを設計することが重要になる」と指摘したのは、マイクロソフトのサーバープラットフォームビジネス本部でシニアエグゼクティブプロダクトマネージャーを務める中野雅由氏だ。
中野氏はさらに、プライベート・クラウドでもパブリック・クラウドでも統一的に利用できるユーザーＩＤ管理に基づくシングル・サインオン環境の重要性、そしてオンプレミス／クラウドの両方のリソース利用に対応する課金環境を、テンプレートを使ってユーザー自ら容易に実現するセルフサービス基盤の重要性について説いた。
「サーバ仮想化がさらに普及すれば、企業ユーザーが運用するサーバ（論理サーバ）の数は飛躍的に増加する。その結果、企業の情報システム部門がすべてのサーバを運用／管理するのは困難になるため、セルフサービスのモデルが不可欠となる」（中野氏）
レッドハットマーケティング本部部長中井雅也氏
レッドハットのマーケティング本部部長、中井雅也氏は、「現状では、サーバ仮想化を実現するハイパーバイザにしても、クラウド環境にしても、提供するベンダー間で互換性がないため、これらを統合的に運用／管理することができない。こうした互換性を確保するためには、標準化を進める必要がある」と指摘した。
こうしたクラウド環境の相互運用性を確保するために、レッドハットでは「Ｄｅｌｔａｃｌｏｕｄ」と呼ばれるオープンな共通ＡＰＩを開発、プロジェクトをＡｐａｃｈｅＳｏｆｔｗａｒｅＦｏｕｎｄａｔｉｏｎ（ＡＳＦ）に移管するとともに、ＤＭＴＦ（ＤｉｓｔｒｉｂｕｔｅｄＭａｎａｇｅｍｅｎｔＴａｓｋＦｏｒｃｅ）に標準化を申請しているという。各クラウドが共通のＡＰＩに対応することで、プライベート・クラウドとパブリック・クラウド間のアプリケーション移行が容易になる、と中井氏は説明した。
このほかにも、プライベート・クラウドの構築における課題と事例、クラウド利用時の課金環境などについて議論が交わされ、仮想化技術の現状と未来を語る同イベントを締めくくった。（情報提供：Ｃｏｍｐｕｔｅｒｗｏｒｌｄ）
【関連記事・情報】

・ローソン、人事管理ＳａａＳのエンワイゼンを買収へ(2010/12/21)
・フリースケール、2011年度ＣＥＳに23台のタブレットを出品――うち11台はすでに発売済み(2010/12/20)

description.hltext_display: Downs duo reveal frustration
description.content:
Johannesburg - Esrom Nyandoro admits that he is frustrated not to be playing a part in Mamelodi Sundowns' clash with AmaZulu.
The league-leaders face Usuthu at the Lucas Moripe Stadium on Wednesday evening in their last game of 2010.
However, the Zimbabwe international will have to watch from the sidelines, due to suspension, as the Brazilians aim to extend their six point lead at the summit of the PSL table.
The Sundowns skipper told the club's official website: "Watching from the stands will be an odd experience but I have faith in our team as the squad has depth and that should see us through against Amazulu.
"As the captain you want to lead the team out for every game without fail but for tomorrow I will leave that to Matthew (Booth) and I am sure that the team will give him the same commitment and support."
Sundowns will also be without the other half of their key midfield duo with Matty Pattison also suspended for the clash. But the Bafana ace is confident his teammates can do the job.
"I believe that our team has enough depth and quality to do the job for us," he said.
"Young guys like Buhle are knocking very loudly on the door and this will give them an opportunity to stake a claim for a starting berth.
"It may be that I will lose out on a place for our first game in January as these guys are the real deal.
"But rest assured I will be at the game to support our team."

event_or_fact.property: I believe that our team has enough depth and quality to do the job for us
he is frustrated not to be playing a part in Mamelodi Sundowns' clash with AmaZulu.

description.hltext_display: Worst of celebrity health in 2010: Cancer, illness strikes famous celebs
description.author: Sunny Pepper
description.content:
The year 2010 brought sad moments both in death and health issues involving celebrities. From soul singers to kings of the big screen, bad luck in health didn't steer clear of the most highlighted, Hollywood cases in 2010.� QUEEN OF SOUL ARETHA FRANKLIN BANNED FROM PERFORMANCE
After undergoing "...a highly successful surgery on December 2 for an undisclosed ailment", it was later reported that Aretha Franklin is fighting pancreatic cancer. The 68-year-old singer has canceled all of her holiday and personal appearances through May 2011. While Aretha plans to spend the holidays with family and looks forward to a full recovery, pancreatic cancer is a fast moving cancer which causes questions and deep concerns from fans about her future health in the New Year.
MICHAEL DOUGLAS: BAD SMOKING, DRINKING LED TO THROAT DEMISE
Another celebrity enduring star suffering from cancer is actor Michael Douglas. Diagnosed with a walnut sized tumor near the base of his tongue earlier in the year, the Oscar-winning actor was� reported to have been fighting back hard against his advanced throat cancer. Multiple reports indicated that Dougas posed for a number of "set-up appearances" where he was to appear energized and in recovery; however, many sources claim Douglas acted "frail and sick" when not on camera.� � "DEXTER" STAR MICHAEL HALL BATTLES CANCER Michael C. Hall, the star of "Dexter," announced he was battling Hodgkin's Lymphoma� while making his first public appearance, according to Sky News Online. Awarded a Golden Globes as Best Actor for his TV series, his wife Jennifer Carpenter� also co-stars in the hit show. At first, the couple kept the cancer a secret from cast and fans but later issued updates that Hall is undergoing treatment and is now in remission.� � ROBERT DOWNEY, JR.'S MYSTERY ILLNESS In October 2010,� Entertainment Online reported that Robert Downey Jr. was struck with a mystery illness when the actor failed to show for a curtain call in London, England on the set of Guy Ritchie's "Sherlock Holmes". Claiming he felt "under the weather", the 45-year-old actor forced movie production to a halt and some feared he'd relapsed into drug use from the past.� Nine years sober and no drugs in sight, Robert returned to work despite the "mystery illness", which consisted of flu-like symptoms, and nothing else was reported following the buzz. � KILLER DISEASE MALARIA STRIKES CHERYbL COLE "Girls Aloud" singer, Cheryl Cole took a six months hiatus from work taken six months off work after suffering from headaches and fever.The 27-year-old songstress reportedly contracted malaria, a killer disease, which is assumed will interrupt her performance and show schedule well into 2011. Cole was too sick to complete on the reality, television series "The X Factor" this year and will most likely pull out of the "V Festival" due to her condition. In addition, the October launch of her new album was postponed to a later date. Want more?� Stay updated on celebrity workout, fitness and health news by Have a tip? Want more on your favorite celebrity?� E-mail me for press inquiries and coverage requests at celebtreehouse [at] gmail [dot] com

description.hltext_display: 台东爱心菜贩陈树菊获选台湾好人好事代表(图)
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据台湾“中广新闻”报道，台东善心女菜贩陈树菊，再接获台湾好人好事运动协会通知，获选台湾好人好事代表，23日将在台北接受“八德奖”的表扬。
陈树菊在1997年捐了100万元(新台币，下同)给母校台东仁爱小学，作为学童急难救助奖学金；5年前再将多年来卖菜的积蓄450万元捐给母校盖图书馆，现在她依然每天在菜市场卖菜，希望能再赚些钱帮助更多小朋友。
陈树菊这次是由户籍所在的台东市“建国里”推荐，经由台东县府呈转台湾表扬好人好事运动协会，经初审、复审及决审等程序，获选台湾好人好事代表，她也是台东县唯一的获选受奖者。
据悉，陈树菊长年来的行善义举，在2010年已分别获得“亚太地区四杰出善心人士”、美国时代杂志百大全球影响力人物、并获颁台当局“教育部”颁发“一等教育文化奖章”，这是台湾教育界最高荣耀，也是历年来唯一只有小学学历的得奖者。

description.hltext_display: KP: Sledgers can't top Warne
description.content:
Melbourne - England's Kevin Pietersen on Wednesday said Australia's current team could not out-sledge Test greats Shane Warne and Glenn McGrath, dismissing a sharp rise in verbal clashes during the Ashes series.
Pietersen said he had faced some "pretty big verbal contests" during England's last tour of Australia, when the legendary bowlers were still playing, but had seen nothing unusual in this year's Tests.
Both teams have acknowledged raised temperatures during the home team's series-levelling win in Perth, with England's James Anderson and Matthew Prior in the thick of it along with Australia's Mitchell Johnson and Peter Siddle.
"There's not really any big chirpers or big sledgers, it's just England versus Australia. It's an Ashes series," said the South African-born batsman.
"Blokes get a bit of red mist occasionally. You're allowed to do that on both teams. You're playing for a little urn. It's historic. It's huge. But there's nothing that's been overboard."
Australia had not won a Test since July until they wrapped up the big 267-run win on Sunday in a performance marked by a return to their traditional aggression. The series is poised 1-1 going into Sunday's penultimate Test.
Australia were ordered to tone down their sledging after the notorious 2008 Sydney Test against India, when alleged racial remarks prompted an angry public backlash against a team dubbed the "Unloveables".
But Australian Cricketers' Association chief executive Paul Marsh said the softer approach had hindered the side, which was toppled from the top Test ranking last year and has since fallen as low as fifth.
"I think there's no doubt the team's performance has been affected," Marsh told the Sydney Morning Herald.
"Hard aggressive cricket is in the Australian team's DNA and unfortunately the players started second-guessing their natural instincts in the heat of battle for fear of reprisal from CA (Cricket Australia) or a public backlash from the vocal minority."
Cricket Australia spokesperson Peter Young admitted that the team went through a "period of introspection" after the 2008 backlash.
"But the public has consistently told us since then, through three years of research, that they are totally comfortable with on-field aggression as long as it is hard but fair cricket," he told the Herald.
"What the public saw in Perth, from my understanding of the public mood, was completely acceptable."
Meanwhile Pietersen was also confident that England spearhead Anderson would be fit for the hotly anticipated Boxing Day Test despite a side strain.
Cricket Australia says 91 000 people could pack the cavernous Melbourne Cricket Ground for day one on Sunday, outstripping the 90 800 who flocked there in 1961 for the fifth Test against the West Indies.

description.hltext_display: 等待了40年的开花
description.content:
——版纳植物园一株贝叶棕即将演绎生命最后的精彩
文章来源：西双版纳热带植物园
发布时间：2010-12-22
【字号： 小 中 大 】
西双版纳热带植物园中，一株树龄在40年左右的贝叶棕（Corypha umbraculifera Linn. ）马上就要开花了。这棵贝叶棕，全身都被榕树缠绕，合为一体，在贝叶棕的树顶上，一株长约2米的花序已经从叶丛中脱颖而出，即将演绎生命最后的精彩，此现象非常难得。
西双版纳民族地区的傣族宗教人士，常常在贝叶上记录历史，而刻制贝叶经的贝叶，就是贝叶棕的硕大叶片。在古代印度,皈依佛门的教徒把经文刻写在贝叶棕的叶片上,创造了流传千古的贝叶经。《酉阳杂俎 广动植物之三》中有记载说，“贝多树出摩伽陀国，长六七丈，经冬不凋。此树有三种，……西域经书，用此三种皮叶。”贝叶棕通常高20米左右，长得高大、雄伟，树干笔直，浑圆，没有枝桠，树冠象一把巨伞，叶片象手掌一样散开，是热带地区绿化环境的优良树种。贝叶棕也是“一次性花果植物”，大约40年开花一次，一生只开一次花，植物学上叫一次性花果植物。花期1～3月，果期翌年4～5月。果熟之后毅然而去。
据研究，佛寺院内种植的贝叶棕原产印度、斯里兰卡等地，是随着佛教的传播而传入的，至今已有700多年的历史了。人们把剑形的贝叶叶片经过简单的加工：修整、压平、水煮、晒干，然后装订成册，用特制“铁笔”就可在上面流利刻写文字了，刻完后涂上植物油，叶面上就出现清晰的字迹。贝叶经久耐用，使用次数的增加不但不会腿色反而能使字迹越来越清楚，现存百年之久的贝叶经仍字字清晰可辨。
贝叶棕开花（摄影：李昌平）

description.hltext_display: 깜짝 놀랄만한 이색 청첩장 大공개
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
[서울신문 나우뉴스TV]
식상한 종이 청첩장, 성의없는 이메일·문자 메세지가 아닌 CF 모바일 청첩장이 등장해 눈길을 끈다.
모바일 영상 청첩장 전문업체 ‘알리모’는 예비 신랑신부의 웨딩사진을 이용해 20초 CF를 제작해 MMS로 보내는 방식으로, 데이터 연결서비스와는 달리 MMS 문자 형태로 보내지기 때문에 받는 사람이 별도의 요금부과 없이 영상 문자를 바로 받아 볼 수 있다. 또 스마트폰에서는 링크를 통해 고화질 영상도 볼 수 있다.
CF 모바일 청첩장 서비스는 결혼하기 전 사람들에게 신랑신부의 모습을 영상으로 보여줄 수 있다는 점, 주소없이 핸드폰 번호만 있어도 보낼 수 있다는 점, 영상이 있기 때문에 각인이 잘된다는 점 등 장점이 많아 젊은층에서 인기가 높다.
‘알리모’ 심채윤 대표는 “굳이 종이 청첩장을 들고 다니지 않아도 핸드폰을 통해 바로 전달도 가능하다.”며 “영상에는 행복한 모습의 신랑신부 모습을, 1000자까지 쓸 수 있는 문자란에는 예식날짜, 예식장, 기타 하고싶은 말도 남길 수 있다.”고 소개했다.
한편 ‘알리모’ (www.alimo.co.kr)에서는 결혼 청첩장 뿐만아니라 돌잔치 초대장, 크리스마스카드, 연하장 등 영상 문자로 보낼 수 있으며, 연인에게 특별한 메세지를 남기고 싶을 때에도 이용할 수 있다.
서울신문 나우뉴스TV 김상인VJ bowwow@seoul.co.kr

description.hltext_display: Nina Kronjäger kann sich Fortsetzung von "Abgeschminkt!" vorstellen
description.content:
vor 5 Min.
Berlin (dapd). Die Schauspielerin Nina Kronjäger hätte Lust auf eine Fortsetzung ihres Kinodebütfilms "Abgeschminkt!". "Katja Riemann und ich haben tatsächlich darüber nachgedacht. Es könnten alle damaligen Kollegen wieder mitspielen. Das wäre witzig, fast 20 Jahre später!", sagte die 43-Jährige der "Bild"-Zeitung. Mit 43 Jahren habe sie inzwischen schon Angst, keine guten Rollen mehr zu bekommen, fügte sie hinzu. Kronjäger hatte in dem Film von Katja von Garnier aus dem Jahr 1993 die Krankenschwester Maischa gespielt, Riemann die Cartoonistin Frenzy. Diesen Artikel weiter lesen

description.hltext_display: 百变女王眼妆 贴出自然假睫毛(图)
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据台湾《联合报》报道，随着冬天的到来，节庆味也愈来愈浓了。跨年期间也是派对盛行的好日子，在那么多的场合中，要以什么样的妆容出席才能最吸睛呢？台湾造型师古小伟教你几种不同的方式，轻松赢得众人目光！ 假睫毛是现在很多女性朋友喜欢始用的彩妆小道具，不过要怎么贴、怎么画才能让戴上假睫毛的眼妆自然又好看呢？来看彩妆达人古小伟老师怎么说吧！
步骤1.眉毛顺着眉型描绘，眉尾线条要更鲜明，眉头则要柔和晕开，呈现出立体感。
步骤2.选择毛较扎实的小眼影刷，沾取纯黑色眼影、甩掉余粉后，刷在睫毛根部约0.2公分的范围，自然向上晕染。
步骤3.用纯黑色眼影画下眼线，从眼尾往中间拉到约二分之一处，眼尾处较宽，并与上眼皮的黑色眼影连接。
步骤4.许多人怕假睫毛不自然，偏好透明梗的假睫毛，其实选择有梗的假睫毛，反而能撑起眼皮，让眼睛看起来更大。

description.hltext_display: パナソニック、株式交換でパナソニック電工と三洋電機を完全子会
description.content:
パナソニック（大坪文雄社長）は、12月21日、株式交換によってパナソニック電工（長榮周作社長）と三洋電機（佐野精一郎社長）を完全子会社化することを発表した。パナソニック電工と三洋電機は2011年3月29日に上場廃止となり、4月1日にパナソニックの完全子会社となる。3社は、12年1月をめどに「コンシューマ」「デバイス」「ソリューション」の3事業分野に組織を統合・再編する。
パナソニック電工の株式交換は、11年3月2日開催予定の臨時株主総会の承認を受けて、また三洋電機の株式交換は、11年3月4日開催予定の臨時株主総会の承認を受けて行われる予定。パナソニックについては、会社法第796条第3項の規定に基づく簡易株式交換の手続きによって、株主総会の承認を受けずに行われる。パナソニック電工と三洋電機の最終売買日は11年3月28日。
パナソニックは、パナソニック電工、三洋電機と一体になることで、「お客様接点の強化による価値創出の最大化」「スピーディで筋肉質な経営の実現」「大胆なリソースシフトによる成長事業の加速」を図っていく。12年1月をめどに、「お客様価値の最大化」を基軸に3社の事業・販売部門を再編し、「コンシューマ」「デバイス」「ソリューション」の3事業分野で最適なビジネスモデルを構築し、グローバル競争を勝ち抜く体制の確立を目指す。
コンシューマ事業分野は、グループのマーケティング機能をグローバルに再編。前線の機能強化を図り、お客様起点の商品づくりを加速するとともに、国内外のマーケティングリソースを戦略的に配分し、とくに海外コンシューマ事業の強化を図る。
デバイス事業分野は、ビジネスモデルが共通するデバイスごとに、開発・製造・販売の連携を強化。マーケティングと技術が一体となり、顧客の潜在ニーズを先取りした提案型ビジネスを強化し、社内用途に依存しない自立した事業として拡大を図る。三洋電機の二次電池事業、ソーラー事業などの強みや顧客ネットワークを最大限に生かす。
ソリューション事業分野は、ビジネス顧客に対するソリューションごとに開発・製造・販売を一元化。顧客ニーズをスピーディに捉え、最適な商品・サービス・ソリューションを最速で提供することを目指す。さらに、各ソリューションを包含した「家・ビル・街まるごとソリューション」を加速する。パナソニック電工の強みや顧客ネットワークを最大限に生かす。
本社部門についても、3社の組織を統合・スリム化しつつ、戦略機能を強化し、筋肉質でスピーディなグローバル本社を目指す。再編によって、「ＳＡＮＹＯ」ブランドについては、将来的に原則「Ｐａｎａｓｏｎｉｃ」に統一する方向で検討中。ただし、事業・地域によっては一部継続する予定としている。（情報提供：ＢＣＮ ＢｉｚＬｉｎｅ）
【関連記事・情報】

・日立情報、ＰＫＩパッケージを中国企業の上海微創にＯＥＭ提供(2010/12/21)

description.hltext_display: ノボット、アドウェイズとスマートフォン向けリワード広告で業務提携
description.content:
ノボットは12月21日、スマートフォン向けリワード広告サービス「AppDriver」を提供するアドウェイズと業務提携し、ノボットが運営するスマートフォン向けアドネットワーク「AdMaker」を導入しているアプリ開発者に「AdMakerリワード」を提供開始した。
リワード広告は、アプリを利用するユーザーがアプリ内の広告から新規アプリへの登録やスポンサーサイトでの商品購入などのアクションを起こすことにより、そのアプリ内で利用できるポイントやアイテムを獲得できる仕組み。AdMakerリワードはこのリワード広告を、AdMakerを導入しているアプリ開発者が無料で利用できるようにするもの。

description.hltext_display: Sixers pounded on road by balanced Bulls
description.content:
CHICAGO – On most nights the Sixers give themselves a chance to win because they play consistent defense. Tuesday night the Sixers had no chance of beating the Chicago Bulls because they left their defense either on the team bus or out in the Chicago cold in a whopping 121-76 loss.
“I said to them after, this is really about where you guys want to go from here,” Doug Collins said of his postgame comments to his players. “Because we as coaches know what we’ve been preaching, and this is not indicative of the way we have been playing.”
An 18-point halftime deficit grew to 40. Yes, 40, with 46 seconds remaining in the third quarter.
If not for a Marreese Speights' jumper at the buzzer it would have stayed at 40. Instead, the score was 92-54 heading into the final 12 minutes.
How could such a quarter happen? Well, for starters the Sixers turned the ball over seven times. They allowed the Bulls to shoot 66 percent from the floor. Of Chicago’s 31 points scored, 10 of them were on the fast break.
It was a difficult game to watch because it so lacked the characteristics that this team has come to hang its hat on – playing hard, sharing the basketball and executing with precision.
It couldn’t get worse, could it?
It was difficult to fathom, but it did. At the midway point of the fourth quarter, the deficit had grown to 49 points, and it peaked at 51.
“We were discombobulated on offense. I didn’t even recognize us tonight,” Collins said. “It was like five strangers. I said in a timeout, ‘What are we running?’ I didn’t even know what plays we were running.”
Derrick Rose and Luol Deng led Chicago with 22 points each. Rose also had 12 assists and zero turnovers. Carlos Boozer also had a double-double with 16 points and 11 rebounds.
The Sixers had two players in double figures, as Andre Iguodala had 17 points, and Thaddeus Young added 12.
Iguodala felt the Sixers had become lackadaisical long before Tuesday’s defeat.
“We have been getting by with some good wins at home,” Iguodala observed. “But we haven’t been playing good basketball, and other teams haven’t been playing well against us. Then we start winning, teams wake up and aren’t going to go to sleep on you anymore. We had a couple days to scout them and they had a couple days to scout us and they executed much better then we did.”
The Sixers shot just 35 percent from the floor compared to Chicago’s 65.
They were also crushed in two categories that go a long way towards telling their success: they were outscored 28-9 on the fast break and 31-11 off turnovers.
The Sixers’ defense had been put on a pedestal of late because they had jumped to second in the league in opponents’ lowest field goal percentage and three-point percentage. They allowed the Bulls to shoot 62 percent in Tuesday’s first half and 50 percent from behind the arc and were outscored 13-2 on the break.
The halftime hole was one they would never climb out of, instead digging it deeper and deeper.
Chicago was minus two big men in Joakim Noah (thumb surgery) and Taj Gibson (concussion) and yet the Sixers’ Elton Brand and Spencer Hawes could not take advantage. The two combined to shoot 2-of-8 in the first half, with Hawes actually being held scoreless.
Hawes took a seat for good after playing 18 minutes and grabbing just two rebounds while remaining scoreless. Brand finished with six points and nine rebounds.
Meanwhile, Chicago’s counterparts of Boozer and Kurt Thomas were 13-for-22 and had pulled down a combined 19 rebounds.
“We didn’t see this game coming,” Brand said. “I don’t know if we took them lightly with two big guys not playing, but they just really took it to us. This is a good old-fashioned butt-kicking, but we’ll bounce back from it though.”
The engine that makes the Bulls go is clearly Rose. The point guard had 13 first-half points and seven assists in addition to having zero turnovers that set the tone for the Bulls as they improved to 17-9.
Jrue Holiday had as poor a game as he's had in recent memory. His non-existent defense on Rose led to him being replaced early in the first quarter and again early in the third.
Collins preaches that if you defend you will stay on the court; if you don’t then find a seat on the bench because your substitute will. Evan Turner was that guy on this night.
Turner, who grew up in Chicago, played 30 minutes and finished with four points and two assists. Turner’s rebounding skills, clearly a strength of his in the early going this season, took the night off, as he only grabbed one board.
Jodie Meeks couldn't help provide an offensive spark as he continued to struggle with his shot. Over his last four games he is 8-of-29 from the floor and 3-for-16 from three. Compare those numbers with the five-game stretch that preceded where he made 27-of-60 field goal attempts and hit nearly half of his three-point shots (15-of-32).
All in all, Tuesday night was a game to forget for the Sixers, but not before they learned from it.
“We have another game tomorrow, so do you want another a--whooping, or do you want to compete and try to get a win before the break?” Iguodala proposed.
The Sixers now will have to regroup against in Boston against the Eastern Conference-leading Celtics. They will then have two days off before heading west for a five-game trip.
E-mail Dei Lynam at dlynam@comcastsportsnet.com.

description.hltext_display: US Senate repeals ‘don’t ask, don’t tell’ ban
description.content:
US Senate repeals 'don't ask, don't tell' ban
Source: Global Times
The US Senate voted 65-31 on Saturday and joined the House of Representatives in repealing the compromise requiring gay soldiers to keep quiet about their sexual orientation or face dismissal, commonly known as"don't ask, don't tell."
"It's time to recognize that sacrifice, valor and integrity are no more defined by sexual orientation than they are by race or gender, religion or creed," said Obama, who finally fulfilled one of his main campaign promises. He was expected to sign the new law this week.
Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, whose husband Bill had enacted the "don't ask, don't tell" policy when he was president, said the repeal would strengthen US support for human rights internationally.
"This is a historic step forward for all Americans, a step toward a more perfect union and a more perfect reflection of our core values," she said.
During the 17 years it was in vigor, more than 13,000 troops were dismissed, including some that critics of the policy said had been trained at great cost, such as fighter pilots, or those who possessed key skills such as Arabic translators.
The Pentagon conducted a comprehensive study this year gathering the opinions of military personnel on repealing the ban. More than 70 percent agreed to have homosexuals serve openly, and did not think this would affect military readiness.
The Pentagon will have an undetermined time of months to educate service members and prepare for the policy change before it is ready to "certify" the repeal.

event_or_fact.property: This is a historic step forward for all Americans, a step toward a more perfect union and a more perfect reflection of our core values
It's time to recognize that sacrifice, valor and integrity are no more defined by sexual orientation than they are by race or gender, religion or creed

description.hltext_display: 【內地樓市】美聯(01200-HK)料內地明年首季將有調控，樓價再升逾1
description.content:
新聞首頁 > 港股 > 公司新聞 > 內文 0%
鉅亨網新聞中心 (來源：財華社) 2010-12-22 16:25:02 網友評論 條 我來說兩句
美聯中國全國研究中心主管徐楓於記者會表示，預計明年內地宏觀調控持續嚴厲，料繼「國10條」、「國11條」後的第三輪措施將於明年首季出臺；美聯集團執行董事兼中國行政總裁郭應龍稱，明年中央將採取加息並配合其他政策抑制樓價漲幅，其中他料年初將有新稅收政策出臺。
郭應龍指，預測明年內地住宅樓價全年升幅為10至15%，其中一線城市漲勢放緩，而二線城市樓價跑贏大市。
被問及二線城市樓價跑贏大市的原因，徐楓指，投資者對二三線城市住宅物業更為熱衷，一線城市則更多向商業樓宇投資，她亦指出8成投資客擁有充裕的手頭現金，並較為偏好長三角、珠三角、重慶、成都等地的住宅物業;她更表示，明年二線城市樓價升幅有機會達25%。

description.hltext_display: 福建陈靖姑信俗文化首次赴台民间交流
description.content:
中新社福州12月22日电 (记者 张羽)陈靖姑信俗文化交流团22日上午从福州启程赴台交流，为期一周。这是第一次由民间开展的国家级非物质文化遗产――陈靖姑文化赴台交流活动，也是继陈靖姑金身起驾赴台巡游后两岸陈靖姑信俗文化的再次聚首。 福州市陈靖姑故居管委会主任郑炜向中新社记者介绍说，该交流团共24人，由福州陈靖姑故居等7个陈靖姑宫观的负责人组成 ，他们将前往台湾的各大陈靖姑临水夫人宫观祭拜参访。
陈靖姑是福建两大女神之一，被尊奉为“顺天圣母临水夫人”，与“海上女神”妈祖齐名。陈靖姑作为惩恶扬善、护国佑民的“陆上女神”，以中华民族的传统美德和崇高人格，不仅把海峡两岸信众的心连在一起，也在海峡两岸之间架起了沟通的桥梁。
“此次交流团赴台不仅会考察闽台陈靖姑文化的存系纽带，而且还会进一步了解台湾当地的陈靖姑文化与福州本地的陈靖姑文化有何异同。”郑炜表示，两岸信众将共祈这位“陆上女神”照亮海峡两岸的和平。
近年来，闽台两地陈靖姑文化交流持续不断，每年都有包括近万名台胞在内的数十万海内外信众通过各种方式回到祖庙进香朝拜。尤其是，2009年10月，两岸信众盼望多年的夙愿――顺天圣母陈靖姑金身正式起驾赴台巡游，在台湾掀起了一波陈靖姑民俗文化热潮。今年3月，两岸“陈靖姑金身”回故里，来自两岸的26支临水宫观代表团共500多人，齐聚福州陈靖姑出生地，举行规模空前的谒祖进香仪式。
目前，福建古田临水宫祖庙在全球已有分宫分庙4000余座，信仰人口达8000余万人，信众遍布福建、浙江、江西和台湾、香港、澳门地区以及东南亚、欧美等地。其中，在台湾以顺天圣母陈靖姑为主神的宗庙就有400多座，配祀有顺天圣母神位的寺庙多达3000余座，信众达上千万人。(完)

description.hltext_display: IBM、ネティーザ買収後もNECとDWHアプライアンスの共同開発を継続
description.content:
米IBMとNECは12月22日、11月のIBMによるNetezzaの買収完了後も、NECとNetezzaが合意したデータウェアハウス（DWH）アプライアンスの共同開発契約を継続すると発表した。同契約に基づき、今後もNECは共同開発したDWHアプライアンスを全世界に向けて販売していくとしている。
米IBMは9月にNetezzaを約17億ドルで買収すると発表。米国時間の11月11日に買収の完了を発表している。IBMは、同買収について、（BAO）コンサルティング組織が提供するサービスを含む、情報およびアナリティクス事業を強化するものだとしている。
一方、NECとNetezzaは、2月にDWH製品の共同開発を発表。その第1弾として「」の販売を4月に開始しており、四国コカ・コーラボトリングをはじめ6社への導入が決定しているという。
NECブランドで共同開発したアプライアンスは、Netezzaのストリーミングアーキテクチャおよび分析データベースソフトウェアと、NECのサーバおよびストレージプラットフォームとを組み合わせた製品。NECは、多くのユーザーへ多様なDWH製品を導入した実績があり、そのうち、NetezzaアーキテクチャのDWH製品については、日本だけでも25社を超えるトップ企業へ展開しているとする。NECでは今後、IBMと共同開発したアプライアンスによって、DWHビジネスのさらなる成長を目指すとしている。

description.hltext_display: Obama to celebrate pre-Christmas wins (AAP)
description.content:
President Barack Obama is poised to cheer a new START and end an era of military discrimination, in a sweet coda to a year marked by anemic economic growth and a Republican revival.
Obama will sign into law a repeal of a ban on gays serving openly in the military - a long-held liberal dream - while the Senate is expected to ratify a new START nuclear arms deal with Russia, a cornerstone of his foreign policy.
He will travel to the Interior Department in Washington early on Wednesday to sign the law overturning the "Don't Ask, Don't Tell" policy on gay soldiers, amid likely scenes of jubilation from rights activists.
Obama promised to overturn the ban as he vowed to deliver "Change You Can Believe In" during his 2008 campaign, and the new law passed by Congress over the weekend will repair tattered ties with liberal grass-roots activists.
The US Senate meanwhile is expected to reach the end of a tortuous slog and finally ratify the new Strategic Arms Reduction Treaty (START) with Russia, which Obama has billed as vital to his "reset" of ties with Moscow.
After a fierce Senate battle, 11 Republicans broke with party leaders eager to hand Obama a crushing defeat, rallying more than the two-thirds majority - 60 votes - needed to ratify the pact.
A final vote on the treaty is expected by Wednesday afternoon.
The pact restricts each nation to a maximum of 1550 deployed warheads, a cut of about 30 per cent from a limit set in 2002, and 800 launchers and bombers.
The accord would also grant access to US inspectors who have been unable to monitor Russia's arsenal since the treaty's predecessor lapsed in December 2009.
It will mark a personal milestone for Obama, who turned to arms control issues even before he entered the Senate in 2005, and made a call as president for the eventual elimination of all nuclear weapons from the planet.
The White House has also delivered broad hints that Obama will hold an end-of-year press conference to frame thepolitical mood and position himself for the new realities in a divided Washington next year.
He is expected to then leave to join his family for his annual Christmas vacation in his native Hawaii, either Wednesday or Thursday.
Both legislative wins emerged from a surprisingly productive "lame duck" session of Congress that helped reinvigorate Obama's political fortunes after a humiliating reverse for his Democrats in November's mid-term elections.
The late-year session also included a deal with Republicans to extend tax cuts passed under former president George W. Bush that infuriated liberals because they included a break for the wealthiest Americans.
But Obama, noting the bill included extra unemployment benefits and arguing it will boost the economy, says the legislation was the kind of painful bipartisan compromise needed to get the people's work done in Washington.
The much-needed victories will also mark the end of an era of sorts for Obama as the new Republican-led House of Representatives will block the kind of sweeping social and economic reform legislation that has characterised his presidency.
Instead, Obama will have to fight a fierce battle on the budget and protect his signature political victories, like the healthcare reform and regulatory reform bills passed earlier this year.
The focus will inexorably turn to the 2012 elections as Republicans seek to thwart his campaign for a second term while the president hopes for a political payoff from a revived economy and a fall in unemployment, currently at 9.8 per cent.Obama's approval ratings have held remarkably steady this year - between 45 and 50 per cent in most polls - hardly terminal for a first-term president.
But without a substantial fall in unemployment, the president will be hard pressed to make the case to voters that he deserves another two years in the White House.Obama's aides argue that the recent legislation could provide a template for future work across the aisle.
"I think there is a lesson of the importance that these issues have with not just those on Capitol Hill but with the American people," White House spokesman Robert Gibbs said.
But given the recent history of gridlock, anger and fierce partisanship on Capitol Hill, few observers expected a new era of compromise.

event_or_fact.property: to overturn the ban as he vowed to deliver "Change You Can Believe In" during his 2008 campaign, and the new law passed by Congress over the weekend will repair tattered ties with liberal grass-roots activists
I think there is a lesson of the importance that these issues have with not just those on Capitol Hill but with the American people
the legislation was the kind of painful bipartisan compromise needed to get the people's work done in Washington

description.hltext_display: 台湾11月失业率可望再降 金融业职缺需求多
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据台湾《联合晚报》报道，台当局“主计处”22日下午公布11月失业率，继10月提前降破5%后，失业率预期会持续下探，人力专家表示，10月到11月求职人数再降3.6万名，显示市场消化求职者速度快，预期到2011年上半年为止失业率会以平均0.1个百分点的降幅回稳。目前求供比最高的产业仍为保险业，高达31.9，职务类则以金融专业相关人员求供比最高，即金融行业人员的职位需求较多。 据报道，10月份失业率为4.92%，失业人数尚有54.6万人，但适逢年底到2011年过年的消费旺季，零售、餐饮与旅游业人力需求持续畅旺，部分科技大厂也大批招募；1111人力银行公关总监何启圣表示，未来每个月失业率将能以0.1个百分点内的幅度稳步下降，而此趋势将随着年后的转职潮持续发酵，预期到2011年上半年为止就业市场畅旺，机会多。
104人力银行公关经理方光玮也表示，他观察资料库中第四季的线上有效求职者数与工作机会数，10月份工作数35.3万，比求职者35.1万稍多；但11月至12月工作机会维持34.9 万、35.9万，求职者数却大幅下降，11月降至31.5万人，12月甚至降破30万来到27.8万人，显示求职者消化速度快。
方光玮指出，内需型产业依旧主导目前就业市场的人力需求，12月份求供比最高的五大产业分别是保险、不动产、建筑或土木工程、金融机构及相关，和婚纱摄影及美发美容业。保险业求供比更高达31.9，指一位求职者可拥有30多笔工作机会。
据悉，求供比最高的职务则是金融专业相关(求供比3.4)，其次还有美容美发(2.9)、营建规划类(1.7)、业务销售类(1.7)及门市干部类人员(1.6)，提供求职者或转职者参考。

description.hltext_display: Greeks go on strike before austerity budget vote (Reuters)
description.content:
ATHENS (Reuters) - Greek unions called a general strike on Wednesday and Athens was paralyzed by a 24-hour public transport stoppage in protest against the government's 2011 budget, set to pass later as part of an EU/IMF bailout.
The budget, meant to help stem a debt crisis that has shaken the euro zone, includes further tax hikes and wage cuts in state-run enterprises, especially in public transport.
Fitch said on Tuesday it may cut Greece's credit rating next month to junk as both other major rating agencies have done.
"Even though this news was expected, it will go down badly with the markets, there is widespread fear about downgrades coming," said Ioanna Telioudi, analyst at HSBC in Athens.Greece's main public and private sector labor unions have called a 3-hour strike from 1000 to 1300 GMT (5 to 8 a.m. ET) in Athens. Thousands are expected to rally outside parliament.
Athens bus and subway drivers have been holding on and off strikes for two weeks, keeping Christmas shoppers from the city center, adding to the strain of recession-hit retailers.
The government threatened on Wednesday to break the public transport strikes, invoking emergency legislation it used earlier this year to dissolve Labor action by truck drivers and other transport workers.
"Everyone has to show responsibility ... the state has all the powers it needs to protect the public interest," government spokesman George Petalotis said in a television interview.
Analysts have warned the additional measures will hurt the economy even more without providing guarantees that the country will avoid a debt restructuring to cope with ballooning debt.
The government has a comfortable majority of 156 seats out of 300 in parliament and the budget is expected to be approved despite growing discontent among the ruling PASOK party ranks.
"I am giving the government a last chance," said PASOK deputy Thomas Robopoulos during the budget debate on Tuesday. Since the EU/IMF bailout agreement was signed in May, Prime Minister George Papandreou has expelled four deputies for disagreeing publicly with his austerity policies
The socialists, who revealed a gaping budget deficit after coming to power last year, have braved public discontent and taken draconian measures to meet the bailout terms.
The government has cut public sector wages by about 15 percent, increased the retirement age, frozen pensions, cut public spending but has failed to boost tax collection as much as targeted, despite a hefty VAT increase.Greece's lenders have said that the country was broadly on track with its fiscal program but needed to step up reforms and spending cuts next year.
Partly as a result of the measures, the economy is seen shrinking by 3 percent next year after a 4.2 percent drop in 2010, with unemployment jumping to a record 14.6 percent from an estimated 12.1 percent this year.
Greece targets a deficit of 7.4 percent of GDP next year, from about 9.4 percent this year.
Greek protesters clashed with police last week and set fire to cars and a hotel in central Athens earlier this month, as some 50,000 marched against austerity in the biggest and most violent march since three died in protests in May.
(Editing by Louise Ireland)

event_or_fact.property: Even though this news was expected, it will go down badly with the markets, there is widespread fear about downgrades coming; Thousands are expected to rally outside parliament.Athens bus and subway drivers have been holding on and off strikes for two wee
I am giving the government a last chance

Everyone has to show responsibility ... the state has all the powers it needs to protect the public interest; Analysts have warned the additional measures will hurt the economy even more without providing guarantees that the country will avoid a debt rest

description.hltext_display: 台湾校园霸凌调查：13%初中生是霸凌者
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据台湾《联合晚报》报道，针对台湾初中校园霸凌现象，台当局“教育部”2009年委托台湾中山大学的调查显示，初中校园存有13.3%的霸凌者、13.6%的人曾被霸凌，40.2%的人曾看过校园霸凌。然而，“教育部”霸凌通报统计，2009年只通报938件，甚至“教育部”反霸凌安全学校网站的内容空白，被“立委”痛批处于“休眠”状况。
台“立委”蒋乃辛22日在台“立法院教育文化委员会”质询，引述台湾中山大学上述调查表示，台湾初中生约95万人，相当于12余万的初中生是霸凌者，这件事不能只有“教育部长”一个人当作大事，其他部门也要动起来。“教育部长”吴清基答询时表示，他会结合“内政部”、“警政署”、“法务部”进行跨部门会报，共同防范校园霸凌。
民进党“立委”管碧玲则炮轰“教育部”，2011年度反霸凌专案只编列600万元(新台币，下同)预算，却编列800多万元补助学生参加升学典礼。
吴清基澄清说，“教育部”编了1.82亿元推动“反霸凌安全学校计划”。但管碧玲提出资料说，该计划有两大项目“安全学校认证”及“建立支持性网站”，委外设立，但其中“反霸凌安全学校网站”由“教育部”委托社团法人花莲县记忆空间学会承办，网站上的联络地址“花莲市富裕五街68号”，经查该址竟是一家茶艺馆，电话号码也不对。“教育部”军训处长王福林说，该网站是委托东华大学教授架设的，但吴清基看到管碧玲秀出的网站内容和茶艺馆照片时，脸色铁青说，要追究责任。

description.hltext_display: American Airlines Pulls Fares From Orbitz
description.content:
American Airlines pulled its flights from the Orbitz travel website on Tuesday in a dispute that could eventually affect the way travelers buy airplane tickets online.
The airline said its tickets sold previously on Orbitz are still valid. And American Airlines tickets can still be bought at the airline's own website as well as other travel websites. American pulled its tickets from the Orbitz for Business site as well.
The dispute is the latest sign of strains between airlines and the companies that sell airline tickets, including online sellers like Orbitz.
Airlines have traditionally paid sellers a commission. American also pays fees to the global distribution companies that provide the flight information.
Now, American wants Orbitz to get that flight information directly from the airline, cutting out the global distribution systems. American has said that will reduce costs and also allow it to make more personalized offers to customers such as hotels and car rentals.
The global distribution systems have not moved as fast as they could have to upgrade their technology, but American's move with Orbitz is "rather severe," said Henry Harteveldt, a travel analyst for Forrester Research. "It seems like they want to scorch the earth."
He predicted that travelers who want to fly on American will seek out its tickets on the airline's website. Travelers who don't know what happened with Orbitz, or don't care which airline they fly, are unlikely to notice American's absence from Orbitz, he said.
Traveler advocates have said American's move will make it harder to comparison shop.
"There is profit in confusion, there is profit in fragmentation of all the fares and the fees so consumers can't comparison shop," said Kevin Mitchell, chairman of the Business Travel Coalition, which represents corporate travel buyers.
He said airlines ultimately would like to flip the current financial arrangement around and have travel agents pay them for access to flight information, rather than American paying every time someone else sells a ticket on one of its flights.
American's vice president for sales, Derek DeCross, said in a statement that the airline needs to be "free to customize its product offerings to improve the customer experience as well as distribute its products in a way that does not result in unnecessary costs."
American had threatened to pull out of Orbitz on Dec. 1. But Orbitz got a state court judge in Chicago to block the threat temporarily. It made its move on Tuesday shortly after judge Martin S. Agran declined to issue an injunction. Agran ruled that any breach of contract can be sorted out with a lawsuit later.
The request to block American was brought by privately held Travelport Ltd., which owns 48 percent of Orbitz. It also runs two of the biggest so-called global distribution systems, Galileo and Worldspan. American spokesman Ryan Mikolasik said it has been negotiating with other online ticket sellers. The Orbitz negotiation was made more difficult because of Travelport's involvement as owner of the two global distribution systems, he said.
Orbitz Worldwide Inc. called American's decision "unfortunate" and said it still offers flights from more than 400 airlines worldwide and would continue to seek a way to sell American tickets, too. It said American Airlines tickets add-ons like rental cars and hotel rooms added up to about 5 percent of the company's revenue for the nine months that ended Sept. 30. It said it believes that any American Airlines tickets it loses will be replaced by tickets on other airlines.
Shares of American parent AMR Corp. rose 14 cents to close at $8.05. Orbitz shares rose 22 cents, or 3.5 percent, to close at $6.44, but then fell 16 cents, or 2.5 percent, to $6.28 in aftermarket trading.
Also Tuesday, Delta Air Lines Inc. said it would stop selling tickets through three smaller travel websites, CheapOAir.com, OneTravel.com, and BookIt.com effective on Dec. 17.
Last week a Delta executive told analysts that some ticket venues have more value than others. The airline wants "as direct a relationship and channel to our best customers as we can," said Glenn Hauenstein, Delta's executive vice president for network planning, revenue management, and marketing. He said he's aiming for Delta's own website to be more like an Apple store and suggested that other travel websites are more like Best Buy, with similar products, but a different customer experience, he said.
___
Freed reported from Minneapolis. AP Airlines Writer David Koenig in Dallas contributed to this report.

rather severe; It seems like they want to scorch the earth.
it has been negotiating with other online ticket sellers
Travelers who don't know what happened with Orbitz, or don't care which airline they fly, are unlikely to notice American's absence from Orbitz
The Orbitz negotiation was made more difficult because of Travelport's involvement as owner of the two global distribution systems

airlines ultimately would like to flip the current financial arrangement around and have travel agents pay them for access to flight information, rather than American paying every time someone else sells a ticket on one of its flights

in a statement that the airline needs to be "free to customize its product offerings to improve the customer experience as well as distribute its products in a way that does not result in unnecessary costs.
He said he's aiming for Delta's own website to be more like an Apple store and suggested that other travel websites are more like Best Buy, with similar products, but a different customer experience
There is profit in confusion, there is profit in fragmentation of all the fares and the fees so consumers can't comparison shop

description.hltext_display: Twin brothers possessing illegal drugs and weapons arrested in Virgin Islands
Traditionelle Berufswahl: Wenige Frauen haben Männerjobs – und umgekehrt
description.content:
Wenige Frauen haben Männerjobs – und umgekehrt
Maurer sind meistens Männer, Erzieher mehrheitlich Frauen: An der traditionellen Berufswahl hat sich trotz Emanzipation nicht viel geändert.
Allen Bemühungen um die Gleichberechtigung zum Trotz wählen die meisten ihren Beruf weiterhin nach eher traditionellen Vorstellungen aus. Der Anteil der Frauen an allen Erwerbstätigen ist hierzulande von 2001 bis 2009 zwar um 4,2 Prozentpunkte auf 45,8 Prozent gestiegen, wie das Statistische Bundesamt mitteilte. Die von Frauen und Männern bevorzugt ausgeübten Berufen dagegen haben sich demnach in dieser Zeit nur wenig verändert.
Deutschlands Chefinnen
In der Führung der 500 größten Unternehmen in Deutschland befinden sich nur 49 Frauen. Dies entspricht gerade einmal rund 2,4 % aller Vorstands- und Geschäftsführungspositionen in den Unternehmen.
Im Sommer 2009 nahmen 32 oder 65 % von ihnen an einer Umfrage der Führungskräfte-Agentur Odgers Berndtson zum Thema „Deutschlands Chefinnen – Wie Frauen es an die Unternehmensspitze schaffen" teil. Hier die wesentlichen Ergebnisse:
Die Begeisterung für ihre berufliche Aufgabe (94 %) und ihr persönlicher Ehrgeiz (63 %) waren die entscheidenden Motivatoren für die Karriere von Deutschlands Chefinnen. Macht (25 %) sowie Geld und Status (13 %) wurden deutlich seltener genannt.
Als eine der wichtigsten Eigenschaften, die sie persönlich am meisten für die Ausübung ihrer derzeitigen Führungsposition qualifizieren, nennen Deutschlands Chefinnen ihr Einfühlungsvermögen und ihre Kommunikationsstärke.
Die Mehrheit von Deutschlands Chefinnen (72 %) blieb ihrer Branche im Verlauf ihrer Karriere treu. 63 % wurden aus dem eigenen Unternehmen für ihre derzeitige Top-Führungsposition rekrutiert.
Keine der befragten Frauen bezeichnete die schwierige Vereinbarkeit von Familie und Beruf als Karrierehemmnis. Dabei sind 81 % der Chefinnen verheiratet oder leben in einer festen Lebensgemeinschaft, 44 % der Frauen haben Kinder.
44 % der Top-Managerinnen befürworten die Einführung einer gesetzlichen Frauenquote. Die übrigen Frauen sehen zwar die Gefahr, als Quotenfrau abqualifiziert zu werden, dennoch räumen alle Befragten ein, dass eine gesetzliche Regelung temporär hilfreich wäre, um den Frauenanteil in deutschen Führungsgremien spürbar zu erhöhen.
88 % der Teilnehmerinnen der Studie verfügen über einen akademischen Abschluss. Nur vier Frauen begannen ihre berufliche Entwicklung mit einer Fachausbildung, von denen eine später ein berufsbegleitendes Fachstudium absolvierte.
Die Studienabschlüsse von Deutschlands Chefinnen verteilen sich im Wesentlichen auf drei Fachrichtungen: An erster Stelle, mit fast 60 %, stehen die Wirtschaftswissenschaften, auf Rang zwei die Natur- und Ingenieurwissenschaften, in denen insgesamt 25 % der Frauen ihren Abschluss machten. Das Studium der Rechtswissenschaften spielt mit nur 11 % der Studienabschlüsse eher eine untergeordnete Rolle.
Über eine Promotion verfügt etwas mehr als ein Drittel der akademisch ausgebildeten Frauen (36 %). Vier Wirtschaftswissenschaftlerinnen, drei Naturwissenschaftlerinnen und alle drei Juristinnen haben einen Doktortitel erworben. 18 % der befragten Frauen mit Studienabschluss haben ihren akademischen Grad durch eine postgraduierte Ausbildung aufgewertet.
Berufliche Auslandserfahrung – hier sind Auslandsstudien oder –praktika nicht berücksichtigt – hat die Hälfte der befragten Frauen während ihres beruflichen Werdegangs gesammelt.
50 % der Studienteilnehmerinnen empfanden den letzten Karriereschritt als schwieriger im Vergleich zu den vorherigen. Die betroffenen Frauen gaben an, dass sie an diesem Punkt ihrer Karriere häufig mit Vorbehalten gegenüber einer weiblichen Führungspersönlichkeit konfrontiert wurden.
Für 63% der Frauen hatte das Erbringen überdurchschnittlicher Leistungen und die Demonstration ihrer fachlichen Kompetenz oberste Priorität. Dadurch verschafften sie sich Akzeptanz auf allen Ebenen.
Zu allererst fordern die Chefinnen berufstätige Frauen auf, ehrlich zu sich selbst zu sein und ihre eigenen Talente, Fähigkeiten und Karriereziele realistisch einzuschätzen. Fragen wie zum Beispiel «wie wichtig ist für mich beruflicher Erfolg», «welche Opfer bin ich bereit, dafür zu bringen», sollten klar und aufrichtig beantwortet werden.
Netzwerke zielgerichtet als Karrieresprungbrett zu nutzen, sich Aufträge oder Positionen auf diesem Weg zu verschaffen, fällt den meisten Frauen schwer. Dies wird vielfach als Vetternwirtschaft empfunden – Frauen wollen es aber durch eigene Leistung ins Top-Management schaffen. Stand: Juni 2009
Noch immer sind Berufe wie Maurer, Elektriker oder Berufskraftfahrer fast ausschließlich männlich besetzt, Kosmetiker, Erzieher oder Altenpfleger hingegen sind Berufe, die fast nur von Frauen ausgeübt werden. Laut Statistik waren im vergangenen Jahr 49 Prozent der Männer und 36 Prozent der Frauen in Berufen tätig, die zu über 80 Prozent von Menschen des eigenen Geschlechts ausgeübt wurden.
Foto: Infografik WELT ONLINE Emanzipation
Die Veränderung im Vergleich zum Jahr 2000 war demnach gering: Damals hatten laut Statistik 52 Prozent der Männer und 34 Prozent der Frauen einen Beruf, der vom jeweils eigenen Geschlecht dominiert wurde. Nur in wenigen Berufen, etwa bei Versicherungs- oder Bankkaufleuten, waren im vergangenen Jahr annähernd gleich viele Männer wie Frauen beschäftigt. Auch bei den jüngeren Berufstätigen stieg der Frauenanteil in den vergangenen Jahren laut Statistik nur in wenigen Berufsgruppen an. Es waren solche, die einen Hochschulabschluss erfordern: Ärzte, Rechtsanwälte oder Wirtschaftswissenschaftler. Männer zeigten dagegen laut Statistik kaum Neigungen, stärker in von Frauen dominierte Berufsfelder vorzudringen.
1 von 10
Die mächtigsten Frauen der Welt
Foto: dpa/DPA Sie ist 2010 die mächtigste Frau der Welt – wenn man dem US-Magazin "Forbes" glaubt: Michelle Obama, Ehefrau des US-Präsidenten Barack Obama.
Foto: AFP Auf Platz zwei folgt eine Frau aus der Wirtschaft: Irene Rosenfeld, die Chefin von Kraft. Sie ging erfolgreich aus dem Übernahmepoker mit dem britischen Schokoladen-Hersteller Cadbury hervor.
Foto: AP/DAPD Seit Jahren steht sie in der Spitze der Liste: Oprah Winfrey, US-Talkmasterin, der Millionen zuhören.
Foto: dpa/DPA Abgestürzt von Platz eins: Bundeskanzlerin Angela Merkel landete in diesem Jahr auf Platz vier.
Foto: REUTERS Auf Merkel folgt auf Platz fünf US-Außenministerin Hillary Clinton. Sie tritt immer häufiger aus dem Schatten des US-Präsidenten heraus.
Foto: picture-alliance/ dpa/Landov Auf Platz sechs landet die Chefin des Getränkeherstellers Pepsi: Indra Nooyi.
Foto: Reuters/REUTERS Einen Schuss Pop bringt Sängerin Lady Gaga. Sie steht auf Platz sieben der Liste mit den mächtigsten Frauen.
Foto: picture-alliance / AAPIMAGE/AAP Gail Kelly ist die Chefin der australischen Bank Westpac. Sie landet auf Platz acht.
Foto: REUTERS Als zweite Sängerin schafft es Beyoncé Knowles in die Top Ten – auf Platz neun.
Foto: AP/DAPD Sie ist eine der erfolgreichsten Talkshow-Gastgeberinnen: Die Amerikanerin Ellen DeGeneres landet auf dem zehnten Platz.

description.hltext_display: Janics Natasa a megye és az ország legjobb női sportolója
description.content:
14 hozzászólás
Munkatársunktól - Délmagyarország napilap
Értékelem a cikket!
Kedd este immár 41. alkalommal rendezzük meg a Délmagyarország és Délvilág Év sportolója díjátadó gálát. Az esemény házigazdája az Alabárdos étterem és borozó lesz. Az megyei felnőtt sportolói Horváth Alexandra, Janics Natasa, Erdős Viktor és Molnár Tamás. Az év csapatai a szentesi női pólósok, és a Pick Szeged. Janics az Év női sportolója lett Magyarországon is, sőt Kovács Katalinnal csapatban is elhódította az elsőséget.

description.hltext_display: Juve, contratto per Boniperti. È la favola bianconera
description.content:
Filippo diventa professionista, nonno Giampiero: «Che emozione». Marotta: «Mi ha fatto un certo effetto vedere su un mio contratto un cognome così importante». Passano pro anche Giandonato, Ferrero e Belcastro
TORINO, 22 dicembre - «Speriamo, spe­riamo che abbia firmato davvero». Giampiero Boni­perti non cambia mai e sul “mercato Juve” continua a fare catenaccio ancora oggi, quando la notizia riguarda suo nipote Filippo che da ie­ri è un giocatore professio­nista della Juventus, al pa­ri di Manuel Giandonato, Luca Belcastro e Vittorio Ferrero, che hanno tutti messo la firma sul primo fa­tidico “vero” contratto. An­che se alla fine Boniperti senior un po’ si scioglie: «Sì, è una grande emozione. Spero proprio che faccia be­ne, è un bravo ragazzo e non si sta montando la te­sta. Sta facendo bene? Non spetta a me dirlo, mi sem­bra che si impegni molto e sono contento di vederlo con quella maglia».
COMMOZIONE - L’emozio­ne, d’altra parte, è stata an­che di Beppe Marotta che da dirigente sportivo è cre­sciuto nel mito di figure co­me Boniperti: «Devo am­mettere che mi ha fatto un certo effetto vedere su un mio contratto un cognome così importante. Ma sono contento, questi giovani meritano il passaggio e tut­to è fatto nell’ottica del no­stro progetto giovani».
LEGGENDARI - Alessandro Del Piero ci ha abituato a battere tutti i record, a po­sizionare l’asticella sempre più in alto e, gol dopo gol, presenza dopo presenza, vittoria su vittoria, a rag­giungerla e scavalcarla per entrare nel mito biancone­ro. Dopo i record delpieriani non ci restano che le favole, quelle a lieto fine, che rega­lano emozioni e anche qual­che brivido. Ed è proprio una favola quella che è sta­ta scritta ieri, nero su bian­co, nella sede della Juven­tus. Boniperti junior, il ni­pote del presidentissimo che ha debuttato la setti­mana scorsa contro il Man­chester City, ha firmato il suo primo contratto da pro­fessionista alla presenza anche del papà, Giampaolo.
CERCHIO CHIUSO - Cin­quant’anni dopo l’addio al calcio di Giampiero Boni­perti, a 33 anni, nel 2011 la Juventus vedrà un altro Boniperti in campo tra i prof. E’ la storia che conti­nua, è un cerchio che si chiude. Portarsi addosso un cognome così pesante non è certo facile per Filippo, so­prattutto con la maglia del­la Juventus, club nel quale Giampiero è stato non sol­tanto campione e leader in campo ma pure uno dei pre­sidenti più amati.
ALL’ALTEZZA - Il ragazzo però non sembra risentirne. Ha atteso il suo turno per il debutto in prima squadra, senza accelerare i tempi, guardando i compagni di Primavera che veniva lan­ciati da Luigi Del Neri. E fi­nalmente giovedì scorso è toccato anche a lui. «Sono veramente contento per questo esordio, devo dire che ci speravo. Mi fa piace­re che sia arrivato contro un’avversaria di prestigio come il Manchester City. Mio nonno? Stasera non l’ho ancora sentito. Ci sia­mo parlati ieri, dopo la con­vocazione» le prime sensa­zioni dopo il match di Euro­pa League. Del Neri se lo coccola, anche se pure lui non ha nascosto l’emozione: «Fa un certo effetto lanciare un Boniperti, ma sono sicu­ro che sarà all’altezza del nome che porta».
SCOMMESSA - Filippo ha le carte in regola per rivivere i fasti del nonno, ma gli amanti delle favole sono ri­masti colpiti, giovedì scor­so, dalla presenza contem­poranea in campo di Del Piero e Boniperti jr: il capi­tano scovato e lanciato dal nonno del giovane compa­gno di squadra. Non solo, il 10 di Alex sommato al 37 di Filippo fanno 47, ovvero l’anno del debutto di Boni­perti senior in maglia bian­conera. I più scaramantici possono giocare i numeri al lotto, i più appassionati, do­po aver sentito i brividi scorrere sulla schiena, han­no il dovere di guardare al futuro perché è il segnale forte e concreto che la Ju­ventus sta progettando in grande.

Giampiero Boni­perti non cambia mai e sul “mercato Juve” continua a fare catenaccio ancora oggi, quando la notizia riguarda suo nipote Filippo che da ie­ri è un giocatore professio­nista della Juventus, al pa­ri di Manuel Giandonato, Luca Belcastro e Vittorio Ferrero, che hanno tutti messo la firma sul primo fa­tidico “vero” contratto. description.hltext_display: 民进党财政陷窘迫 蔡英文没薪水自嘲“乞丐党”
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据台湾TVBS电视台报道，民进党财务困难，一度负债瘦身裁员，蔡英文自己也没领薪水，每年年终党工都很辛酸，最惨曾经没有奖金，只领到1万元(新台币)红包，不过2010年因为“五都”选举得票数冲高，党中央可以进帐3700多万(新台币，下同)的补助款，党工辛苦辅选，终于传出可望领到1个月，甚至上看1.5个月的年终奖金。 报道说，民进党2009年年末，乐团台上卖力表演，蔡英文自掏腰包办桌，还是笑咪咪，苦哈哈的民进党，2010年终于可能稍微松一口气。因为“五都”选举，得票数377万多，不只赢过国民党，每票还有30元补助款，“五都”候选人都要上缴1/3给党中央，蔡英文口中的“乞丐党”，可以实质进帐3700多万。
每次岁末年终党工哀怨不是没原因，民进党财务困窘，蔡英文接下党主席自己没领薪水，第一年春节每个党工只发1万元红包，意思意思，第二年主席借钱凑到每个人半个月奖金，这次终于传出可能发到1个月，甚至上看1.5个月的年终。
此外，不只奖金有着落，民进党在野后，全代会为了省钱，总是租便宜的敦化初中礼堂，党代表只能坐折叠椅，2011年1月底的临全会，难得要借体面的国际会议中心，代表们可以坐上舒服的绒布椅开会，展现“重返执政”的野心。

description.hltext_display: Kingston Digital presenta le pen drive Mini Fun 2G
description.author: BitCity
description.content: Kingston Digital Europe Ltd, affiliata di Kingston Technology ha annunciato la disponibilità della seconda generazione della linea di pen drive Kingston DataTraveler Mini Fun. Tra le principali novità, le nuove pen drive presentano un'ampia varietà di colori disponibili, una custodia in gomma e un formato molto ridotto, caratteristiche in linea con il design preferito da Kingston. Il nuovo Kingston DataTraveler Mini Fun G2 è dotato di una resistente custodia in gomma ed è disponibile in tre diversi colori, in modo da consentire agli utilizzatori di combinare le diverse fantasie. Il formato ridotto e il design colorato rendono questa penna USB un utile strumento per un uso quotidiano, a casa, a scuola e in viaggio. Kingston DataTraveler Mini Fun G2 è disponibile nelle versioni da 2GB, 4GB e 8GB; ogni capacità offre diverse combinazioni di colori.

description.hltext_display: Natale senza minacce online con Trend Micro
description.author: BitCity
description.content: Nel periodo natalizio Internet assume un ruolo di primo piano: shopping per i regali, invio di messaggi di auguri, ricerche per offerte di viaggi sono solo alcune delle attività che contribuiscono a far aumentare il traffico sul Web. Si trascorre più tempo online e i cyber criminali sono pronti a sfruttare la situazione a fini di lucro attraverso attacchi pericolosi e sempre più sofisticati. Trend Micro raccomanda agli utenti di non abbassare mai la guardia online, raddoppiando l'attenzione in periodi di festa come questo in cui i cyber-criminali si fanno ancora meno scrupoli nel perpetrare le loro attività illecite. Trend Micro segnala le principali minacce in cui potrebbero imbattersi gli utenti, offrendo alcuni consigli per difendersi. Spam, ricerche "velenose" e tweet truffaldini Tra i mezzi più utilizzati dai cyber-criminali per trarre in inganno le loro vittime con minacce legate al tema del Natale vi sono certamente i messaggi di spam: cartoline elettroniche di auguri, promozioni di articoli ambiti a prezzi stracciati, false notifiche di corrieri che annunciano problemi di spedizione sono solo alcuni esempi. Nel periodo natalizio, in cui si fa ampio ricorso ai motori di ricerca, assistiamo anche a un uso "rampante" delle tecniche di ottimizzazione dei risultati delle ricerche SEO (Search Engine Optimization) utilizzate a scopo maligno, chiamate "blackhat SEO", che possono dirottare gli utenti verso siti illegittimi contenenti minacce pericolose. La tecnologia SEO è largamente sfruttata anche per favorire la diffusione di software antivirus fasullo, o FAKEAV. Gli utenti che inseriscono nelle ricerche online parole chiave prevedibili come "decorazioni natalizie" possono essere condotti a siti web maligni che scaricano varianti di FAKEAV sui loro sistemi. Ciò può portare a furto di identità o di credenziali finanziarie. Qualche minaccia può arrivare anche attraverso i siti di social networking. L'anno scorso la famosa botnet Koobface lanciò una "campagna di Natale" su Facebook con messaggi che proponevano un link a una falsa pagina di YouTube con un video di Babbo Natale. Quest'anno invece una recente truffa ha sfruttato Twitter per spedire tweets che promettevano buoni regalo gratuiti di vari negozi online, rimandando gli utenti a siti pericolosi. Le 10 "regole d'oro" di Trend Micro per un Natale online sereno Evitate di scaricare gli allegati o di cliccare sui link o sulle immagini inseriti nel messaggio, soprattutto se questo appare sospetto o possibile spam. Ricordate che di solito le cose più belle non sono gratuite. Spesso le mail o i siti che pubblicizzano prodotti gratuiti non fanno che scaricare malware. Esaminate attentamente le promozioni! Cercate informazioni e verificate attraverso altre risorse le offerte proposte via mail. Se avete ben chiaro quale sito desiderate visitare, scrivete l'indirizzo (URL) direttamente nello spazio ad hoc del browser per evitare i link illegittimi magari indicati dai motori di ricerca. Una tattica contro il phishing (truffe online) consiste nello spostare il puntatore del mouse sui link o sulle immagini presenti nei messaggi o nei siti web, provvedendo quindi alla verifica della legittimità dell'URL completo che appare. Ad esempio, un URL è da considerare sospetto se non corrisponde al sito dell'azienda che ha inviato il messaggio o sono presenti caratteri strani o senza significato. Non cliccate su URL sospetti anche se compaiono fra i primi selezionati dai motori di ricerca. Un link viene considerato sospetto laddove uno o più dei suoi elementi (ad esempio, :////?) è composto da caratteri inseriti a caso. Leggete la descrizione dei risultati della ricerca (il breve testo che compare subito sotto il titolo in grassetto dei risultati). Il risultato della ricerca può anche essere considerato sospetto se la descrizione non fornisce informazioni pertinenti sul sito. Un indizio certo per individuare i siti dedicati ad alterare i risultati delle ricerche (blackhat SEO) è la presenza di parole chiave inserite a caso nella descrizione. Tenete sempre traccia delle transazioni online per evitare di diventare vittime di truffe. Verificate il page rating di un sito presente nell'elenco dei risultati di un motore di ricerca prima di cliccare sul link corrispondente. Se il valore numerico indicato è elevato ci sono maggiori probabilità che il sito sia affidabile. Installate un programma per il filtraggio degli URL che possa essere integrato nei browser, ad esempio Trend Micro offre gratuitamente Web Protection Add-On: http://free.antivirus.com/web-protection-add-on/. In generale, installate un software di sicurezza che cancelli immediatamente i messaggi di spam in arrivo nella casella inbox e che verifichi la legittimità dei siti visitati dall'utente.
