description.hltext_display: Emmerdale to welcome new character
description.author: Bangshowbiz
description.content: Sparks will fly between Emmerdale's Debbie Dingle and new character Cameron Murray. However, the feisty female - who only recently returned to the village - is far from pleased to see her former flame, and is worried he may unveil dark secrets about the couple's complicated past. Dominic said: "Cameron is a strong, sharp-tongued and defiant character. He is essentially a good guy but has a darker, edgier side to him. I can't wait to start filming in the new year and the cast have already been really welcoming." Meanwhile, the ITV1 soap's executive producer Steve November admitted the next year will be particularly dramatic for Debbie and newcomer Cameron, whose first scenes will be screened in March. He explained: "We are delighted to welcome Dominic to the cast. 2011 is going to be a dramatic year for Debbie Dingle and Cameron will be integral to her story."

description.hltext_display: 获得产业巨头支持，NFC市场有望真正腾飞
description.content:
关键字： NFC Android 智能手机
谷歌的Android操作系统以席卷之势横扫整个智能手机操作系统市场，获得支持的厂商也越来越多，它每次新版本的发布都会引起整个行业与用户的巨大关注。上周Android 2.3和Nexus S手机的发布最显着的升级就是增加了对NFC芯片的直接支持。联想到最近几个手机大厂也宣布将在手机里集成NFC芯片，NFC市场有望在明年真正腾飞。
说起NFC近场通讯技术，这也是一个技术非常成熟，但是应用迟迟得不到大规模部署的标准。它是由飞利浦公司于2002年发起，诺基亚、索尼等著名厂商联合主推的一项无线技术。NFC由非接触式射频识别(RFID)及互联互通技术整合演变而来，在单一芯片上结合感应式读卡器、感应式卡片和点对点的功能，能在短距离内与兼容设备进行识别和数据交换。虽然这个技术在发布以后的多年里有许多大公司的商业试运营案例，但是离原来的预期相距甚远。调研公司ABI原本预测，到2009年，50％的新增手机将具备NFC功能，2010年NFC手机发货量将达到5亿台。显然至今带有NFC功能的手机型号仍然屈指可数，NFC仍旧是一个风声大雨点小的技术标准。
该技术迟迟无法得到整个市场的认可，显然原因也非常复杂。NFC的移动应用主要是手机支付、门禁和公交系统以及电子身份识别等。这些应用都牵涉到复杂的产业链合作，包括了下面几大环节：手机制造商、芯片供应商、移动运营商、金融机构等。
由于技术已经非常成熟，芯片供应商这里没有什么瓶颈，关键是手机制造商、移动运营商和金融机构的利益博弈问题。尤其是国内的中国移动和银联之间的标准之争，更是让移动支付在国内处于试点阶段。iSuppli中国区研究总监王阳说：“NFC至今无法真正打开局面就是由于运营商和金融机构之间为了利益互不相让，结果产业链迟迟不能打通。现在标准之争已经尘埃落定，NFC事实上已经成为移动支付标准，预计明年移动支付市场会有爆发性的增长。”
2008年底召开的GSMA大会上，单线协议(SWP)的提出，获得NFC产业链各环节的广泛接受。困扰NFC手机支付多年的产业链不协调问题在2010年得到了全面解决。同时有消息称，中国移动已经在4月份暂停了2009年主推的手机支付业务方式RF-SIM，取而代之的目前是中国银联主导的13.56MHz的NFC手机支付方式。显然标准问题的解决为NFC市场的腾飞打下了坚实的基础，那么接下来最大的瓶颈就是手机终端问题。
其实手机制造商与移动运营商之间也有利益的博弈，“运营商希望将更多功能集成到SIM卡中，比如小额支付和对流媒体的控制，这样他们就可以引导市场向定制方向发展。但是，终端厂商又不希望受制于运营商，所以这两大利益集团的博弈，决定了NFC集成的方式。”北京同方微电子副总经理段立表示。到底是集成到SIM卡上，还是直接集成到手机里，这是两大集团争夺的焦点。由于银联主导了移动支付的标准，国内移动运营商的话语权会有所减弱，而各大主流手机厂商的强势介入，使得形势走向日趋明朗。首先是诺基亚宣布明年发布的所有智能手机都会集成NFC功能，而业界也传闻RIM和苹果都将在下一代产品中添加NFC技术。甚至HTC CEO周永明近日在接受采访时也表示，HTC将会在明年在美国推出支持LTE网络的设备，还会支持NFC技术，以应对用户对高速网络和手机刷卡的需求。
显然所有的智能手机巨头都会将NFC功能作为今后智能手机的标准配置，而谷歌android 2.3的发布更是将NFC集成功能推向了几乎所有的智能手机厂商。国内智能手机设计公司盛本通讯的硬件副总监冯佳伟透露：“这次的谷歌公开了NFC相关的API和SDK工具包，使得他们设计带有NFC功能的智能手机更加方便，如果直接使用NXP的芯片，都不需要另外验证。”谷歌和NXP的合作给NFC的普及带来了极大的便利，一旦移动支付等应用成为潮流，所有厂商都可以快速推出集成NFC芯片的智能手机，甚至山寨手机厂商也不例外。
由于手机巨头的积极支持，NFC继摄像头、蓝牙、Wi-Fi和GPS以后成为智能手机的标配将在不远的将来成为现实。

description.hltext_display: Hidayet kötü başladı
description.author: Hürriyet Avrupa
description.content:
22 Aralık 2010
Amerikan Ulusal Basketbol Ligi'ne (NBA), dün akşam oynanan 6 maçla devam edildi.
Amway Center'da Orlando Magic'e konuk olan Dallas Maverics, sahadan 105-99 galip ayrıldı ve bu sonuçla son 17 maçtaki 16. galibiyetini aldı.
Maverics'te Caron Butler 20, Dirk Nowitzki 17 sayıyla oynarken, Jason Kidd, maçı 13 sayı 12 asistle tamamladı.
Önceki gece Miami Heat'in 12 maçlık galibiyet serisine son veren Maverics, aynı başarılı performansı dün akşam da sürdürdü ve 2 sayılık atışlarda yüzde 50, 3 sayılık atışlarda ise yüzde 46'lık başarı oranı yakaladı.
Kadrosuna kattığı yeni isimlerle tekrar yapılanma sürecine giren evsahibi ekipte ise Dwight Howard, attığı attığı 26 sayıyla hem takımının hem de sahanın en skorer ismi oldu. Howard, 23 de ribaund alarak “double double” yaptı. JJ Reddick 21 sayıyla oynarken, Hidayet Türkoğlu maçı 9 sayı 8 asist 1 ribaunt ile tamamladı.
Bir diğer maçta Chicago Bulls ile Philadelphia 76ers karşı karşıya geldi. Maça Joakim Noah ve Taj Gibson'dan yoksun çıkan Bulls, evinde oynadığı maçı 45 sayı farkla, 121-76 kazanmayı başardı. Bulls'da Carlos Boozer 16 sayı 11 ribaund, Derrick Rose ise 22 sayı 12 asist ile galibiyette büyük rol oynadı. Takımın bir diğer skorer ismi, rakip potaya 22 sayı bırakan Luol Deng oldu. Bulls'un Türk basketbolcusu Ömer Aşık ise maçı 8 sayı 6 ribaund ile tamamladı.
76ers'da Andre Iguodala 17 sayıyla oynadı. Chicago Bulls, bu sonuçla son 9 maçta 8. galibiyetini almış oldu.
Bir diğer Türk basketbolcu Ersan İlyasova'nın formasını giydiği Milwakuee Bucks ise dün gece Staples Center'da Los Angeles Lakers'a konuk oldu. İlyasova'nın oldukça iyi bir performans sergilediği maçta Bucks, rakibine 98-79 ile üstünlük sağladı.
Sahanın en skorer ismi, 22 sayıyla oynayan Bucks oyuncusu Earl Boykins oldu. Takım arkadaşı John Salmons, geceyi 20 sayıyla tamamlarken, Ersan İlyasova, 17 sayı 11 ribaund ile “double double” yaparak galibiyete büyük bir katkı sağladı.
Los Angeles Lakers'da ise Kobe Bryant geceyi 21 sayıyla tamamladı.
Gecenin diğer maçlarında şu sonuçlar alındı:
Charlotte Bobcats: 81 - Oklahoma City Thunder: 99
Memphis Grizzlies: 94 - New Jersey Nets: 101
Sacramento Kings: 109 - Golden State Warriors: 117

description.hltext_display: دليل تاخير در جلسه علني حضور وزير اقتصاد پيرامون هدفمندي يارانه ها بود
Man charged with burglarizing Berea fire stations
description.content:
BEREA — BEREA — A 21-year-old man is facing three counts of burglary after police said he burglarized two fire stations.
Michael W. Bowman of Scaffold Cane Road was arrested Friday and charged with three counts of second-degree burglary, all Class C felonies.
“We’ve had a problem — someone has been getting into our fire stations when firefighters weren’t there,” said Capt. Ken Clark.
That person had entered the fire stations’ living quarters and stolen checks, cash and iPod belonging to Berea firefighters, Clark said.
Clark said the person was Bowman and that between October and December, Bowman had burglarized Fire Station No. 2 on Glades Road two times, and burglarized Fire Station No. 1 on Chestnut Street once.
Clark also said he did not have an exact dollar figure of the value of items reported stolen, but said that in addition to cash, checks and electronics, Bowman is accused of stealing change from one of the station’s vending machines.
Bowman is being held in the Madison County Detention Center on a $15,000 bond.
If convicted of all charges, he faces up to 10 years in prison.
Emily Burton may be reached at eburton@ richmondregister.com or 624-6694. Follow Emily on Twitter at RR_EBurton @twitter.com.

description.hltext_display: 歐市22日盤初美元兌瑞郎觸及2個月新低
description.content: 歐洲匯市22日盤初，� 瑞郎避險買盤強勢，美元兌瑞郎觸及2個月新低0.9532，但瑞郎強勢恐難持久。歐洲匯市22日盤初，� 瑞郎避險買盤強勢，美元兌瑞郎觸及2個月新低0.9532，但瑞郎強勢恐難持久。 綜合媒體12月22日� �導，歐洲匯市22日盤初，美元兌瑞郎觸及2個月新低0.9532，� 瑞郎避險買盤強勢。 某日本大型銀行資深交易員表示，由於投資者對歐元區主權債務危機的持續擔憂推升瑞郎的避險買盤需求，美元兌瑞郎已經觸及10月18日以來的最低水平。 但交易員們同時懷疑，瑞郎強勢是否得以延續，� 為除了避險原� 外，投資者找不到其他買入瑞郎的理由。他們警告稱，如果美債收益率進一步上升，這勢必增強投資者對美元的買盤需求，屆時瑞郎將面臨大的賣盤壓力。 北京時間15:40，美元兌瑞郎� �0.9542。 (鄭相羽 編輯) 免責聲明：本文所載資料僅供參考，并不構成投資建議，世華財訊對該資料或使用該資料所導致的結果概不承擔任何責任。若資料與原文有異，概以原文為準。世華財訊資訊中心：editor@shihua.com.cn 電話：010-58022299轉235

description.hltext_display: Michael Gründer neuer Vertriebsleiter Nord bei IVAG
description.content:
IVAG, IFK, Michael Gründer - Vertriebsleiter
(fair-NEWS) - München-Oberhaching, 07.12.2010
Seit November 2010 ist Michael Gründer (49), als Vertriebsleiter Nord für die IVAG, München-Oberhaching tätig. Er verfügt über langjährige Erfahrung in der Akquisition und Betreuung von Finanzdienstleistern und Versicherungsmaklern. Die IVAG vermarktet derzeit zwei Produkte exklusiv: Den von der bvt-Gruppe / München gemanagten „IFK Sach-wertfonds Deutschland 2“ und den „ÖKORENTA Neue Energien V“.
Als Inhaber der Strat-egia Consulting e. K. bietet Gründer produktbegleitende Beratungstools. Individuelle und strategische Bausteine, wie das Maklerbetreuungskonzept 3.0 und das Strat-egia Erfolgskonzept führen mit weniger Aufwand zu höherem Ertrag. Mit der Durchführung von Kundenseminaren sowie der Erarbeitung angepasster Vertriebsstrategien und neuer Wege zu neuen Kunden rundet Gründer sein Angebot für seine Vertriebspartner ab.
Die Innovative Vertriebskonzepte AG ist ein vertriebsorientierter Dienstleister für Finanzvermittler und Finanzvertriebe. Das Führungsteam bringt jahrelange Erfahrung in der Entwicklung und Verwaltung innovativer Finanzkonzepte mit. Die IVAG bietet exklusive Finanz- und Serviceprodukte, sowie eine vertriebsfreundliche und zuverlässige Verwaltung.
Weitere Informationen finden Interessierte unter www.ivag.de und www.ivag-ifk-sachwertfonds-1.de

description.hltext_display: Lohan 'assault' worker dismissed
description.content: A woman who accused actress Lindsay Lohan of attacking her has been sacked by the Betty Ford rehab centre. Rehab centre spokesman Russ Patrick said the employee was dismissed for breaking patient confidentiality at the Palm Desert, California, clinic by giving interviews and "disclosing a privileged document".He said Dawn Holland's interview was a breach of trust and the rehabilitation process."When patients come to the centre for treatment, they come to a safe place where their identity is protected, where anonymity is safeguarded," he said.Mean Girls star Lindsay, 24, is being investigated by Riverside County sheriff's detectives for misdemeanour battery following a confrontation on December 12.A police spokeswoman said deputies were called to the Betty Ford centre shortly after 1am after an altercation between Lindsay and Ms Holland.Lindsay's lawyer said the actress called the police emergency number.Neither Betty Ford nor sheriff's officials identified Ms Holland, but she appeared in an interview on celebrity website TMZ, claiming Lindsay and two other girls had sneaked out of the centre.Ms Holland said she was trying to get Lindsay to submit to a breathalyser test when the actress became belligerent, pushed her and snatched a phone from her hand, straining her arm.Riverside County sheriff's deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said Lindsay's case would be presented to prosecutors, who would decide whether she should be charged.

description.hltext_display: Floor Safe Can Keep You Valuable Away Form Thieves
description.content: There is being a gradually increase in the crime throughout the world. There is being more cases of burglary and theft than ever. We work very hard to earn money and so it is important for us to save our valuable from such mishaps. We try to keep our valuables safe by keeping them in a locked cupboard but that is really not a safe place to keep you valuables. You definitely need something more discreet like a floor safe. You can find a large range of floor safes from different companies. These safes are good for keeping things like passport, important documents, money and jewelry that you really don't use in your daily life. The best part of having a floor safe is that they are difficult to locate. If in case there are thieves in your house then they are definitely going to head towards your bedroom instead of searching for a floor safe. So you can install a floor safe in any other room and can store your valuables away from your bedroom.There are tow ways of buying and searching for a floor safe. Either you can visit you nearest safe dealers and have a look at all the possible options that are available in that store. There are chances that you might not find all the option there because models could be missing there. The other way is to search online for a floor safe. This way you can have a look at all the possible options for you. Once you have short listed the models then you can visit the nearest deal to have a close look at them. There are different advantages of opting for a floor safe instead of a free standing safe. The biggest advantage of a floor safe is that they are not easy to locate. They also don't take any standing safe. Floor safes can be easily fitted at you choices place. These safes are comparatively small in size so you need to store only important and valuable things these safes. Most of the floor safes are fireproof safes. The reason behind making them a fireproof safe is that they are fitted inside the floor. Before buying a floor safe then make sure that you have done your home work related to floor safes. Doing a proper research will definitely help you in getting the best possible safe for your valuable.

description.hltext_display: لايحه متن تجديدنظر شده كنوانسيون بين المللي حفظ نباتات به تصويب رسيد
description.content:
خبرگزاري موج - با راي نمايندگان مردم در مجلس شوراي اسلامي، .
به گزارش خبرنگار پارلماني موج، در جريان بررسي گزارش لايحه تجديدنظر شده كنوانسيون بين‌المللي حفظ نباتات در صحن علني مجلس كه از سوي سخنگوي كميسيون كشاورزي قرائت شد، نمايندگان كليات و ماده واحده اين لايحه را به تصويب رساندند.
براساس ماده واحده اين لايحه، متن تجديدنظر شده در كنوانسيون بين‌المللي حفظ نباتات مصوب بيست و نهمين اجلاس سازمان خوار و بار و كشاورزي ملل متحد (فائو) به تشريح پيوست تصويب مي گردد و به دولت ج.ا.ا اجازه داده مي شود اسناد تصويب را نزد امين استاد كنوانسيون توضيع نمايد.
در تبصره يك اين لايحه آمده است: رعايت اصل هفتاد و هفتم قانون اساسي ج.ا.ا براي هرگونه اصلاح كنوانسيون در اجراي ماده (21) آن، الزامي است.
در تبصره 2 نيز آمده است: از تاريخ لازم‌الاجرا شدن اين قانون، متن پيوست قانون الحاق دولت ايران به كنوانسيون بين‌المللي حفظ نباتات مصوب 7/4/1351 ملغي مي گردد.
اصل هفتاد و هفتم قانون اساسي، عهدنامه ها، مقاوله نامه ها، قرادادها، موافقتنامه هاي بين المللي بايد به تصويب مجلس شوراي اسلامي برسد.
كليات و ماده واحده اين لايحه با 107 راي موافق، آراي مخالف و 7 راي ممتنع به تصويب نمايندگان رسيد.

description.hltext_display: تعامل بيشتر مجلس و دولت در جلسه غيرعلني صبح امروز مجلس با وزير اقتصاد
description.content:
جزئيات جلسه با وزير اقتصاد درخصوص هدفمندي يارانه‌ها
خبرگزاري موج - نماينده ابهر در مجلس شوراي اسلامي در تشريح جزئيات جلسه غيرعلني صبح امروز نمايندگان با دست اندرکاران اجراي قانون هدفمند کردن يارانه ها، گفت: در اين جلسه 6 نفر از نمايندگان دغدغه هاي خود را درخصوص هدفمند کردن يارانه ها مطرح و وزير اقتصاد هم به آنها پاسخ داد.
به گزارش موج به نقل از خانه ملت، احمد مهدوي نماينده ابهر و خرم دره در مجلس شوراي اسلامي جزئيات جلسه غير علني مجلس در مورد هدفمندي يارانه ها را تشريح کرد و گفت: غلامرضا مصباحي مقدم، محمدرضا خباز، موسي الرضا ثروتي، جهانبخش محبي نيا، ستار هدايت خواه و سيدحسين نقوي حسيني نمايندگان مردم شهرستان هاي تهران، کاشمر، بجنورد، مياندوآب، دنا و بويراحمد و ورامين به عنوان 6 نماينده اي نام برد که در جلسه غيرعلني امروز مجلس با دست اندرکاران هدفمند کردن يارانه ها به بحث و تبادل نظر پرداختند.
عضو کميسيون صنايع و معادن اظهار کرد: در اين جلسه نمايندگان منتخب به قيد قرعه دغدغه هاي خود را درخصوص روند اجراي قانون هدفمند کردن يارانه ها مطرح و سيدشمس الدين حسيني وزير اقتصاد و دارايي نيز به سوالات و دغدغه هاي نمايندگان پاسخ داد.
وي با اعلام اينکه همه نمايندگان مجلس از اجراي قانون هدفمند کردن يارانه ها حمايت مي کنند، خاطرنشان کرد: با اين حال نمايندگان در جلسه غيرعلني امروز اعلام کردند اجراي قانون هدفمندسازي يارانه ها بايد به صورتي انجام گيرد که به مردم فشار وارد نشود.
مهدوي ابهري مسائل مربوط به حمل و نقل، حمايت از بخش کشاورزي و صنعت را از جمله موضوعاتي عنوان کرد که نمايندگان در جلسه غيرعلني امروز با دست اندرکاران اجراي قانون هدفمند کردن يارانه ها به آنها پرداخته اند.
نماينده مردم ابهر در پاسخ به اين پرسش که آيا پاسخ هاي داده شده از سوي وزير اقتصاد توانست دغدغه هاي مطرح شده از سوي نمايندگان را مرتفع کند، گفت: تا حدودي که فرصت بود به سوالات و دغدغه هاي نمايندگان پاسخ داده شد و اين جلسه باعث شد که تعامل بيشتري در اين خصوص حاصل شود.

description.hltext_display: Fireproof Safes: Preserving Things Near To You
description.content: God forbids but if there is a house fire then the first and foremost thing is the safety of your family members. To ensure the safety of family member you must install smoke detectors in your house so incase if any fire broke out then family members should be altered about it. Fire safety precaution doesn't stop here. This is just the protection of your family member. Now you have to make some arrangements about the important documents and valuables that might get damaged during fire.There are documents like contracts, diplomas, insurance policy, medical records, security cards, birth certificated etc. Apart from these formal and emotional documents there are some things that you are sentimentally attached to like old photographs of your family or some things that are gifted to you're by someone close to you. Protecting all these things is also important. A simple way to protect these things from fire as well as from theft is installing a fireproof safe. These safes are particularly made to withstand the fire. Though these safe have a resistance towards fire but this doesn't mean that they are going to protect you belonging forever. There is duration for which they can withstand a particular temperature. There are specific ratings that tell us about the fireproof safe. Below are the three categories of the safes.1) UL125: it is the safe that maintain the temperature at or below 125 degree Fahrenheit and the level of humidity is around 80%. These safes are perfect for diskettes. But people rarely use diskettes these days.2) UL 150: this safes rating perfect for storing back up data like tapes, cartridges, microfilm etc. the design of this safe makes sure that the temperature inside it don't rise above 150 degree and humidity is about or below 85%.3) UL 350: These safes maintain a temperature of less than 350 degree Fahrenheit. This is a safe where you can store all you documents because this temperature is very less for a paper to start burning or get badly damaged.While choosing a fireproof safe you need to be sure about the things that you are going to store in them. Once you are sure about the contents then you can opt for the appropriate rating for your safe. Another thing that helps in deciding among of fire-resistant you require from fire depends on the distance of your place from the fire station.

event_or_fact.property: make some arrangements about the important documents and valuables

description.hltext_display: Petitions to watch | Conference of 01.07.11
description.author: ScotusBlog
description.content:
On January 7, the Court will consider petitions on such issues as whether the Sixth Amendment requires a unanimous jury verdict to convict a person of a crime, the requirements for establishing a prima facie case of gender discrimination, and whether the Equal Terms and Unreasonable Limitations provisions of the Religious Land Use and Institutionalized Persons Act of 2000 are violative of the First Amendment.
This edition of “Petitions to watch” features cases up for consideration at the Justices’ January 7 conference. These are petitions raising issues that Tom has determined to have a reasonable chance of being granted, although we post them here without consideration of whether they present appropriate vehicles in which to decide those issues.
Title: Maxwell-Jolly v. Independent Living Center of Southern California
Docket: 09-958
Issue(s): (1) Whether Medicaid recipients and providers may maintain a cause of action under the Supremacy Clause to enforce 42 U.S.C. § 1396a(a)(30)(A) of the Medicaid Act by asserting that the provision preempts a state law reducing reimbursement rates; and (2) whether a state law reducing Medicaid reimbursement rates may be held preempted by Section 1396a(a)(30)(A) based on requirements that do not appear in the text of the statute.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
CVSG Information:
Filed: Dec 3, 2010 (Deny)
Title: Maxwell-Jolly v. Santa Rosa Memorial Hosp.
Docket: 10-283
Issue(s): (1) Whether Medicaid recipients and providers may maintain a cause of action under the Supremacy Clause to enforce § 1396a(a)(30)(A) by asserting that the provision preempts a state law reducing reimbursement rates; and (2) whether a state law reducing Medicaid reimbursement to providers may be held preempted by § 1396a(a)(30)(A) based on requirements that do not appear in the text of the statute.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Iron Thunderhorse v. Pierce
Docket: 09-1353
Issue(s): Whether the court of appeals misinterpreted the Religious Land Use and Institutionalized Persons Act, 42 U.S.C. § 2000cc et seq., to require only a minimal showing that a prison grooming rule which concededly imposes a substantial burden on religious exercise is the “least restrictive means of furthering [a] compelling governmental interest.”
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
CVSG Information:
Invited: Oct 4, 2010
Filed: Dec 1, 2010 (Deny, or, in the alternative, grant and summarily reverse the decision below and remand for application of the correct legal standard.)
Title: Erica P. John Fund, Inc. v. Halliburton Co.
Docket: 09-1403
Issue(s): (1) Whether the Fifth Circuit correctly held that plaintiffs in securities fraud actions must not only satisfy the requirements to trigger a rebuttable presumption of fraud on the market, but must also establish loss causation at class certification by a preponderance of admissible evidence without merits discovery; (2) whether the Fifth Circuit improperly considered the merits of the underlying litigation when it held that a plaintiff must establish loss causation to invoke the fraud-on-the-market presumption.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
CVSG Information:
Invited: Oct 4, 2010
Filed: Dec 3, 2010 (Grant)
Title: Depee v. Mahach-Watkins
Docket: 10-151
Issue(s): Whether, when a civil rights plaintiff seeks substantial money damages but receives only nominal damages, a court may award attorney’s fees under 42 U.S.C. § 1988, notwithstanding the failure of the litigation to achieve a significant public benefit such as declaratory, injunctive, or class relief.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Experian Information Solutions, Inc. v. Pintos
Docket: 10-251
Issue(s): Whether the court of appeals erred in holding that 15 U.S.C. § 1681b(a)(3)(A) authorizes creditors to obtain a consumer's credit report to assist in collecting the consumer's debt only for transactions initiated by the consumer.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Missouri v. Kruse
Docket: 10-264
Issue(s): Under the Fourth Amendment, is it reasonable for police officers to make a limited entry onto an individual's curtilage for the purposes of covering the rear exit of the home, while other officers conduct a "knock and talk" at the front door to investigate their probable-cause belief that the subject of an active arrest warrant is inside the home?
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Herrera v. Oregon
Docket: 10-344
Issue(s): Whether the Sixth Amendment, as incorporated against the states by the Fourteenth Amendment, requires a unanimous jury verdict to convict a person of a crime.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Lawnwood Medical Center, Inc. v. Sadow
Docket: 10-371
Issue(s): (1) Whether punitive damages for intentional harm are exempt from the Court's guidepost analysis to determine whether an award of punitive damages is unconstitutionally excessive; (2) whether state law can exempt punitive awards for certain conduct from the guidepost analysis mandated by the Constitution; and (3) whether a court may rely on the defendant's wealth - rather than awards in similar cases or comparable legislative penalties - as an objective indicator of the constitutionality of a punitive award when actual damages are small or nominal.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Wrisley v. Crowe
Docket: 10-376
Issue(s): (1) Whether police are subject to liability under the Fifth Amendment for allegedly coercive questioning used only in pre-trial proceedings that do not impose criminal penalties; (2) whether police are subject to liability for questioning excluded under the Fifth Amendment and not rising to a level that "shocks the conscience" under the Fourteenth Amendment; and (3) whether police can "shock the conscience" for purposes of liability under the Fourteenth Amendment by non-tortious conduct that causes or threatens no physical harm.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: McDonough v. Crowe
Docket: 10-377
Issue(s): (1) Whether use of a suspect's coerced testimony in a judicial proceeding short of a criminal trial in which penalties may be imposed violates the Fifth Amendment; (2) whether police interview techniques that have garnered judicial approval (such as lying) constitute coercion under the Fifth Amendment when applied to a minor; (3) whether a police officer's solely verbal conduct that does not involve any threat of harm constitutes a violation of the Fourteenth Amendment's guarantee of substantive due process; (4) whether a police officer's conduct must "shock the conscience" to violate the Fourteenth Amendment's guarantee against deprivation of familial companionship; and (5) whether the Ninth Circuit departed from established principles of qualified immunity in holding that a police officer may be liable under 42 U.S.C. § 1983 for interrogating a minor using solely verbal techniques that did not involve any threats.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Blum v. Crowe
Docket: 10-420
Issue(s): (1) Whether a private psychologist whom police ask to consult on an interrogation of a suspect in a murder investigation is entitled to assert qualified immunity pursuant to Richardson v. McKnight; (2)whether the holding and standards of Richardson should be clarified or reexamined; (3) whether the tactics employed during plaintiffs' interrogations violated the Fourteenth Amendment "shocks the conscience" standard; and (4) whether the law was clearly established that the tactics employed during plaintiffs' interrogations were a violation of the Fourteenth Amendment.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: United States v. Jicarilla Apache Nation
Docket: 10-382
Issue(s): Whether the attorney-client privilege entitles the United States to withhold from an Indian tribe confidential communications between the government and government attorneys implicating the administration of statutes pertaining to property held in trust for the tribe.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: NIBCO, Inc. v. Rivera
Docket: 10-383
Issue(s): (1) Whether a court of appeals must conduct a comparative juror analysis when reviewing a claim under Batson v. Kentucky, even though the comparative analysis was neither raised before nor considered by the trial court below; and (2) whether a court of appeals that identifies a suspected Batson problem based on a comparative juror analysis never considered by the trial court can vitiate a trial without remanding to allow the trial court to consider the new arguments and evidence in the first instance.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Schaefer v. McHugh
Docket: 10-404
Issue(s): Whether a party challenging an agency's refusal to follow its own regulations under United States ex rel. Accardi v. Shaughnessy also bears the burden of establishing prejudice from that refusal.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Sheets v. Simpson
Docket: 10-458
Issue(s): (1) Whether a prison inmate is in "custody" for Miranda purposes if law enforcement officers isolate and question him about criminal conduct occurring outside the prison but impose no additional restraints or coercive pressures beyond those inherent in ordinary prison confinement; and (2) whether a police officer violates clearly established Miranda law by advising a defendant who asks him whether a polygraph examination will confirm the veracity of the defendant's statements that defendant will not have any trouble if his statements are truthful, but that he should terminate the examination and consult an attorney if he is lying.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Miller-Goodwin v. City of Panama Beach, Florida
Docket: 10-471
Issue(s): Does a prima facie case of intentional gender discrimination require a judicial finding that a person of the opposite gender engaged in “nearly identical” misconduct but received more favorable treatment than the plaintiff?
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Board of County Commissioners of Boulder County, Colo. v. Rocky Mountain Christian Church
Docket: 10-521
Issue(s): Whether the Equal Terms and Unreasonable Limitations provisions of the Religious Land Use and Institutionalized Persons Act of 2000 expand the scope of legal protection granted to religious exercise beyond that established by the First Amendment and thus violate the Establishment Clause and Section 5 of the Fourteenth Amendment.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Florida v. Ross
Docket: 10-550
Issue(s): Whether the provision of complete and accurate Miranda warnings during a custodial interrogation, accompanied by a written acknowledgement and waiver, affords a presumption of admissibility of post-warning statements when the initial, pre-warning statements were not coerced but were voluntarily produced and when there is no evidence of police misconduct.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Nevada Commission on Ethics v. Carrigan
Docket: 10-568
Issue(s): Whether the First Amendment subjects state restrictions on voting by elected officials to strict scrutiny, the balancing test of Pickering v. Board of Education, or rational-basis review.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Title: Kraft Foods Global, Inc., Oscar Mayer Foods Division v. Jeff Spoerle
Docket: 10-580
Issue(s): Whether Section 203(o) of the Fair Labor Standards Act, which allows unions and employers to resolve through collective bargaining agreements the issue of whether employees must be compensated for time spent changing clothes, preempts state minimum-wage and overtime laws requiring employees to be compensated for such time.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
DISCLOSURE: Akin Gump and Howe & Russell represent parties in the three cases below; the cases are listed here without regard to their chances of being granted.
Note: Howe & Russell and Akin Gump represent the petitioner in this case.
Title: Gao v. Holder
Docket: 10-130
Issue(s): 1) Whether the category of “particularly serious crimes” is limited to “aggravated felonies” under 8 U.S.C. § 1231(b)(3)(B)(ii) and 8 U.S.C. § 1158(b)(2)(A)(ii) with the sole exception that – with respect to asylum – the Attorney General may “designate” additional offenses “by regulation”; and 2) whether the government must make an individualized determination that an individual poses “a danger to the community” before denying her withholding of removal or asylum under 8 U.S.C. § 1231(b)(3)(B) (for withholding) or 8 U.S.C. § 1158(b)(2)(A)(ii) (for asylum).
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Note: Howe & Russell and Akin Gump represent the petitioner in this case.
Title: Castro v. United States
Docket: 10-309
Issue(s): (1) Whether the discretionary function exception to the Federal Tort Claims Act, 28 U.S.C. § 2680(a), applies to acts by federal employees that exceed the scope of their statutory or constitutional authority; and (2) even if governmental conduct would otherwise fit within the discretionary function, whether the law enforcement proviso of the Federal Tort Claims Act, 28 U.S.C. § 2680(h) -- which authorizes suits based on an enumerated list of common-law torts if those torts are committed by federal law enforcement officers -- nonetheless permits a plaintiff to proceed.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
Note: Akin Gump represents the respondents in this case.
Title: Sorrell v. IMS Health Inc.
Docket: 10-779
Issue(s): Whether a law that restricts access to information in nonpublic prescription drug records and affords prescribers the right to consent before their identifying information in prescription drug records is sold or used in marketing violates the First Amendment.
Certiorari-Stage Documents:
If any other paid petitions are re-distributed for the January 7 conference, we will add them below as soon as their re-distribution is noted on the docket.

description.hltext_display: Riaprono gli aeroporti europei dopo il gran gelo
description.content:
Il caos in molti aeroporti europei per il maltempo è "inaccettabile" e "non deve più accadere". Nonostante le parole di Siim Kallas, commissario europei ai Trasporti, i voli in Europa sono rimasti difficili e molto spesso impossibili per tutta la giornata di martedì a causa del maltempo e delle nevicate. In serata la situazione era migliorata in uno degli «hub» più strategici, l'aeroporto londinese di Heathrow, dove sono state aperte a distanza di poche ore una dall'altra la prima e la seconda pista. Anche lo scalo di Catwick ha riaperto nella serata di martedì. L'aeroporto di Bruxelles ha evitato la chiusura totale sino a mercoledì per la mancanza di liquido antigelo (alcuni voli in partenza potranno essere cancellati nel corso della giornata), con riserve arrivate nel pomeriggio.
Il primo ministro britannico David Cameron ha annunciato l'utilizzo di militari per aiutare a smaltire le attese a Heathrow e ha assicurato che una seconda pista sarà operativa entro "poche ore". La British Airways continua a invitare i passeggeri a non recarsi in aeroporto prima di aver verificato con le proprie compagnie che il volo non sia stato cancellato: «Ci vorrà tempo per ripristinare il normale funzionamento dello scalo» avverte la compagnia. I disagi in Gran Bretagna per il cattivo tempo saranno presenti almeno sino a domenica 26 e le autorità aeroportuali hanno deciso di autorizzare gli atterraggi a Heathrow fino all'una di notte per tentare di decongestionare lo scalo.
Londra Heathrow in tilt
FRANCOFORTE - Anche in Germania la situazione è migliorata nella notte. Ieri una nuova nevicata aveva fatto di nuovo chiudere lo scalo di Francoforte, anche questo snodo vitale del traffico europeo. Con attività ridotta lo scalo ha ripreso a operare di nuovo dalle ore 9. Fonti ufficiali affermano che 139 voli in arrivo e 136 in partenza ieri sono stati cancellati. Altri voli erano stati cancellati negli aeroporti di Monaco e Berlino. All'alba di mercoledì, tuttvaia, le autorità hanno annunciato il ritorno alla normalità. Anche se per riassorbire i ritardi ci vorrà del tempo e comunque le previsioni meteo non sono positive. Le linee aeree hanno consigliato ai passeggeri di prendere il treno, mentre gli operatori ferroviari - con i treni presi d'assalto - hanno invitato i viaggiatori di restare a casa.
PARIGI - In Francia, l'aeroporto di Parigi Roissy-Charles de Gaulle ha riaperto tre delle sue quattro piste. Martedì la maggior parte dei voli interni sono stati cancellati per permettere ai viaggiatori internazionali di recuperare le coincidenze. Nell'altro aeroporto parigino di Orly entrambe le piste sono in funzione, anche se molti voli hanno subito ritardi di oltre tre ore.

description.hltext_display: خروج 620 ميليون دلار از کشور براي واردات دانه هاي روغني
description.content:
خبرگزاري موج - رييس کميسيون کشاورزي مجلس شوراي اسلامي گفت: طي سال 88، حدود 650 ميليون دلار ارز از کشور براي واردات دانه هاي روغني صرف شده است.
به گزارش خبرنگار موج، عباس رجايي رييس کميسيون کشاورزي مجلس شوراي اسلامي در سومين سمينار بين المللي دانه هاي روغني و روغن نباتي با اعلام اين مطلب اظهار داشت: دانه هاي روغني يکي از دغدغه هاي اصلي کشور در حوزه غذا است.
وي افزود: 90 درصد روغن مورد نياز به کشور وارد شده و در خصوص توليد دانه هاي روغني در کشور دو نظريه کاملا متفاوت مطرح است.
رجايي گفت: برخي به خودکفايي در بحث دانه هاي روغني معتقد بوده و گروهي نيز با اين امر مخالف هستند.
وي خاطر نشان ساخت: بايد کشور تا حدود مشخصي نسبت به توليد دانه هاي روغني اقدام کرده و به طور کامل به خارج وابسته نباشد.
رييس کميسيون کشاورزي با اشاره به تصويب قوانيني در راستاي دستيابي به خودکفايي نسبي در بحث دانه هاي روغني در برنامه پنجم اظهار اميدواري کرد که هرچه سريعتر اين برنامه به تصويب شوراي نگهبان برسد.
وي ميزان توليد دانه هاي روغني در سال 75 را 212 هزار تن اعلام کرد و گفت: در سال 88 ميزان توليد دانه هاي روغني به 442 هزار تن رسيد.
رجايي با اشاره به رشد 2 برابري در توليد دانه هاي روغني طي سال هاي گذشته اظهار داشت: متاسفانه اين رشد قابل قبول نيست.
وي تصريح کرد: در سال 88، يک ميليون و 285 هزار تن واردات دانه هاي روغني به کشور انجام شده است.
رييس کميسيون کشاورزي اضافه کرد: طي سال گذشته 122 هزار تن دانه هاي روغني در کشور توليد شده که قابل مقايسه با حجم واردات نيست.
وي با اشاره به حجم بالاي ارز خارج شده از کشور براي واردات خاطر نشان ساخت: اگر اين ارقام در داخل کشور سرمايه گذاري مي شد، تا کنون به توليد قابل قبول در زمينه دانه هاي روغني رسيده بوديم.
رجايي 1/9 درصد حجم واردات دانه هاي روغني را متعلق به سويا دانست و افزود: به دليل مصرف دو گانه اين دانه در بخش کشاورزي، حجم قابل ملاحظه اي از واردات را به خود اختصاص داده است.
وي با تاکيد بر برنامه ريزي ويژه براي دستيابي به روند خودکفايي اظهار داشت: متاسفانه هنوز انسجام لازم براي تصميم گيري در اين خصوص وجود ندارد.
رييس کميسيون کشاورزي افزود: متاسفانه وزارت جهاد کشاورزي به عنوان متولي توليد برخي سياست هاي اعلام شده را اساسا قبول ندارد.
وي ادامه داد: اين وزارتخانه تشکل ها را به رسميت نشناخته و با آنان همکاري نمي کند که بايد در اين مهم در مجلس و دولت تعيين تکليف شود.
رجايي اظهار داشت: عليرغم اعلام آمادگي بخش خصوصي براي مشارکت در برنامه هاي توليدي دانه هاي روغني و تدوين برنامه ها، وزارت جهاد کشاورزي آمادگي پذيرش اين مسئله را ندارد.
وي با اشاره به کمبود آب در کشور آن را يکي از چالش هاي اصلي در حوزه توليد دانه هاي روغني دانست و گفت: توجه به دانه هاي بومي مي تواند رويکرد جديدي در اين بخش باشد.
رييس کميسيون کشاورزي خاطر نشان ساخت: با توجه به توليد دانه هاي روغني در اقليم کشور، بسياري از چالش ها در اين حوزه مرتفع خواهد شد.
مطالعات در خصوص محصولات تراريخته بايد مد نظر قرار گيرد
رجايي با اشاره به واردات محصولات تراريخته به کشور اظهار داشت: عليرغم ورود اين محصولات، توليد محصولات تراريخته در کشور با حساسيت هاي خاصي مواجه مي شود.
وي افزود: خوشبختانه مجلس قانون ايمني زيستي را تدوين کرده و جا دارد وزارت جهادکشاورزي و محيط زيست به طور جدي در اين خصوص وارد عمل شوند.
رييس کميسيون کشاورزي ادامه داد: اگر با توليد محصولات تراريخته مخالف هستيم بايد دلايل منطقي و علمي ارايه کنيم.
وي اظهار داشت: اگرچه با توليد محصولات تراريخته در جهان موافقت ها و مخالفت هاي جدي وجود دارد، اما بايستي تمام اين نکات با دلايل مستند علمي مورد توجه قرار گيرد.
رجايي تاکيد کرد: بايد از دانش توليد محصولات تراريخته در بحث توليد دانه هاي روغني استفاده شود.
يارانه هاي بخش کشاورزي در اجراي قانون هدفمندي نبايد کاهش يابد
رييس کميسيون کشاورزي گفت: در جلسات مختلفي که با رييس جمهور داشتم بر ارايه يارانه به بخش کشاورزي پس از اجراي قانون هدفمندي يارانه ها تاکيد شده است.
وي افزود: کشاورزي يکي از بخش هاي اصلي اقتصاد کشور بوده و اقتصاد کشور به اين حوزه وابسته است.
رجايي اظهار داشت: در بخش کشاورزي نه تنها بايد يارانه ها کم نشود بلکه بايد افزايش نيز داشته باشد.
وي خاطر نشان ساخت: با توجه به برنامه هاي حمايتي تدوين شده سه گروه محصول براي بخش کشاورزي تعريف شد که دانه هاي روغني نيز در اين گروه قرار گرفته است.
رييس کميسيون کشاورزي با اشاره به تصويب قانون تشکيل شرکت شهرک هاي کشاورزي گفت: اين شهرک ها در حوزه کشاورزي منجر به ايجاد قطعات اقتصادي خواهد شد.
وي افزود: يکي از چالش هاي بخش کشاورزي يکسان بودن مالکيت و مديريت توليد در اين بخش است که با تشکيل شرکت شهرک هاي کشاورزي اين معضل تا حدودي حل خواهد شد.
سرمايه گذاري در بخش کشاورزي تا سقف 20 درصد افزايش مي يابد
رجايي با اشاره به تصويب سرمايه گذاري 10 درصدي در قانون برنامه چهارم توسعه گفت: درصد تحقق سرمايه گذاري در بخش کشاورزي طي برنامه چهارم فقط يک درصد بود.
وي افزود: اين روند نشان دهنده اين مطلب است که بخش کشاورزي قابليت جذب سرمايه را نداشته يا اينکه براي سرمايه گذاري به اين بخش توجه نشده است.
رييس کميسيون کشاورزي با توجه به سياستهاي تدوين شده در برنامه پنجم توسعه، اظهار داشت: در اين برنامه ميزان سرمايه گذاري در بخش کشاورزي تا سقف 20 درصد افزايش خواهد يافت.
وي ادامه داد: بخش کشاورزي پتانسيل افزايش سرمايه گذاري تا سقف 30 درصد را نيز دارد.
مذاکره براي تخصيص زمين در خارج از کشور
رجايي از انجام مذاکره با برخي کشورها طي 10 روز آينده براي تخصيص قطعات 100 هکتاري به ايران، اظهار داشت: در اين زمين ها ذرت و سويا کشت خواهد شد.
وي با اشاره به گذشت 10 سال از تحقق خودکفايي 70 درصدي در بحث ذرت، خاطر نشان ساخت: هنوز وزارت جهاد کشاورزي اين مهم را محقق نکرده است.

description.hltext_display: Kayıp iki çocuk bulundu
description.author: Hürriyet Avrupa
description.content:
22 Aralık 2010
Kayseri'de oyun oynamaya gittiklerini söyleyerek evlerinden ayrılan ve geri dönmeyen iki çocuk bulundu. Edinilen bilgiye göre, Ziya Gökalp Mahallesi'ndeki evlerinden oyun oynamaya gittiklerini söyleyerek ayrılan A.B. ve arkadaşı D.D., iki gündür evlerine dönmedi.
Şehit Mustafa Şimşek İlköğretim Okulu 7. sınıf öğrencisi olan D. D. ve 8. sınıf öğrencisi A.B'nin aileleri, çocuklarının bulunması için polise başvurdular.
Polis, her iki çocuğun da Osman Kavuncu Caddesi'ndeki Orta Sanayi Camisi'nde saklandığını belirledi. Polisten kaçan çocuklar kısa bir kovalamacanın ardından yakalanarak, Çocuk Şube Müdürlüğüne götürüldü.
Dikkat: Sitede yer alan haberlerin izinsiz kullanılması durumunda yasal işlem ba

description.hltext_display: Drop Safes: For Small And Important One Way Deposits
description.content: Drop safes are one of those safes that are quite popular for official purpose. These types of safes are generally installed in offices that deal in cash. These safe are used to store cash for short term unless it is transferred to bank for secure deposit. If you owe a business then a depository drop safe can be an important and help full tool to prevent your cash from insiders as well outsiders.Size of these safes can differ from a small drop box to a large safe. There are different types of sizes and money drops available in these safes. It could be hard as a buyer to locate the right size and right deposit technique for your drop safe. You can choose from three different types of deposit techniques that are used in these depository drop safes:1) Slotted Loading Depository Safe: it is the simplest type of loading techniques. In this safe you have a slot near the front door in which you can insert cash envelops or bank cheques. There are two places where you can fit a slot; it could be at the rear door or at the front door. It is a one way safe in which you can only deposit things and it also prevent the thieves from taking out anything from the slots.2) Hinged hopper safe depositories: this type of loading technique is generally seen at the public libraries. You can locate this technique at the "book returns" section of the library. In this you pull the hopper and make the deposit in it.3) Rotary hopper depository drop safe: this is the best technique that is used in depository safe. It is also consider the most secure one because it have rotary hopper near the front of the safe and the hopper need to be rotated completely to make the deposit.Once you have deposited the things in the drop safe then you cannot take out the things the safe way. If you want to have a look at the valuable that are there in the safe you need to have the key to safe lock. It is a safe in which anyone can deposit but only authorized person can take out.Drop safe is among the simplest and best safe that you can have at your work place. The size you choose depend upon the amount of things that you are going to deposit in it.

description.hltext_display: 林赛-罗韩再度滋事 涉嫌违反酒禁令暴力伤人
description.content:
新浪娱乐讯 北京时间12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，林赛-罗韩(Lindsay Lohan)不愧是好莱坞的顶级话题女王之一，无论她身在哪里都能制作足够多的话题让媒体爆料。距离还有几周就能完成在贝蒂-福特诊所接受的戒酒治疗之时，林赛-罗韩又涉嫌对康复中心一名女性员工施暴遭到警方调查。
治疗期间前往酒吧
12月12日凌晨警方做的调查报告将这起事件定性为轻罪，但事情显然不会这么简单结束。这位声称自己被罗翰施以暴力的康复中心员工名为唐-霍兰(Dawn Holland)，11日晚间，罗翰与自己的两位室友从酒吧返回康复中心，时间已经超过了康复中心的宵禁时间，霍兰在门口拦下罗翰一行之后要求他们接受酒精测验，接着罗翰与霍兰发生了肢体冲突。根据霍兰的事件陈诉显示，当时两人发生了激烈的争吵，霍兰说道：“罗翰向我扔手机，我用左右挡住了手机，接着她冲上来抓住我的右手试图抢下我手中的手机，并且一直朝我大骂脏话。”
醉酒伤人前途未卜
当时罗翰被拦下要求接受酒精测验后立即打电话给母亲蒂娜-罗翰(Dina Lohan)，蒂娜告诉罗翰可以不接受任何酒精测验，而同行的一名室友承认三人当晚的确喝了酒。据这位室友所说：“回屋之后罗翰朝我大叫，她一直在给他妈妈打电话，她妈妈告诉她不必接受任何酒精测验，她还问我要不要和她妈妈通话，不过她一直也没把手机递给我。”霍兰在报告中还声称自己曾警告过罗翰：“你知道你要把手放在我身上我会起诉你的”，但是罗翰的回复是：“噢，你是想要钱吧！”如果罗翰被证实在康复期内饮酒并且定罪伤人，那么这位话题女王恐怕又得再次面临牢狱之灾(David)

description.hltext_display: State University of New York moves to Microsoft Live
description.author: Boy Genius Report
description.content:
In a short press release yesterday, Microsoft announced a deal with the State University of New York (SUNY) to bring the company’s Live@edu cloud-based collaboration services to all 64 SUNY campuses. “SUNY sought to decrease costs while providing its 465,000 students with up-to-date technology necessary for success in college and in today’s workforce,” reads the press release. “As a result, SUNY students will have access to advanced online software, including hosted e-mail, calendars, online storage, Office Web Apps, instant messaging, document sharing and videoconferencing, among other services.” SUNY estimates that the move to Microsoft’s cloud system will save the state roughly $600,000 over the next five years.
Tags: collaboration, college, Live, microsoft, New York, Online, Services, State University of New York, SUNY

description.hltext_display: Fight looms after Texas gets 4 new US House seats
description.content: AUSTIN, Texas A surge of Hispanic residents and other population gains have Texas poised to add more congressional clout than any other state, but a partisan fight now looms over exactly where the new seats should go. Texas is gaining four seats in the U.S. House, twice as many as Florida, the only other state to pick up multiple ones, according to new population figures announced Tuesday by the U.S. Census Bureau. All told, Republican-leaning states will pick up at least a half dozen House seats thanks to the 2010 census, which found the nation's population growing more slowly than in past decades but still shifting to the South and West. With Texas Republicans using recent elections to fortify their already solid control of the state Legislature, the political process of redrawing the state's congressional map would seem to benefit the GOP, too. But Democrats say not so fast. Boyd Richie, chairman of the Texas Democratic Party, said Hispanic and black population growth account for the additional seats, and he vowed to fight for a redistricting plan that takes their numbers into account. "A legal and fair redistricting process must produce new congressional districts that reflect the Hispanic and African American population growth," Richie said. "Our Democratic numbers may be down, but we are not out. Democrats cannot and will not allow our voices to be silenced in this critical process." The Census Bureau said the nation's population on April 1 was 308,745,538, up from 281.4 million a decade ago. The growth rate for the past decade was 9.7 percent, the lowest since the Great Depression. The U.S. population grew by 13.2 percent from 1990 to 2000. Michigan was the only state to lose population during the past decade. Nevada, with a 35 percent increase, was the fastest-growing state. The new numbers are a boon for Republicans, with Texas leading the way among GOP-leaning states that will gain House seats, mostly at the Rust Belt's expense. Following each once-a-decade census, the nation must reapportion the House's 435 districts to make them roughly equal in population, with each state getting at least one seat. In all, the census figures show a shift affecting 18 states taking effect when the 113th Congress takes office in 2013. The political power follows the high population growth, shifting toward the south and west and away from the industrial Midwest and northeast. With reapportionment settled, the far more politically divisive process of redistricting is set to begin. In Texas, both major parties were bracing for a showdown over the state's new residents, beginning a fight that is sure to spark court action. But with Republican supermajorities in the Legislature, the temptation to run the table will be strong. Rep. Pete Gallego, D-Alpine, said if the federal courts don't intervene to compel fairness, Republicans will likely produce a map that gives their party the advantage in three or perhaps even all four of the new seats. "It is very easy to overreach when you're holding the map and have the pen in your hand," he said. Despite the party's recent gains in the November legislative elections, Republicans won't have unchecked authority to draw the state's congressional map to benefit themselves. Civil rights laws require that the interests of minority voters be protected as district boundaries are redrawn, and Texas is one of the states whose redistricting plans require "pre-clearance" by federal authorities under the Voting Rights Act. Democrats are also counting on an assist from the Obama administration, which could have a significant voice in the pre-clearance process. It is the first time since the Voting Rights Act passed that the Justice Department will be in Democratic hands during the redistricting process. Hispanic growth doesn't automatically translate into Democratic growth, though. Two heavily Hispanic congressional seats in South Texas flipped to Republicans this year. There also are several new Latino GOP members about to be sworn into legislative seats. South Texas Rep. Aaron Pena, who recently left the Democrat Party and became a Republican, said Texas Latinos are more conservative than their counterparts in western states such as California and Nevada. Pena, who sits on the House Redistricting Committee, said his "educated guess" was that Republicans would get three of the four seats. "The Hispanic community is increasingly up for grabs," Pena said. "It's truly a swing population." Texas already had the largest Republican delegation in Congress, holding 20 of the state's 32 seats. In the 2010 elections, the party picked up another three seats, two of them in heavily Latino districts in South Texas. With all the new growth, Texas will now have 36 seats and 38 presidential electoral votes. Federal lawsuits are essentially guaranteed as part of the process, and if the past is any guide, the courts will have a major say in how the lines are finally drawn. In 2001, the Texas Legislature deadlocked on Congressional redistricting, leaving the federal courts to redraw all the districts. In 2006, the U.S. Supreme Court ordered that new lines be drawn in several districts to protect the rights of Hispanic voters in South Texas. Starting early next year, most state governments will use detailed, computer-generated data on voting patterns to carve neighborhoods in or out of newly drawn House districts, tilting them more to the left or right. Sometimes politicians play it safe, quietly agreeing to protect Republican and Democratic incumbents alike. But sometimes the party in control will gamble and aggressively try to reconfigure the map to dump as many opponents as possible. The U.S. is still growing quickly relative to other developed nations. The population in France and England each increased roughly 5 percent over the past decade, while in Japan the number is largely unchanged, and Germany's population is declining. China grew at about 6 percent; Canada's growth rate is roughly 10 percent. The 2010 census results also are used to distribute more than $400 billion in annual federal aid and will change each state's Electoral College votes beginning in the 2012 presidential election. Apart from the respective four- and two-seat gains in Texas and Florida, Arizona, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Utah and Washington are all picking up one new U.S. House seat. Ohio and New York will lose two House seats each. Losing one House seat are Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Missouri, New Jersey and Pennsylvania. Each House district represents an electoral vote in the presidential election process, meaning the political map for the 2012 election will tilt somewhat more Republican.

description.hltext_display: You'd never know it's Christmas. Everyone's ticked off!
Adobe第四季财报显示利润近2.7亿美元
description.content:
据国外媒体报道，Adobe当地时间12月20日发布了2010财年第四季度财报。财报显示，Adobe净利润为2.689亿美元，单季度营收首次突破10亿美元……
据国外媒体报道，Adobe当地时间12月20日发布了2010财年第四季度财报。财报显示，Adobe净利润为2.689亿美元，单季度营收首次突破10亿美元。
Adobe称，该公司第四财季净利润为2.689亿美元，每股收益为53美分。去年同期Adobe亏损了3200万美元，合每股6美分。Adobe营收增长33%至10.1亿美元，高于分析师预期的9.883亿美元。
按非一般公认会计准则计算，第四财季Adobe每股收益为56美分，超过分析师预期的52美分。
Adobe预计，不计一次性损益项目，2011财年第一季度每股收益为54美分至59美分。分析师对Adobe2011财年第一季度每股收益的预期为51美分。Adobe预计2011财年第一季度营收将为10亿美元至10.5亿美元。
Adobe 2010财年每股收益由2009财年的1.54美元提高到1.93美元，营收由2009财年的29.46亿美元增长29%至38亿美元。

description.hltext_display: Depository Safe: Quick Deposit And Limited Access
description.content: These days people are looking forward towards the security of there valuables and important documents. Most of them are going for depository safe because they are among the best safes that are available in the market. It is not for rich people it is also good for people who are dealing with money. If you are among those people who are dealing with the cash or some valuable things then one thing you should have at your office is Depository safe.If is not that you just have to buy a safe. It is important for you to understand the requirement of safe. Installing a depository safe is definitely going to increase your business security. If you are using your safe proper then you can definitely use it for decades. While buying depository safe you should keep in mind the increasing demands of you r business. It is a one time investment so you should keep all the different factors in mind.Depository safes are different from normal safes because they provide a depositing access to all but only authorized person can access the safe. In case of a crunch situation depository safe can be the perfect thing to have in your office. All you have to do is deposit everything valuable into the safe from the slot. These safe can have sizes ranging from a small drawer box to large free standing safes. In case of large safe there can be different compartment with separate lock system. This way you can have a multi level access depository safe. In most of the case depository safes are drilled into the walls or floor to give you better security. It is a safe that provide you quick deposits and different level of access.If you are looking forward to buy one of depository safe then make sure you choose the right company and right size of the safe. The safes made of steel are ranked among the most secured material used for manufacturing of safes. These safes can also be fitted with additional features like a fireproof safe that protects your documents and cash from fire. You can also install a alert system that issues a warning if any suspicious activity is done with the safe. you need to do a proper research to get the best safe, technology and add on facilities. So what are you waiting for go and get a depository safe installed in your office.

description.hltext_display: Sperret vegen hele dagen
description.content:
Vogntoget har trolig sklidd på glatten, og havnet nesten utfor vegen ved Arnavik på Halsnøy. Poltiet fikk melding om uhellet klokken 14.40 tirsdag.
– Den har trolig fått sladd i en sving og sperrer hele vegvbanen, sier operasjonsleder Terje Hilland i Hordaland politidistrikt.
Svaiet utfor stup
Deler av vogntoget lå utfor kanten av et stup og i begynnelsen var de redd den kom til å tippe ned.
– De tauer den vel trolig fast, mens de venter på bergingsbilen fra Rosendal, sier operasjonslederen.
Klokken 18.45 meldte politipatruljen på stedet at bergingsbilen var kommet frem. Den hadde da kommet over fjorden med ferge fra Utbjoa-Sydnes.
– Det kunne gått skikkelig gale, sier politibetjent Sondre Solheim til kvinnheringen.no.
Flere andre alvorlige ulykker i kveld:
Utenlandsk kjøretøy
Vogntoget er fra Latvia og er lastet med laks fra Viking Fjord på Sunde, og skulle videre til Danmark med lasten.
– Det er en utenlandsk fører. Han var nok ikke forberedt på glatten, og kanskje ikke godt nok skodd for føret, sier Hilland i politiet.
Stengt i hele kveld
Fylkesveg 62 var stengt mellom Tofte og Sydnes helt frem til 20.30 tirsdag kveld. Da ble vegen åpnet igjen for fri ferdsel.
FOR VEGMELDINGER SJEKK: NRK Trafikk
Semitraileren skal ha vært ustyrt med vinterdekk, men skal ikke hatt kjettinger.
Ifølge politiet har dårlig dekk sannsynligvis vært mye av grunnen til at vogntoget fikk problemer.
SJEKK VÆR OG FØREFORHOLD: yr.no
SISTE FRA NRK.NOAbonnér

description.hltext_display: Università, studenti oggi in piazza
description.content:
Studenti di nuovo in piazza oggi in tutta Italia contro la riforma dell'Università che, nonostante i ritardi seguiti alla bagarre di ieri al Senato, potrebbe essere approvata proprio oggi in via definitiva. A Roma sono attesi almeno 15mila studenti mentre polizia e carabinieri hanno schierato 2mila uomini. Una delegazione dei giovani tenterà di portare una lettera-appello a Napolitano per chiedergli di non firmare il ddl. Il centro di Roma è blindato ma gli studenti hanno assicurato che non intendono violare la 'zona rossa'. Nessun avviso invece alla questura: i manifestanti infatti hanno optato per cortei 'spontanei' senza comunicare alcun percorso alla questura. Il corteo principale comunque dovrebbe partire dall'università della Sapienza.
In mattinata l'Unione degli Studenti ha fatto un blitz in oltre 100 scuole private da Nord a Sud (Milano, Firenze, Bologna, Cagliari, Napoli, Bari, Cosenza), sigillate con nastro da cantiere, per protestare contro il "processo di privatizzazione messo in campo da governi di ogni schieramento negli ultimi 15 anni, per demarcare la qualità dell'istruzione pubblica rispetto ad un'idea di formazione di elite, finanziata con moneta sonante dal ministero all'ultima Finanziaria" - afferma in una nota l'UdS. "Oggi è l'ennesima mobilitazione di questi ultimi 3 mesi che hanno scaldato il cuore ad un'Italia ripiegata nel berlusconismo in decomposizione. L'Italia dei conflitti ha ripreso parola anche grazie al fiato che il movimento studentesco le ha dato" - afferma Tito Russo, coordinatore nazionale Unione degli Studenti. "Oggi in molte città la politica istituzionale segnerà un'ennesima distanza dalla società reale, trincerandosi dietro camionette blindate. Oggi noi ci riprendiamo le nostre città, continuando a manifestare fin quando in questo Paese non ci saranno politiche attive per il welfare, la formazione ed il lavoro".
E contro il rischio di nuove violenze e scontri, gli studenti annunciano sorprese. "Oggi stupiremo la politica di Manganello e di Governo. Non abbiamo paura di strumentalità, insulti e vecchi mostri agitati populisticamente, spiazzeremo oggi e durante le vacanze, chi per una generazione che chiede futuro assicura macerie e rastrellamenti cileni". Da nord a Sud, la mobilitazione oggi interessa tutta la Penisola. A Palermo si terrà un nuovo "Blocchiamo tutto day" in coincidenza con la seduta del Senato per la discussione della legge Gelmini. I giovani non hanno annunciato quali saranno i loro obiettivi, ma hanno solo fatto sapere che "saranno assediati i palazzi del potere'.
CAOS AL SENATO SUL DDL - Bagarre al Senato durante le votazioni sul ddl università. La presidente di turno Rosi Mauro ha dovuto interrompere la seduta per raffreddare gli animi, avvampati da una polemica regolamentare sulla votazione di un emendamento. Al Senato scoppia il caos, al punto tale che inizialmente e' difficile capire se alcuni emendamenti presentati dall'opposzione al ddl di riordino dell'universita' siano stati approvati o respinti. La bagarre si e' accesa quando la presidente di turno Mauro ha cercato accelerare l'esame e il voto sulle modifiche al testo presentate dall'opposizione.
Il tono delle voci nell'aula di Palazzo Madama e' altissimo e l'esponente leghista fa votare a raffica, per alzata di mano, gli emendamenti: "chi e' favorevole, chi e' contrario, approvato, respinto...". Anche Rosi Mauro alza la voce mentre le votazioni vanno avanti, forse troppo velocemente, a parere dell'opposizione, secondo la quale il ddl risulterebbe modificato a causa del sovrapporsi delle votazioni imposto dai ritmi della presidente Mauro. Come prova l'Idv mostra un video pubblicato su Youtube e trasmesso anche dalla webtv del partito in cui si sente con chiarezza l'esponente della Lega dichiarare approvati anche gli amendamenti 6.21, 6.303, 6.23 e 6.26.
L'Idv non ha dubbi: a questo punto il testo del ddl è stato cambiato e deve quindi tornare alla Camera per un'altra lettura, come ha affermato Felice Belisario, dopo un incontro con il presidente Renato Schifani. "Noi -ha affermato Belisario- abbiamo l'impressione che gli emendamenti dell'opposizione siano stati approvati e che, di conseguenza, il testo debba tornare alla Camera per un'ulteriore lettura". Il presidente del Senato ha però stabilito di far ripetere le votazioni contestate, decidendo di applicare il primo comma dell'articolo 118 del regolamento di Palazzo Madama che contempla la "rinnovazione" dei voti qualora si verifichino irregolarità.
GLI STUDENTI A NAPOLITANO, NON FIRMI RIFORMA GELMINI - "Se porrà la Sua firma al disegno di legge Gelmini Lei sancira' la cancellazione del Diritto allo Studio, uno dei diritti fondamentali della Costituzione intesa come patto fondante della nostra societa', che garantisce equita' e democrazia. Noi non siamo disposti a renderci complici del processo di restaurazione di uno stato autoritario, corrotto e autoreferenziale, che garantisce diritti e privilegi a pochi potenti a danno del resto della societa'. Si renda anche lei indisponibile a questo disegno eversivo: non firmi, sara' cosi' in piazza anche Lei al nostro fianco". Cosi' gli studenti e studentesse in mobilitazione della Sapienza scrivono al Capo dello Stato Giorgio Napolitano chiedendogli di non firmare la riforma Gelmini. "Siamo le studentesse e gli studenti dell Sapienza in mobilitazione da due anni in difesa dell'Universita' e della Formazione Pubblica - si presentano -. In questi ultimi mesi sono stati occupati quasi tutti gli atenei, abbiamo occupato i monumenti, ci siamo riuniti nelle assemblee, siamo saliti sui tetti, abbiamo invaso le strade e bloccato le citta', tutto per far sentire la nostra voce al paese e bloccare la riforma. Nella giornata di oggi assistiamo al passaggio finale dell'attacco al mondo dell'istruzione pubblica da parte di questo governo, inserito in 20 anni di politiche di privatizzazione che tentano di smantellare il diritto allo studio. Abbiamo dimostrato al paese come le istituzioni "democratiche" siano sorde alle richieste e alle istanze che provengono dai conflitti e dalle lotte sociali che nei territori si stanno producendo".

description.hltext_display: Pamela Stephenson's Strictly worries
description.author: Bangshowbiz
description.content:
Pamela Stephenson was worried people would think she was having an affair with James Jordan. The 61-year-old psychotherapist - who is married to comedian Billy Connolly - decided to openly address her crush on her 32-year-old 'Strictly Come Dancing' partner so fans of the BBC One show didn't speculate on whether they were enjoying a raunchy affair. She explained: "I believe at some level people knew I was relishing the opportunity to have a sanctioned mini 'affair' with him - unconsummated of course - that provided an intriguing subplot for our so-called 'Strictly' story. I didn't hide my feelings, and chose to be quite open about my temporary crush on James. "If I had not, I fear that, despite our age difference, there might have been speculation about the possibility of a little granny-s***ging going on behind the scenery!" Being the oldest contestant to have ever reached the 'Strictly Come Dancing' final, Pamela admitted she was "extremely proud" to fly the flag for people in their sixties.
Writing in G2, she said: "Frankly, in my younger day I was one of the people who held the common prejudice that sexagenarians could not be athletic, fun-loving, vital, sexy and passionate and I would be thrilled if I did indeed help to change that tune. "I feel extremely proud to be a flag-flier, and profoundly grateful for the way people of all ages supported me, voted for me and willed me to succeed."

description.hltext_display: اسامي ناطقان ميان‌دستور جلسه علني امروز
description.content:
خبرگزاري موج - عضو هيات رئيسه مجلسشوراي اسلامي اسامي سخنرانان ميان‌دستور جلسه علني امروز را اعلام كرد.
به گزارش خبرنگار پارلماني موج، حسين سبحاني نيا روز چهارشنبه اسامي سخنرانان ميان دستور را به شرح ذيل قرائت کرد:
1- پرويز سروري نماينده تهران،ري،شميرانات و اسلامشهر
2- عبدالله رستگار نماينده گنبد كاووس
3- مصطفي كواكبيان نماينده سمنان
4- سيدناصر موسوي لارگاني نماينده فلاورجان.

description.hltext_display: 红帽第三季运营利润3800万美元
description.content:
据国外媒体报道，开源解决方案提供商红帽周二发布了该公司2011财年第三财季财报……
据国外媒体报道，开源解决方案提供商红帽周二发布了该公司2011财年第三财季财报。财报显示，红帽第三财季净利润为2600万美元，超过了市场预期。
在截至11月30日的第三财季，红帽总营收为2.356亿美元，同比增长21%。红帽第三财季运营利润为3800万美元，较去年同期的1980万美元增长92%。红帽第三财季净利润为2600万美元，合每股摊薄收益0.13美元。这一业绩好于上年同期，2010财年第三财季，红帽净利润为1640万美元，合每股摊薄收益0.08美元。不按照美国通用会计准则，红帽第三财季净利润为3910万美元，合每股收益0.20美元。
红帽第三财季业绩超过了市场预期。汤森路透的调查显示，市场分析师此前平均预计，不按照美国通用会计准则，红帽第二财季每股摊薄收益为0.20美元，营收为2.2727亿美元。
包括软件巨头甲骨文、技术服务公司Accenture、以及黑莓手机制造商RIM，在上周都发布了业绩超过市场预期的财报。这有力的证明，企业技术支出已经开始复苏。
红帽股价周二在纽交所常规交易中下跌0.04美元，跌幅为0.08%，报收于47.88美元。在随后的盘后交易中，红帽股价下跌1.04美元，跌幅为2.17%，报收于46.84美元。过去52周，红帽最低股价为26.51美元，最高股价为49.00美元。

description.hltext_display: Important Of UL Rating Of Your Fireproof Safe
description.content: If you are one of those people that are looking to buy a fireproof safe for your business or home purpose and don't know where to start? First all you need to decide and make a list of all the possible items that you are going to keep in your fireproof safes. Making a list will definitely help you in getting a clear idea about the type of resistance and the size you need. Getting these two basic things correct is quite essential in getting the right safe.If you are going to store things that are sensitive to heat then you need a safe that is quite store and prevents almost any type of heat from getting into it. There are some things like backup which are kept on tapes, DVD's or CD's which are quite sensitive to heat then you need to have a strong fireproof safe. Some people don't really feel the need of installing a fireproof safe. According to a survey the most amount of accident that happens are of fire. The chances of getting a fire in you office or house are quite big that what you really think they are. So if some one doesn't know what a fire proof safe does? Fireproof safe is a safe that is particularly designed and styled to protect you content from heat and fire. Most of these safes are manufactured with a UL rating for a specific amount of time. There is another thing that you must know that these safe can withstand fire for a particular duration or time and not forever.Below are details related to various UL ratings that might help you in getting a fireproof safe:1) UL class350 – ½ hour: if a safe is having this rating then it can an outside temperature of 1550 degrees for about ½ an hour.2) UL class 350-1 hour: it can hold up your valuable for 1 hr with an outside temperature of 1700 degrees.3) UL class 350- 1 hour+: can with stand a temperature of 1700 degrees for 1 hr and a drop of 30 feet.4) UL class 350- 2 hours: can hold your valuable inside with an outside temperature of 1850 degrees.5) UL class 350- 2 hours+: can survive a drop of 30 feet plus it can with stand for 2hr+ with an outside temperature of 1850 degrees.

description.hltext_display: Ramsauer räumt Defizite bei der Bahn ein
description.content: "Es macht sich jetzt bemerkbar, dass man geglaubt hat, man könne sich das eine oder andere an der Reserve sparen." Diese baue man zurzeit in allen Bereichen der Bahn wieder auf. Die Probleme ließen sich nicht von heute auf morgen beheben. "Aber die Öffentlichkeit kann erwarten, dass die Politik zusammen mit den einzelnen Verkehrsträgern alles daran setzt, dass die Dinge in Ordnung gebracht werden - und das tun wir." Ramsauer wies Vorwürfe zurück, dass die Winterreifenpflicht den Lastwagenverkehr nicht ausreichend einschließe. Natürlich müssten nicht nur die Antriebsachsen, sondern alle Achsen eines Lastwagens mit griffigen Allwetter- und Ganzjahresreifen ausgestattet sein. "Jeder Lastwagen, der auf den anderen Achsen nicht hinreichend bereift ist, wird sofort aus dem Verkehr gezogen", sagte der Verkehrsminister./wn/DP/tw

description.hltext_display: ديدار مقام وزارت خارجه روماني با رئيس گروه دوستي پارلماني ايران و روماني
Guest post: Speaking volumes with credit indices
description.author: FT.com Alphaville
description.content:
Markit credit analyst Lisa Pollack explores how trade volumes are impacting credit spreads.
Weekly bond purchases by the ECB under the Securities Markets Programme (SMP) have seen a revival of late. Remember this from the December 2 press conference?
“Question: Why have bond purchases stayed at relatively low levels despite the sovereign debt market turmoil? Do you think the ECB could buy larger amounts when Ireland gets the package, in the same way as it did after the Greek crisis in May?
Trichet: On your first question I would say you know what we publish every week. So I would ask you to look at that.”
And so everyone looked. Such transparency is valuable, even if it comes with a time lag (formally published on the Tuesday of the following week, though often released a day in advance, and settlement lags can also lead to further delays). Nonetheless, there it was, confirmation of purchases that had been going on as Trichet was speaking, and they were some of the largest that had taken place since June.
Credit spreads had already started tightening when Trichet had hinted at additional support on the day prior to the December 2 conference. While such support wasn’t as forthcoming as some had hoped, the ECB using some of the existing firepower was welcomed and spreads duly tightened. Some positive economic data around the time also certainly helped sentiment, with the Markit Eurozone Manufacturing PMI coming in at a four-month high for November, a firm US ISM Manufacturing number, and a reasonably solid Portuguese T-bill auction.
Now for a second take on that episode with another chart that is proving popular of late, but now with a couple of additional lines.
The widening basis between the Markit iTraxx Financials Senior and Subordinated indices can be observed, as subordinated bondholders find themselves more vulnerable than previously thought. The dashed lines are the number of index trades on a given day for the on the run index, courtesy of a joint effort between Markit and DTCC. If the number of trades is fewer than five, the number is not reported.
In conclusion, it looks like Trichet wasn’t the only one putting his money where his mouth was around that time. On December 1 there were 67 trades on the Markit iTraxx Senior Financials and 32 on the Subordinated index, but a day later, there were 160 and 89 trades respectively.
Also visible in the graph (and as expected), the market is now seeing a slowdown in trading towards the end of the year, hence one must be cautious in interpreting spread movements. The graph further bears witness to the variation in the number of index trades done on a daily basis. To further complete the picture, looking at sovereigns directly rather than their financial institutions:
Further details on index volumes can be found here. The data is free, available on a daily basis, and comes with a time lag of one day.
This entry was posted by Guest writer on Wednesday, December 22nd, 2010 at 8:30 and is filed under Capital markets. Tagged with CDS, Itraxx, Senior financials, sovereign bonds. Edit this entry.

description.hltext_display: TIR, öğrencileri taşıyan minibüse çarptı
description.author: Hürriyet Avrupa
description.content:
22 Aralık 2010
Konya'nın Karapınar ilçesinde meydana gelen trafik kazasında 16 öğrenci ile öğrencileri taşıyan minibüsün şoförü yaralandı. Mehmet Y'nin kullandığı 31 R 0917 plakalı TIR, Karapınar Çevre yolunda tali yoldan çıkan İsmail Balkan'ın kullandığı 42 JC 043 plakalı lise öğrencilerini taşıyan servis minibüsüne çarptı. Arkadan gelen Hasan Hüseyin A'nın (49) kullandığı 42 AE 617 plakalı kamyon da bu iki araca arkadan çarptı.
Kazada, minibüs şoförü Balkan ile minibüste bulunan Karapınar İbrahim Gündüz Anadolu Lisesi öğrencisi oldukları öğrenilen Gülçin Gülcü, Metin Tartan, Emet Köprüsoy, Mehtap Karataş, Emsal Saçlı, Amil Kalkan, Meral Zengin, Fatma Kurtoğlu, Murat Kurtoğlu, Şeyma Emir, Banu Yazgan, Fadime Kalkan, İbrahim Gündoğdu, Mintiha Acar, Kezban Ecer ve Mürüvvet Ocakçı yaralandı.
Karapınar ve Konya'daki hastanelere kaldırılan yaralıların sağlık durumlarının iyi olduğu öğrenildi.

description.hltext_display: لايحه اصلاحيه کنوانسيون بين‌المللي مسئوليت مدني ناشي از خسارات آلودگي نفتي
description.content:
مجلس تصويب کرد:
خبرگزاري موج - لايحه اصلاحيه کنوانسيون بين‌المللي مسئوليت مدني ناشي از خسارت آلودگي نفتي در مجلس شوراي اسلامي تصويب شد.
به گزارش خبرنگار پارلماني موج، نمايندگان مجلس شوراي اسلامي روز چهارشنبه لايحه تصويب اصلاحيه پروتکل 1992 ميلادي جهت اصلاح کنوانسيون تاسيس يک صندوق بين المللي براي جبران خسارت آلودگي نفتي 1971 که به کميسيون کشاورزي، آب و منابع طبيعي مجلس ارائه شده بود را تصويب کردند.
براساس ماده واحده اصلاحيه پروتکل 1992 ميلادي (1371 هجري شمسي) جهت اصلاح کنوانسيون بين المللي مسووليت مدني ناشي از خسارت آلودگي نفتي 1969 ميلادي (1348 هجري شمسي) و پروتکل 1992 ميلادي (1371 هجري شمسي) جهت اصلاح کنوانسيون تاسيس يک صندوق بين المللي براي جبران خسارت آلودگي نفتي 1971 ميلادي (1350 هجري شمسي) موضوع قطعنامه هاي شماره (1) 82 و (2) 82 مورخ هجدهم اکتبر 2000 ميلادي (برابر با 27/2/1381 هجري شمسي) کارگروه حقوقي سازمان بين المللي دريانوردي ـ تصويب مي گردد.
در بندي از اين لايحه آمده است 1 ـ بند (1) ماده (6) پروتکل 1992 ميلادي (1371 هجري شمسي) جهت اصلاح کنوانسيون بين المللي مسووليت مدني ناشي از خسارت آلودگي نفتي 1969 ميلادي (1348 هجري شمسي) به شرح زير اصلاح مي گردد:
ـ عبارت «3 ميليون واحد محاسبه» به عبارت «000/510/4 واحد محاسبه» تغيير مي يابد.
ـ عبارت «420 واحد محاسبه» به عبارت «631 واحد محاسبه» تغيير مي يابد.
ـ عبارت «7/59 ميليون واحد محاسبه» به عبارت «000/770/59 واحد محاسبه» تغيير مي يابد.
2ـ بند (3) ماده (6) پروتکل 1992 ميلادي (1371 هجري شمسي) جهت اصلاح کنوانسيون تاسيس يک صندوق بين المللي براي جبران خسارت آلودگي نفتي 1971 ميلادي (1350 هجري شمسي) به شرح زير اصلاح مي گردد:
ـ در جزء (الف) بند (4) عبارت «135 ميليون واحد محاسبه» به عبارت «000/000/203 واحد محاسبه» تغيير مي يابد.
ـ در جزء (ب) بند (4) عبارت «135 ميليون واحد محاسبه» به عبارت «000/000/203 واحد محاسبه» تغيير مي يابد.
ـ در جزء (ج) بند (4) عبارت «200 ميليون واحد محاسبه» به عبارت «000/740/300 واحد محاسبه» تغيير مي يابد.
گفتني است نمايندگان مجلس با 111 راي موافق بدون مخالف و 14 راي ممتنع اين لايحه را به تصويب رساندند.

description.hltext_display: United Negro College Fund Selected by NASA To Help Build Science Careers
Countdown zur Analog-Abschaltung läuft
description.content: In Deutschland empfangen derzeit insgesamt 16,2 Millionen Haushalte ihr Fernsehprogramm via Satellit, 3,6 Millionen davon noch mit analogen Geräten. Insgesamt gibt es mehr als 36 Millionen TV- Haushalte, anders als in vielen Nachbarländern beziehen viele ihr Fernsehen via Kabel. Dort sei der Anteil digitaler Empfangstechnik erheblich niedriger. "Im Gegensatz zum Kabel-Fernsehen sind wir deutlich voraus", sagte Elsäßer. Allerdings könnten viele nicht auf Satellit umsteigen, weil der Kabelanschluss beispielsweise in der Miete enthalten ist. Vor allem hochauflösendes Fernsehen habe das digitale Angebot zuletzt attraktiver gemacht. "HD-TV ist der Treiber der gesamten Fernsehindustrie." Angesichts der Abschaltung des analogen Empfangs will Astra aber nicht nur die Umstellung in den Haushalten forcieren, sondern auch neue Kunden hinzugewinnen. "Wir investieren einen siebenstelligen Betrag im Handels-Marketing", sagte Elsäßer. Dabei werde eng mit den Herstellern zusammengearbeitet, vor allem aber mit dem Handel. "Für die Händler ist das besonders interessant. Das ist fast eine Milliarde Zusatzumsatz in den kommenden 500 Tagen."/sbr/DP/tw

description.hltext_display: Awnings Are Actually Excellent Presents

Since the holiday season does come through the winter months, you awning may not be installed right up until spring. Do not concern, you can still begin using these as a great current idea. With the help of your family, choose the awning that may meet your family member's wants. You should try to make sure the particular awning's colors and size requirements fit into the general appearance of the home.Secondly, you will find a creative way to present their gift about the holiday. Your awning may not be installed become you can still let them know what you got for the kids. Some great ideas include: buying items that have the first letter of the merchandise spelling out AWNING. You can wrap all the gifts up individually, then have the person guess what their actual present is. Terms games are always entertaining too. Whatever you choose to be able to surprise your family associate, an awning will always make a great holiday gift. Check this patio awnings.

description.hltext_display: Obama to sign repeal of 'don't ask, don't tell'
description.content:
President Obama will sign the Repeal Act of 2010 into law Wednesday, ending a policy enacted in 1993 that banned openly gay and lesbian soldiers from military service.
The changes won't be immediate, possibly taking several months to implement, the White House has said.
The Pentagon has an 87-page implementation plan for the repeal of "don't ask, don't tell." Over the next several weeks, military officials need to examine and rewrite a series of policies, regulations and directives related to the current law.
Once that potentially lengthy process is complete, Obama, Defense Secretary Robert Gates and Joint Chiefs Chairman Adm. Mike Mullen will each have to certify that the repeal can move ahead without negatively affecting unit cohesion and military readiness.
After the certification, another 60 days will need to pass before the repeal is officially enacted.
Even after the repeal, gay and lesbian service members will not have every right and privilege accorded to heterosexual members of the military, largely because of the federal Defense of Marriage Act.
A Pentagon study released earlier in December concluded that allowing openly gay or lesbian troops to serve in the military would have little lasting impact on the U.S. forces. Opposition to the change was much higher in the Army and Marine combat units than in the military as a whole.
During the 17 years the policy was in place, more than 14,000 military members were discharged because of it.
CNN's Bill Mears, Barbara Starr, Larry Shaughnessy and Alan Silverleib contributed to this report.
